It grants him **healing** based on a percentage of the damage dealt to enemy champions, but this healing is converted into a **Phage-like shield** if Pyke is out of combat for a short duration. This passive is used both **offensively** to sustain through trades and brawls, and **defensively** to prepare for subsequent engagements with a protective shield.
abilities.original_description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

abilities.name: Death From Below
abilities.mechanics_description: Death From Below is a targeted dash that allows Pyke to strike enemies in an area. It is used offensively for high burst damage and can be recast to return to the initial strike location, providing a defensive or repositioning tool.
abilities.original_description:
Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists. Pyke strikes all enemy champions in an X, teleporting to and executing targets below {{ rdamage }} Health. Champions above the threshold and non-champions instead take physical damage equal to {{ reduceddamage*100 }}% of that amount ({{ reduceddamagefinal }}).

When an enemy champion dies inside the X, Pyke can Recast this Ability for free within {{ rrecastduration }} seconds. If he executed that champion, the last assisting ally will also get kill gold. If he did not, he will still get kill gold as if he did.

abilities.name: Sear
abilities.mechanics_description: Brand's **Sear** is a linear skillshot that ignites an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and applying a stack of his passive, *Blaze*. If the target is already ablaze, Sear will briefly stun them instead of applying a stack.
abilities.original_description:
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target. Brand launches a fireball that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the target is Ablaze, they will be Stunned for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.mechanics_description: **Blaze (Passive):** Brand's damaging abilities apply a stack of Blaze to enemy champions for a few seconds, stacking up to 3 times. After reaching 3 stacks, enemies explode, dealing damage based on their max health. This passive primarily serves an offensive role, contributing to Brand's burst damage and sustained threat.
abilities.original_description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

abilities.name: Pillar of Flame
abilities.mechanics_description: Pillar of Flame is a linear skillshot that Brand detonates, dealing damage in a target area. It is primarily used offensively to deal burst damage or clear waves, with its longer range allowing for poke and zoning.
abilities.original_description:
After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage. Brand creates a pillar of pure fire, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Units that are Ablaze take {{ empowereddamage }} damage instead.

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.mechanics_description: Brand's "Conflagration" (E) is a point-and-click ability that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze (has taken damage from Brand's other abilities recently), Conflagration will bounce to nearby enemies, making it a potent tool for spreading damage and his passive, "Blaze."
abilities.original_description:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target that spreads to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration's spread is doubled. Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ edamagecalc }} magic damage to surrounding units.

If the target is Ablaze, the spread range is doubled.

abilities.name: Pyroclasm
abilities.mechanics_description: Pyroclasm is an auto-targeting ultimate that launches a fiery wave of energy, bouncing between enemies in an area. It is used offensively to deal significant area-of-effect damage, especially effective when multiple enemies are grouped together.
abilities.original_description:
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of Brand and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them. Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that can bounce to Brand or another enemy up to 5 times, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemies each bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on champions.

If the target is Ablaze, they are briefly Slowed by {{ slowamount }}%.

abilities.name: Corrosive Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Urgot fires a corrosive bolt as a linear skillshot that damages the first enemy hit. This ability is primarily used offensively for poke and to apply his passive stacks.
abilities.original_description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion. Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Echoing Flames
abilities.mechanics_description: **Echoing Flames (Passive)** is an auto-target ability for Urgot. After using an ability, Urgot's next three basic attacks within a short window will automatically target enemies in a cone in front of him, dealing bonus physical damage. This passive is primarily used offensively to maximize damage output and stack his "Cause of Death" passive.
abilities.original_description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

abilities.name: Purge
abilities.mechanics_description: Urgot activates **Purge**, a toggle ability that causes his mechanical legs to rapidly swing, dealing physical damage in a cone in front of him. He gains increased movement speed while this ability is active, allowing him to chase down enemies or reposition effectively.
abilities.original_description:
Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames. Passive: Urgot's other Abilities mark the last champion hit for 5 seconds.

Active: Urgot begins firing his chain gun at the closest enemy, prioritizing marked enemies. He Attacks them {{ e8 }} times a second dealing {{ damagepershot }} physical damage per shot. Urgot can move while firing and has {{ e2 }}% Slow resistance, but loses {{ e5 }} Move Speed.

At max rank, this Ability lasts indefinitely and can be Toggled on and off.

abilities.name: Fear Beyond Death
abilities.mechanics_description: Urgot's ultimate, "Fear Beyond Death," is a **skillshot** that fires a **piercing harpoon** in a line. If the harpoon hits an enemy champion, Urgot **applies a debuff** and begins a **channel** where he can **recast the ability** within a certain range to **dash towards the target**, suppressing them and dealing damage over time. This ability is primarily used **offensively** for its crowd control and execution potential.
abilities.original_description:
Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them. Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first champion hit, dealing {{ rcalculateddamage }} physical damage and Slowing for {{ rslowduration }} seconds by 1% per 1% missing Health, up to {{ rmovespeedmod }}%.

If the impaled victim falls below {{ rhealththreshold }}% Health, Urgot can Recast this Ability, Suppressing the victim and dragging them to himself. On reaching Urgot, they are killed and nearby enemies are Feared for {{ rfearduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Disdain
abilities.mechanics_description: Urgot fires a skillshot that pierces all enemies. Enemies hit are **slowed**. If an enemy champion is hit, Urgot can reactivate the ability to **dash short distances** and **pull** the enemy towards him, rooting them for a short duration. This ability is primarily used **offensively** to engage, either by slowing enemies to land more auto-attacks or by pulling them in to proc his passive.
abilities.original_description: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way. Urgot charges forward, gaining <shield>{{ etotalshieldhealth }} Shield</shield> for {{ eshieldduration }} seconds. The first champion hit is <status>Stunned</status> for {{ stunduration }} seconds and thrown behind Urgot. All enemies Urgot collides with take <physicalDamage>{{ edamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>.

abilities.name: Essence Theft
abilities.mechanics_description: Essence Theft is Ahri's passive that automatically heals her when she lands her damaging abilities on enemy champions. This healing mechanic rewards Ahri for actively engaging and landing her spells, providing sustain during trades and all-ins.
abilities.original_description:
After killing 9 minions or monsters, Ahri heals.
After taking down an enemy champion, Ahri heals for a greater amount.

abilities.name: Orb of Deception
abilities.mechanics_description: Orb of Deception is a linear skillshot that Ahri throws forward, dealing magic damage on its initial cast and again on its return. It is primarily used offensively to deal damage and set up for further engagements.
abilities.original_description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.  Ahri throws then pulls back her orb, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> on the way out and <trueDamage>{{ totaldamage }} true damage</trueDamage> on the way back.

abilities.name: Fox-Fire
abilities.mechanics_description: Fox-Fire is a **skillshot** ability where Ahri fires three orbs that seek out nearby enemies. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal damage and secure kills, with subsequent hits on the same target dealing reduced damage.
abilities.original_description: Ahri gains a brief burst of Move Speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies. Ahri releases 3 fox-fires that seek nearby enemies and deal <magicDamage>{{ singlefiredamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, reduced to <magicDamage>{{ multifiredamage }} damage</magicDamage> beyond the first. She also gains <speed>{{ movementspeed*100 }}% Move Speed</speed> decaying over {{ movementspeedduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Spirit Rush
abilities.mechanics_description: Spirit Rush is a repositioning dash that Ahri can cast up to three times consecutively. Each dash allows her to pass through units, and reactivating the ability while near enemy champions grants her passive healing.
abilities.original_description:
Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions. Ahri nimbly dashes, firing {{ rmaxtargetspercast }} essence bolts at nearby enemies, prioritizing champions. These bolts deal {{ rcalculateddamage }} magic damage each. Spirit Rush can be Recast up to 2 more times within {{ rrecastwindow }} seconds.

Consuming a champion's Essence with Essence Theft during this period extends the recast window by up to {{ pdurationextension }} seconds and grants an additional recast of Spirit Rush (up to {{ rmaxcasts }} stored).

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.mechanics_description: Ahri's Charm (E) is a linear skillshot that travels in a straight line, passing through minions but stopping on the first champion hit. If it hits an enemy champion, it deals magic damage and forces them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for a short duration, making them vulnerable to her follow-up attacks and abilities.
abilities.original_description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her. Ahri blows a kiss that <status>Charms</status> the first enemy hit for {{ charmduration }} seconds and deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Threads of Vibration
abilities.mechanics_description: Threads of Vibration is a passive ability for Skarner. When Skarner hits a champion with an ability or auto-attack, he applies a stack of "Crystal Venom" to them, dealing magic damage over time and slowing them. This passive is used offensively to apply sustained damage and crowd control, allowing Skarner to chase down enemies or maintain pressure.
abilities.original_description: Skarner's Attacks, Shattered Earth, Upheaval, and Impale, apply Quaking. At max stacks of Quaking, enemies take max Health magic damage over its duration.

abilities.name: Shattered Earth / Upheaval
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Shattered Earth (First Cast):** Skarner slams his tail, dealing damage in a cone and slowing enemies hit. **Upheaval (Second Cast):** Skarner can recast this ability to detach one of his Impale crystals, creating a damaging shockwave.

*   **Usage:** This is a linear skillshot for Shattered Earth, used offensively for damage and crowd control, while Upheaval provides an area-of-effect damage and utility by creating a crystal hazard.
abilities.original_description:
Skarner rips a boulder from the earth that empowers his attacks and can be thrown as a powerful projectile. Skarner rips a boulder from the ground, empowering his next 3 Attacks with {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed and dealing {{ abilitydamage }} physical damage to surrounding enemies. His final Attack will deal an additional {{ maxhppercent*100 }}% max Health physical damage and Slow affected foes by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }}s.

Recast: Skarner ends this Ability and throws his boulder, dealing {{ spell.skarnerq:abilitydamage }} + {{ spell.skarnerq:maxhppercent*100 }}% max Health physical damage, and additionally Slowing the first enemy hit and any other surrounding enemies by {{ spell.skarnerq:slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ spell.skarnerq:slowduration }}s.

abilities.name: Ixtal's Impact
abilities.mechanics_description: Skarner unleashes a seismic slam in a line, dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. This ability functions as a linear skillshot with offensive and utility purposes, used to initiate fights, chase targets, or disengage.
abilities.original_description:
Skarner charges forward and passes through terrain. If he collides with a champion or large monster, he'll slam them into the next wall he hits to damage and stun them. Skarner charges forward, steering toward the chosen direction and ignoring terrain. If he runs into a champion or large monster, Skarner drags them along for the rest of his charge.

Colliding into a wall with an enemy in tow deals {{ pindamage }} physical damage to the enemy and Stuns them for {{ stunduration }}s.

Skarner can Recast this Ability to end his charge early.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.mechanics_description: Impale is a **point-and-click** skillshot that Skarner **dashes** to a target enemy champion, suppressing them and dealing damage. He then **drags** the suppressed target with him for the duration, functioning as both an **offensive** initiation tool with crowd control and a powerful **utility** pick-off ability.
abilities.original_description:
Skarner's tails lash forward to suppress enemy champions. Once suppressed, the victims will be dragged along by Skarner as he moves around. Skarner's tails lash forward, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage and Suppressing the first 3 champions he hits for {{ duration }}s. Those hit are dragged along by Skarner for the duration of this Ability.

If Skarner hits at least one champion he gains {{ speedboostamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ speedboostduration }} seconds.

If Shattered Earth is active, Skarner will cast Upheaval first.

abilities.name: Seismic Bastion
abilities.mechanics_description: **Seismic Bastion (W)** is a self-cast ability that grants Skarner a shield and applies a debuff to nearby enemies after a brief channel. It is used defensively to absorb damage and offensively to position for further engagements, as the shield allows Skarner to survive incoming damage and potentially activate his spire buff.
abilities.original_description: Skarner gains a shield and creates an earthquake whose shockwave damages and slows foes. Skarner gains <shield>{{ initialshield }} Shield</shield> for {{ shieldduration }}s and triggers an earthquake that deals <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> nearby enemies by {{ sloweffect*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }}s.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.mechanics_description: Mirror Image is a passive ability that LeBlanc uses defensively. When LeBlanc's health drops below a certain threshold, she briefly becomes invisible and summons a static illusion of herself that mimics her abilities. This illusion distracts and misleads enemies, allowing LeBlanc a chance to reposition or escape.
abilities.original_description: When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Sigil of Malice
abilities.mechanics_description: Sigil of Malice is a skillshot that LeBlanc throws in a straight line, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and applying a mark. This mark detonates if the target is hit by another LeBlanc ability or basic attack within a few seconds, dealing a burst of additional magic damage.
abilities.original_description:
LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage. If either part kills the target, Leblanc refunds the Mana cost and part of this spell's remaining Cooldown. LeBlanc projects a sigil to an enemy, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage and marking them for {{ markduration }} seconds.

Damaging the marked enemy with an Ability detonates the sigil, dealing {{ markdamage }} magic damage.

If either part kills the target, Leblanc refunds {{ manarefund*100 }}% of the Mana cost and {{ cooldownrefund*100 }}% of this spell's remaining Cooldown.

The initial sigil deals an additional {{ bonusminiondamage }} damage to minions.

abilities.name: Distortion
abilities.mechanics_description: LeBlanc's W - Distortion is a targeted dash that allows her to quickly reposition herself to a targeted location, leaving behind a spectral image at her starting position. This ability is primarily used for repositioning, engaging, disengaging, and setting up her deceptive combos by creating an illusion.
abilities.original_description:
LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location. LeBlanc dashes then deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies. For {{ e3 }} seconds after dashing, LeBlanc can Recast.

Recast: LeBlanc returns to her starting location.

abilities.name: Mimic
abilities.mechanics_description: LeBlanc's ultimate, Mimic (R), is a point-and-click ability that allows her to cast an empowered version of her last used basic ability (Q, W, or E). It is used offensively for burst damage and/or to apply additional crowd control, effectively doubling the impact of her other spells.
abilities.original_description:
LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells. LeBlanc mimics her most recent Ability, using it again. The mimicked Ability deals increased damage.

Mimicked Sigil of Malice deals {{ rq1damage }} magic damage when applied, and {{ rq2damage }} magic damage when consumed.
Mimicked Distortion deals {{ rwdamage }} magic damage.
Mimicked Ethereal Chains deals {{ re1damage }} magic damage when shackled and {{ re2damage }} magic damage when Rooting.

abilities.name: Ethereal Chains
abilities.mechanics_description: **Ethereal Chains (E)** is a skillshot that LeBlanc throws in a target direction, dealing damage and marking the first enemy hit. If the marked enemy remains within range for a short duration, the chains will snap, dealing additional damage and **rooting** them. This ability is primarily used for **offensive CC (root)** to set up further damage or to peel for herself defensively.
abilities.original_description:
LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage. LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit, dealing {{ initialdamage }} magic damage and granting True Sight.

If they remain shackled for {{ e3 }} seconds, LeBlanc Roots them for {{ e4 }} seconds and deals an additional {{ delayeddamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Get Excited!
abilities.mechanics_description: "Get Excited!" is a passive ability. When Jinx gets a takedown on an enemy champion or destroys an enemy turret, she gains a significant movement speed and attack speed buff, encouraging aggressive repositioning and extended combat.
abilities.original_description: Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.

abilities.name: Switcheroo!
abilities.mechanics_description: Jinx's "Switcheroo!" (Q) is a **toggle** ability on a short cooldown that allows her to switch between her Pow-Pow (Minigun) and Fishbones (Rocket Launcher) attack modes. Pow-Pow grants increased attack speed for rapid damage, while Fishbones deals splash damage in a cone, making it useful for both offensive wave clear and engaging multiple targets.
abilities.original_description:
Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower. Jinx swaps weapons between Fishbones the rocket launcher and Pow-Pow the minigun.

While using the rocket launcher, Jinx's Attacks deal {{ rocketdamage }} physical damage to the target and nearby enemies, gain {{ rocketbonusrange }} range, cost Mana, and scale {{ rocketaspdpenalty*100 }}% less with bonus Attack Speed.

While using the minigun, Jinx's Attacks grant Attack Speed for {{ minigunattackspeedduration }} seconds, stacking up to {{ minigunattackspeedstacks }} times (+{{ minigunattackspeedmax }}% %i:scaleAS% max).

abilities.name: Flame Chompers!
abilities.mechanics_description: Flame Chompers! is a deployable trap skillshot that Jinx throws in a target direction. Enemies who step on a placed chomper are rooted and take magic damage, making it a powerful tool for zoning, setting up kills, or escaping.
abilities.original_description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place. Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that last for {{ grenadeduration }} seconds. They explode on contact with enemy champions, <status>Rooting</status> them for {{ rootduration }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Zap!
abilities.mechanics_description: Jinx's Zap! is a linear skillshot fired from her Fishbones cannon that slows enemies hit and deals magic damage. It's primarily used offensively to poke, secure kills, or set up engages with the slow, but can also be used defensively to create distance by slowing pursuers.
abilities.original_description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it. Jinx fires a shock blast that deals <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit, <status>Slows</status> them by {{ slowpercent }}%, and reveals them for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
abilities.mechanics_description: Super Mega Death Rocket! is a global linear skillshot that Jinx fires in a chosen direction, dealing significant damage to the first enemy champion hit. If it misses a champion or travels its maximum distance, it explodes, damaging all enemies in an area, with damage increasing based on distance traveled.
abilities.original_description:
Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health. Jinx fires a rocket that explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{ damagefloor }} to {{ damagemax }} + {{ percentdamage }}% missing Health physical damage, gaining damage over the first second of travel time. Nearby enemies take {{ aoedamagemult*100 }}% Damage.

Missing Health damage cannot exceed {{ monsterexecutemax }} against Monsters.

abilities.name: Shield of Daybreak
abilities.mechanics_description: Shield of Daybreak is a point-and-click auto-attack enhancement. Leona deals bonus magic damage and stuns her target, and it can be used offensively for burst damage and crowd control.
abilities.original_description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target. Leona's next Attack <status>Stuns</status> for {{ e1 }} seconds and deals an additional <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }}</magicDamage> magic damage.

abilities.name: Zenith Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Zenith Blade is a linear skillshot that Leona throws in a target direction. Upon impact with an enemy champion, Leona dashes to them, dealing magic damage and **rooting** them for a short duration.
abilities.original_description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them. Leona thrusts with a sword of light, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage</magicDamage>. The last champion struck will be <status>Rooted</status> for {{ e2 }} seconds and Leona will dash to them.

abilities.name: Sunlight
abilities.mechanics_description: **Sunlight (Passive):** Leona's damaging abilities and empowered auto-attack mark enemies with Sunlight. Allied champions attacking a struck enemy consume the Sunlight debuff, dealing bonus magic damage. This passive is an auto-target effect triggered by Leona's other abilities and attacks, primarily used offensively to amplify allied damage output.
abilities.original_description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.mechanics_description: Eclipse (W) is an **auto-target** ability that Leona activates on herself. It grants her a **shield** after a brief delay and empowers her next three basic attacks with bonus **magic damage** and a **slow**.
abilities.original_description: Leona raises her shield to gain Damage Reduction, Armor, and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect. Leona raises her shield, reducing incoming damage by {{ flatdamagereduction }} and gaining {{ bonusarmortooltip }} Armor and {{ bonusmrtooltip }} Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds. Afterwards, her shield detonates, dealing {{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage to nearby enemies. If she hits at least one, she retains the Armor and Magic Resist bonuses for an additional {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.mechanics_description: Solar Flare is a circular skillshot that Leona targets at range, erupting into a damaging area of effect that **stuns** enemies caught in the initial blast and **dazzles** (slows) those on the edge. It is primarily used **offensively** for area crowd control and initiation, or **defensively** to peel for her team.
abilities.original_description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Leona calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing <magicDamage>{{ explosioncalculateddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ ccduration }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are <status>Stunned</status> instead of <status>Slowed</status>.

abilities.name: Ravenous Flock
abilities.mechanics_description: Ravenous Flock is a passive ability that doesn't have a direct cast. Instead, when Swain damages an enemy champion with one of his damaging abilities, it leaves behind a **Soul Fragment**. Collecting a Soul Fragment **heals** Swain and grants him **max health**, rewarding sustained ability usage in fights and poke for sustain.
abilities.original_description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health.

abilities.name: Death's Hand
abilities.mechanics_description: Death's Hand is a skillshot that Swain throws in a target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit. If it hits an enemy champion, Swain gains a Soul Fragment, empowering his next cast to pull enemies towards him.
abilities.original_description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by. Swain unleashes 5 eldritch bolts, dealing <magicDamage>{{ initialdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> plus <magicDamage>{{ extraboltdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> per bolt past the first (max <magicDamage>{{ maxdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>).

abilities.name: Demonic Ascension
abilities.mechanics_description: Demonic Ascension is a **channeled, self-cast ultimate** that Swain transforms into a demon, dealing **increasing magic damage over time** in a large area around him. It also provides him with **health regeneration** and significantly **reduces incoming damage**, allowing for prolonged engagements and teamfight presence.
abilities.original_description:
Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to decimate and slow nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire. This form is indefinite as long as Swain drains enemy champions. Swain frees the demon, which deals {{ damagecalc }} magic damage and drains {{ healingcalc }} Health per second from nearby enemies. His Demonic Energy depletes over time but can be recharged indefinitely by draining enemy Champions and is fully restored on Champion takedowns.

After {{ demonflarecastdelay }} seconds and every {{ demonflarecooldowntooltip }} seconds thereafter, Swain can cast Demonflare while transformed, which deals {{ demonflaredamagetotal }} magic damage and Slows enemies by {{ demonflareslowamount*100 }}%, decaying over {{ demonflareslowduration }}s.

abilities.name: Nevermove
abilities.mechanics_description: Swain's Nevermove (E) is a skillshot that travels in a straight line, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. Upon reaching its maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, it expands into a **circular vortex** that **roots** all enemies within its area for a duration.
abilities.original_description:
Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. Swain can then choose to pull all rooted champions closer. This ability has a shorter cooldown during Demonic Ascension. Swain launches a wave of demonic power that returns, detonating on the first enemy hit to deal {{ secondarydamage }} magic damage and Root enemies in the area for {{ rootduration }} seconds.

Rooting a champion allows Swain to reactivate this ability to pull all champions Rooted by Nevermove toward him, gaining a Soul Fragment for each.

abilities.name: Vision of Empire
abilities.mechanics_description: Visionary of Empire is a **circular skillshot** that Swain throws from his current location. It travels outwards a short distance, dealing damage and **charming** any champions hit.
abilities.original_description:
Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment. Swain opens a demon eye, revealing a location for 1.5 seconds, then deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slows by {{ slow*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Champions hit grant Swain a Soul Fragment and are revealed for {{ revealduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Twilight Assault
abilities.mechanics_description: Shen's **Twilight Assault (Q)** is a **point-and-click shadow dash** that deals damage to enemies in its path. It also applies a debuff to the impacted enemy champion, causing Shen's subsequent empowered auto-attacks to deal bonus magical damage.
abilities.original_description:
Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen. Shen recalls his Spirit Blade. Enemies hit by the pull are Slowed by {{ e4 }}% while moving away from Shen for the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Additionally, Shen's next {{ e3 }} Attacks deal an additional {{ baseflatdamage }} plus {{ basepercenthealth }} max Health magic damage. If Shen hit an enemy champion with the Spirit Blade, the damage is increased to {{ baseflatdamage }} plus {{ emppercenthealth }} max Health magic damage and he gains {{ e9 }}% Attack Speed for those Attacks.

abilities.name: Ki Barrier
abilities.mechanics_description: **Ki Barrier (Passive):** This is an auto-targeting, defensive ability. When Shen's *other* abilities hit an enemy, Ki Barrier grants him a personal shield that absorbs incoming damage.
abilities.original_description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

abilities.name: Spirit's Refuge
abilities.mechanics_description: Spirit's Refuge is a **self-cast ability** that creates a spirit standing at Shen's location. This spirit then **automatically taunts** all nearby enemy champions and grants both Shen and the spirit a **defensive shield**.
abilities.original_description:
Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked. Shen creates a defensive zone at his Spirit Blade for {{ e1 }} seconds. Attacks against allied champions in the zone are blocked.

If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, it will wait for up to {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Dash
abilities.mechanics_description: Shadow Dash is a linear skillshot where Shen dashes forward, dealing damage to enemies in his path and taunting them upon arrival. It is primarily used offensively to engage and crowd control enemies, though the taunt also provides a defensive utility by forcing opponents to attack Shen.
abilities.original_description:
Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path. Passive: Dealing damage with Twilight Assault or this Ability recovers {{ energyrefund }} Energy.

Active: Shen dashes, Taunting champions and jungle monsters for {{ ccduration }} seconds and dealing {{ tauntdamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Stand United
abilities.mechanics_description: Shen targets an allied champion, then dashes to their location after a brief channeling period, providing a global shield to allies in his path and upon arrival. This ability is primarily used defensively for global presence and saving allies from incoming damage during crucial moments.
abilities.original_description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location. Shen grants an allied champion anywhere on the map between <shield>{{ shield }}</shield> and <shield>{{ maxshield }} Shield</shield> based on their missing Health for {{ shieldduration }} seconds (max Shield at 60% missing Health). After channeling for {{ channelduration }} seconds, Shen teleports to his ally's location with his <keywordMajor>Spirit Blade</keywordMajor>.

abilities.name: Chomp
abilities.mechanics_description: Chomp is a **point-and-click auto-attack enhancement** that Trundle uses offensively. Upon activation, his next basic attack deals bonus physical damage and, if it kills the target, partially restores his **missing health**.
abilities.original_description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage. Trundle's next Attack deals <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and briefly <status>Slows</status> by {{ slowamount*100 }}%, then Trundle gains <physicalDamage>{{ bonusad }} Attack Damage</physicalDamage> for {{ sapdebuffduration }} seconds and the enemy loses <physicalDamage>{{ sappedad*-1 }} Attack Damage</physicalDamage> for the same duration.

abilities.name: King's Tribute
abilities.mechanics_description: Trundle's King's Tribute is an auto-target passive ability that applies a debuff to his enemy. When Trundle attacks a target afflicted with King's Tribute, he absorbs a percentage of their **maximum** health as a heal on himself. This ability is primarily used defensively to sustain Trundle during trades and extended fights.
abilities.original_description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

abilities.name: Subjugate
abilities.mechanics_description: Trundle's ultimate, Subjugate, is a point-and-click ability that targets a single enemy champion. It deals moderate magic damage and steals a significant amount of their **Armor** and **Magic Resist**, granting Trundle a temporary buff to his own defenses, making it a powerful offensive debuff and defensive buff.
abilities.original_description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled. Trundle drains the lifeforce of an enemy champion, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totalpercenthpdamage }} max Health magic damage</magicDamage> and stealing <scaleArmor>{{ armormrshred*100 }}% Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR> over {{ actualdurationofdrainbuff }} seconds.

abilities.name: Pillar of Ice
abilities.mechanics_description: Trundle's Pillar of Ice is a **linear skillshot** that travels a set distance, **slowing and damaging** enemies hit. It's primarily used for **utility**, creating zone control by blocking enemy movement and providing Trundle with a **speed boost** to chase or escape.
abilities.original_description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units. Trundle creates an icy pillar for {{ e1 }} seconds, briefly <status>Knocking Back</status> enemies directly over it and <status>Slowing</status> nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.

abilities.name: Frozen Domain
abilities.mechanics_description: Trundle's **Frozen Domain** (W) is an **auto-targeted, area-of-effect (AoE)** spell that creates a frosty zone around him for a duration. While standing within this zone, Trundle gains **bonus attack speed and movement speed**, making it a **buff** used both offensively to chase and deal more damage, and defensively to reposition or escape.
abilities.original_description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Move Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it. Trundle freezes an area for {{ e4 }} seconds. While inside he gains <speed>{{ e1 }}% Move Speed</speed>, <attackSpeed>{{ e2 }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed>, and {{ e3 }}% increased healing.

abilities.name: Burst Fire
abilities.mechanics_description: **Burst Fire (Q)** is a linear skillshot that Zeri fires in a straight line. It is primarily used offensively to deal damage, with multiple stacks of her passive building up for increased damage on subsequent hits.
abilities.original_description: Burst Fire shoots a burst of 7 rounds that deal attack damage to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack. Zeri fires a burst of {{ numberofmissiles }} rounds that deals <physicalDamage>{{ activedamagethatcancrit }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack.

abilities.name: Living Battery
abilities.mechanics_description: Living Battery is a passive ability. Zeri's next basic attack after using an ability becomes a **piercing skillshot** that deals **bonus magic damage** and **heals Zeri** for a percentage of the damage dealt. This allows Zeri to weave auto-attacks between her abilities for sustained damage and self-healing.
abilities.original_description: Zeri's Attacks deal magic damage and are treated as Abilities. Moving and casting Burst Fire stores up energy in Zeri's Sparkpack. When fully charged her next Attack deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Ultrashock Laser
abilities.mechanics_description: Zeri's Ultrashock Laser is a circular skillshot that detonates after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area. It's used offensively to damage and potentially chain stun multiple enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Zeri fires an electric pulse that slows and damages the first enemy hit. If the pulse hits a wall it expands into a long range laser. Zeri fires an electric pulse that deals {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and Slows the first enemy hit by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If the pulse hits terrain, it expands into a laser that applies the effects in an area and Critically Strikes champions and monsters.

abilities.name: Spark Surge
abilities.mechanics_description: Spark Surge is a **dash** that Zeri can use to aggressively reposition or defensively evade. While dashing, she can **auto-target** the nearest enemy Champion with an empowered basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and briefly **shielding** herself.
abilities.original_description:
Zeri dashes a short distance and energizes her next 3 shots of Burst Fire, causing them to pierce through enemies. She will vault and grind over any terrain she touches. Zeri dashes a short distance and vaults over any terrain she touches, greatly extending the dash range. For the next {{ buffduration }} seconds, her shots of Burst Fire pierce dealing {{ pendamagepercent*100 }}% damage to enemies after the first and an additional {{ bonusdamagetotal }} magic damage On-Hit to the first target struck.

Hitting an enemy champion with an Attack or Ability reduces this Ability's cooldown by {{ cdreductionperhit }} seconds. Critical strikes reduce the cooldown by {{ critcdreductionperhit }} seconds instead.

abilities.name: Lightning Crash
abilities.mechanics_description: Lightning Crash is an auto-targeted ultimate that Zeri channels, leaping into the air and then crashing down at her current location, dealing magic damage in an area and applying a stun. It is used offensively for significant damage and crowd control, ideally hitting multiple enemies to maximize its impact and proc her passive.
abilities.original_description:
Zeri discharges a nova of electricity and overcharges herself, gaining increased damage and stacking Move Speed that refreshes and gets stronger every time she hits an enemy champion. While overcharged, Burst fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains lightning between enemies. Zeri discharges a nova of electricity, dealing {{ totalactivedamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies. If she hits an enemy champion, Zeri gains {{ baseaspercent*100 }}% Attack Speed and {{ basebonusms*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ rduration }} seconds. Hitting an enemy champion with an Attack or Ability extends this ability's duration and adds a stack of Overcharge for {{ maxhyperchargeduration }} seconds. Critical strikes add 2 additional stacks. Each stack grants {{ mspercent*100 }}% Move Speed.

During this time, Burst Fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains {{ chainphysicaldamage }} physical damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Focused Resolve
abilities.mechanics_description: Focused Resolve is a skillshot that Karma fires in a line. Upon impact with an enemy, it deals damage and roots them, while simultaneously granting Karma a shield.
abilities.original_description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration. Karma tethers herself to a champion or jungle monster, dealing {{ initialdamage }} magic damage and revealing them for {{ tetherduration }}s. If the tether remains unbroken, the target takes {{ initialdamage }} magic damage again and is Rooted for {{ rootduration }}s.

abilities.name: Gathering Fire
abilities.mechanics_description: Karma's passive, Gathering Fire, empowers her basic attacks and abilities against enemy champions to generate "Inner Flame" stacks. Once a certain number of stacks are accumulated, her next basic ability will receive a bonus effect, consuming the stacks and enhancing its utility or damage.
abilities.original_description: Karma's damaging abilities will reduce the cooldown of Mantra.

abilities.name: Inner Flame
abilities.mechanics_description: Karma's Inner Flame (Q) is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage and slows enemies hit. If it strikes an enemy champion, Karma gains an Inner Flame blast that detonates after a short delay, dealing AoE damage.
abilities.original_description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay. Karma fires a blast of energy, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first target hit and surrounding enemies, and Slowing them by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.mechanics_description: Karma's Inspire is a linear skillshot that can be used offensively and defensively. It damages enemies in a line, and allies caught in the area gain a significant movement speed buff, making it excellent for engaging or disengaging.
abilities.original_description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions. Karma grants an allied champion {{ totalshield }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }}s and {{ movespeed*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ movespeedduration }}s.

abilities.name: Mantra
abilities.mechanics_description: Karma's Mantra (R) is an auto-targeting ability that empowers her next basic ability, enhancing its effects with bonus damage, duration, or area. It can be used offensively to amplify offensive spells like her Inner Flame or offensively/defensively with a spirit gain from her "Inspire" or "Renewal" for stronger shields or heals.
abilities.original_description:
Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point. Karma empowers her next Ability used within 8 seconds.
  • Inner Flame: Deals an additional {{ rqimpactdamage }} magic damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, Slowing enemies and dealing an additional {{ rqfielddamage }} magic damage.
  • Focused Resolve: Karma will restore {{ rwhealamount }} missing Health at the beginning and end of the tether, and Root for {{ rwbonusroot }}s longer.
  • Inspire: Karma shields her target for {{ rebonusshield }} more Shield, and also shields allies near her target, granting them {{ rebonusshieldarea }} Shield and {{ removespeed*100 }}% Move Speed.

abilities.name: Adaptive Defenses
abilities.mechanics_description: Adaptive Defenses is a passive ability that, after being **hit by an enemy champion's attack or ability**, grants Camille a shield against the **same damage type**. She can only gain this shield **once every few seconds** per attacker, and it switches between *physical* and *magic* damage resistance, allowing her to defensively position and mitigate incoming damage.
abilities.original_description: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to a percentage of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.

abilities.name: Tactical Sweep
abilities.mechanics_description: Tactical Sweep is a skillshot that Camille can cast twice. The first cast deals physical damage, while the second cast, if it hits the same target, deals bonus true damage and slows them.
abilities.original_description:
Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille. Camille winds up and slices, dealing {{ basedamagetotal }} physical damage.

Enemies hit by the outer half are Slowed by {{ slowpercentage }}% decaying over {{ slowduration }} seconds, and they take an additional {{ outeredgetooltip }} max Health physical damage. Camille restores {{ outerconehealingratio }}% of the bonus damage dealt to champions as Health.

abilities.name: Precision Protocol
abilities.mechanics_description: Precision Protocol is a **dash** that, upon landing, allows Camille to follow up with a **basic attack** that deals bonus damage. The first Q is a standard attack, while the second Q, cast within a short window, deals **significant bonus true damage** and is used offensively for burst damage.
abilities.original_description:
Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks. Camille's next Attack deals an additional {{ bonusdamage }} physical damage and grants her {{ msbonus*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ msduration }} second. This ability can be Recast in the next {{ qtotalrecasttime }} seconds.

If the Recast Attack hits at least {{ qrampuptime }} seconds after the first, the bonus damage is increased to {{ empoweredbonusdamage }} and {{ damageconversionpercentage }} of the Attack's damage is converted into true damage.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.mechanics_description: Hookshot is a directional skillshot that launches Camille forward. She can then recast it within a short timeframe to dash a second time, **both** towards a target location and to her ultimate range, allowing for offensive engages, gap closing, or defensive repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing. Camille fires a hookshot that attaches to terrain, pulling her to it for 1 second and allowing this Ability to be Recast.

Recast: Camille dashes from the wall, colliding with the first enemy champion hit. Upon landing, she deals {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to nearby enemies and Stuns enemy champions for {{ knockupduration }} seconds. Dashes towards enemy champions travel twice as far and grant {{ asbuff*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ asduration }} seconds on impact.

abilities.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
abilities.mechanics_description: Camille dashes forward a fixed distance, hooking onto the first enemy champion hit. She then launches a second, longer dash, dealing physical damage and applying a "Marked" debuff to all enemies within range, before returning to her starting position.
abilities.original_description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks. Camille briefly becomes Untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for {{ rduration }} seconds. Other nearby enemies are <status>Knocked Away</status>. Her Attacks against the trapped enemy deal an additional <magicDamage>{{ rpercentcurrenthpdamage }}% current Health magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Salvation
abilities.mechanics_description: Salvation is a passive ability that automatically heals Soraka and nearby allied champions when their health drops to a critical low. It doesn't require player input and is solely a defensive, reactive healing mechanism.
abilities.original_description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

abilities.name: Starcall
abilities.mechanics_description: Starcall is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and grants Soraka a small amount of movement speed. It is primarily used offensively to poke enemies from a distance and secure last hits, or defensively to escape when paired with her movement speed buff.
abilities.original_description:
A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health. Soraka calls down a star, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ movespeedslow*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Hitting an enemy champion grants Soraka Rejuvenation, which restores {{ totalhot }} Health over {{ hotduration }} seconds and grants {{ movespeedhaste*100 }}% Move Speed decaying over the same duration.

abilities.name: Astral Infusion
abilities.mechanics_description: Astral Infusion is a point-and-click targeted ability that drains a portion of Soraka's own health to **heal** an allied champion. It is primarily used **defensively** to sustain allies, making it a crucial tool for keeping them alive in lane and during teamfights.
abilities.original_description:
Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion. Soraka restores {{ totalheal }} Health to another allied champion.

If Soraka is affected by Rejuvenation, the Health cost will be reduced by {{ percenthealthcostrefund*100 }}%, and the target will gain Rejuvenation for {{ spell.sorakaq:hotduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Equinox
abilities.mechanics_description: Equinox is a skillshot that travels in a straight line, slowing and silencing any enemy champions hit. It is primarily used for utility, disrupting enemy engage or disengage and setting up for allies or Soraka's own follow-up abilities.
abilities.original_description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted. Soraka creates a starfield that deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to champions. The field lingers for {{ rootdelay }} seconds, <status>Silencing</status> enemies inside. When the zone disappears, champions inside the zone are <status>Rooted</status> for {{ rootduration }} second(s) and take <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Wish
abilities.mechanics_description: Soraka channels for a short duration and then unleashes a global **auto-target ultimate** that **heals** all allied champions across the map, prioritizing those with low health. This ability is primarily **defensive** but can be used offensively to sustain allies in fights far away, allowing Soraka to engage in trades or push lanes while still supporting her team.
abilities.original_description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions. Soraka calls upon divine powers, restoring <healing>{{ healingcalc }} Health</healing> to all allied champions, regardless of distance. Healing is increased to <healing>{{ ampedhealing }}</healing> on targets below 40% Health.

abilities.name: Ardent Blaze
abilities.mechanics_description: Ardent Blaze is a **linear skillshot** Lucian fires enemies. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it **damages** them and grants movement speed to Lucian and his closest allied champion, making it a tool for **offensive engagement and repositioning**.
abilities.original_description:
Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Move Speed for attacking marked enemies. Lucian fires a shot that explodes at the end of its range or on the first enemy hit, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage, briefly revealing enemies and marking them for 6 seconds.

When Lucian or an ally damages a marked enemy, Lucian gains {{ e2 }} Move Speed for 1 second. Allies triggering this effect will also grant Lucian Vigilance.

abilities.name: Piercing Light
abilities.mechanics_description: Lucian fires a piercing shot in a straight line, dealing magic damage to the first two enemies hit. This ability is a linear skillshot primarily used offensively to deal damage, secure kills through its extended range, and apply his passive for bonus attacks.
abilities.original_description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target. Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Relentless Pursuit
abilities.mechanics_description: Relentless Pursuit is a short-range dash that Lucian can use to reposition, dodging incoming abilities or closing the gap on enemies. It's a skillshot-based dash, meaning he targets a direction to move in, and its primary use is for offensive positioning to enable his auto-attack combos or for defensive evasion.
abilities.original_description:
Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown. Lucian dashes.

Cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} second whenever Lucian hits an enemy with Lightslinger ({{ e2 }} seconds for champions).

abilities.name: Lightslinger
abilities.mechanics_description: Lightslinger is Lucian's passive ability that triggers after he uses any ability. His next two basic attacks are then automatically performed as auto-targeting attacks, dealing bonus magic damage and having increased attack range. This passive enhances Lucian's damage output by allowing him to weave in extra shots after casting spells, benefiting offensive burst.
abilities.original_description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot. When Lucian is healed or shielded by an ally, or when a nearby enemy Champion is immobilized, his next 2 basic attacks will deal bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: The Culling
abilities.mechanics_description: Lucian channels the Culling into a fixed direction, firing a rapid volley of light shots that pierce through enemies. It's used offensively to deal significant single-target or area damage to enemies in a straight line, often to finish off opponents or clear waves.
abilities.original_description:
Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons. Lucian rapidly fires {{ totalnumshots }} shots in a direction for {{ duration }} seconds or until he Recasts. Each shot deals {{ damageperbullet }} physical damage to the first enemy hit.

While firing, Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit.

Total Damage: {{ totaldamage }} physical damage

abilities.name: Cursed Touch
abilities.mechanics_description: Amumu's passive, **Cursed Touch**, is an auto-target debuff applied when he hits an enemy with an ability. This debuff causes the affected target to take increased magic damage from all sources, making it a utility tool that amplifies Amumu's and his team's subsequent magic damage output.
abilities.original_description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.

abilities.name: Despair
abilities.mechanics_description: Despair is a toggle ability that Amumu activates to continuously damage enemies within a radius around him. It serves an offensive purpose by dealing sustained magic damage, and also applies a debuff that reduces enemy damage output.
abilities.original_description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed. <toggle>Toggle:</toggle> Amumu begins crying, dealing <magicDamage>{{ basedamage }} plus {{ totalhealthdamage }}% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> to nearby enemies every second and refreshing <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>.

abilities.name: Bandage Toss
abilities.mechanics_description: Bandage Toss is a skillshot that launches Amumu in the direction of the target, stopping and stunning him upon impact with an enemy champion, dealing magic damage. It is primarily used offensively to engage, lock down a target, and initiate a fight.
abilities.original_description:
Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them. Amumu launches a bandage, pulling himself to the first enemy hit, Stunning them for {{ e2 }} second, and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

This Ability has 2 charges.

abilities.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
abilities.mechanics_description: Amumu's Curse of the Sad Mummy (R) is a circular area-of-effect **skillshot that can be cast from Amumu's location**. It deals damage and applies a global taunt to all enemies within range, forcing them to attack Amumu, while also refreshing the duration of his Despair (W) debuff on them.
abilities.original_description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>, damaging and stunning them. Amumu flares out his bandages, <status>Stunning</status> for {{ rduration }} seconds, dealing <magicDamage>{{ rcalculateddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and applying <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>.

abilities.name: Tantrum
abilities.mechanics_description: Tantrum is an **AoE, circular skillshot** that deals magic damage to all enemies in a radius around Amumu. It's primarily used **offensively** to deal damage and apply his passive debuff, but can also be used defensively to clear minion waves for sustain or to proc Everfrost.
abilities.original_description:
Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced. Passive: Amumu takes {{ damagereduction }} reduced physical damage. Additionally, when Amumu is hit by an Attack, this Ability's Cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }} seconds.

Active: Amumu throws a tantrum, dealing {{ tantrumdamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Radiant Blast
abilities.mechanics_description: Kayle's Radiant Blast (Q) is a linear skillshot that launches a wave of fire, dealing magic damage and slowing the first enemy champion it hits. It's primarily used offensively to poke and secure kills from a distance, but the slow can also provide a brief defensive escape tool.
abilities.original_description: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit. Kayle fires a celestial sword that stops on the first enemy hit, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Slowing</status> by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds, and removing <scaleArmor>{{ shredpercent }}% Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR> for {{ shredduration }} seconds from the target and enemies behind them.

abilities.name: Celestial Blessing
abilities.mechanics_description: Kayle's W, Celestial Blessing, is an auto-target ability that heals Kayle and a nearby allied champion, and grants them bonus movement speed for a short duration. It is primarily a defensive and utility tool, allowing Kayle to sustain herself and her allies in lane or during engagements.
abilities.original_description: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants Move Speed to herself and the nearest ally. Kayle infuses herself and an allied champion with light, restoring <healing>{{ totalheal }} Health</healing> and granting <speed>{{ totalhaste }} Move Speed</speed> for {{ hasteduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Starfire Spellblade
abilities.mechanics_description: Starfire Spellblade is a point-and-click ability that Kayle empowers her next auto-attack with bonus magic damage, and if she has her ultimate active, it also slows the target. This ability is primarily used offensively to increase her damage output and can provide minor crowd control with her ultimate via the slow.
abilities.original_description:
Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.

Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health. Passive: Attacks deal an additional {{ epassivetotaldamage }} magic damage.

Active: Kayle's next attack becomes ranged and deals an additional {{ activetotalexecutedamage }} missing Health magic damage. This attack upgrades when Kayle reaches Level {{ spell.kaylepassive:levelforpassiverank2 }}, causing it to explode when it hits the target, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Divine Ascent
abilities.mechanics_description: Divine Ascent is not a traditional ability that is "hit" or "used" directly by the player. It's Kayle's passive ability that **automatically upgrades her form and attacks at specific levels**. This progression enhances her **offensive capabilities** by granting her increasing range, AoE damage, and bonus elemental effects on her auto-attacks, ultimately transforming her into a potent ranged damage threat.
abilities.original_description: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Move Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks.

abilities.name: Divine Judgment
abilities.mechanics_description: Kayle's **Divine Judgment (R)** functions as a targeted **area-of-effect (AoE)** spell. Upon casting, she becomes **invulnerable** and unleashes a radiant explosion around her, dealing **magic damage** to nearby enemies while granting **untargetable ally champions** within the radius a temporary **shield**.
abilities.original_description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords. Kayle makes an allied champion Invulnerable for {{ invulnduration }} seconds and then purifies the area around them, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Chilling Scream
abilities.mechanics_description: Chilling Scream is a **point-and-click** ability that Briar imbues into her next attack, dealing damage and applying a **chilling debuff** to enemies hit. This debuff **reduces their healing and mana regeneration**, making it a utility and offensive tool to weaken enemies and prevent them from sustaining themselves in combat.
abilities.original_description:
Briar refocuses her mind, removing Blood Frenzy and channeling energy into a powerful scream that damages and slows enemies. While charging, she takes reduced damage and heals for a portion of her max Health. A fully charged scream knocks foes back, dealing additional damage and stunning those who collide with a wall. Begin Charging: Briar removes Blood Frenzy and gathers energy, gaining {{ drpercent }}% damage reduction and restoring {{ percentmaxhpheal }} Health over 1 second.

Release: Briar unleashes a scream that deals up to {{ damage }} magic damage based on time charged, and Slows by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. When fully charged, the scream Knocks Back enemies, dealing {{ wallhitdamage }} magic damage to those who hit a wall and Stunning them for {{ wallstunduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Head Rush
abilities.mechanics_description: Briar's Head Rush (Q) is a **point-and-click dash** that deals magic damage to the target and any enemies hit by her subsequent leap back. It is used **offensively** to close distance, initiate fights, and quickly apply damage and a short stun.
abilities.original_description:
Briar leaps to a unit and hits enemies with The Heel Wheel (of Pain), stunning them and breaking their Armor. Briar leaps to a target, Stunning it for {{ stunduration }} seconds, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and reducing {{ shredpercent*100 }}% Armor and Magic Resist for {{ shredduration }} seconds.

Briar will stop prioritizing champions if she casts this Ability on a minion or monster during Blood Frenzy.

abilities.name: Blood Frenzy / Snack Attack
abilities.mechanics_description: Briar's W, **Blood Frenzy / Snack Attack**, is channeled by activating the ability, causing her to dash to a target enemy champion. It then becomes a toggle that consumes health to deal increasing damage to nearby enemies and heals Briar for a portion of the damage dealt. This ability is used offensively for sustained damage and self-healing during combat.
abilities.original_description:
Briar leaps forward and shatters her pillory, entering a Blood Frenzy that causes her to relentlessly pursue the nearest enemy (prioritizing champions). While frenzied, she gains increased Attack Speed and Move Speed, and her attacks deal damage in an area around her target.

Briar can reactivate this ability while frenzied to take a CHOMP out of her target on her next attack, dealing additional damage based on their missing Health, and healing Briar based on the damage she deals. Briar leaps and enters a Blood Frenzy, self-taunting to the nearest enemy for {{ berserkduration }} seconds, prioritizing Champions. While in Blood Frenzy she gains {{ berserkas*100 }}% Attack Speed and {{ berserkms*100 }}% Move Speed, and her Attacks deal {{ totalaoedamage }} physical damage to enemies surrounding her target.

Briar can Recast this Ability to empower her next Attack. It deals {{ totalattackbonusdamage }} + {{ totalattackpercentmissinghealth }}% missing Health physical damage and heals Briar for {{ attackmaxhpheal }} + {{ attackhealpercent*100 }}% of the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Crimson Curse
abilities.mechanics_description: Crimson Curse is Briar's passive ability, which **auto-targets** enemies after she hits them with an ability or her Hemmorhage stacks reach 3. It **deals magic damage** over time and heals Briar for a portion of the damage dealt, making it a core tool for both offensive pressure and sustain in extended fights.
abilities.original_description: Briar's attacks and abilities apply a stacking bleed that heals her for a portion of the damage it deals. Perpetually hungry, she gains increased healing based on her missing Health, but lacks innate Health Regeneration.

abilities.name: Certain Death
abilities.mechanics_description: Certain Death is a targeted dash that locks Briar onto a champion, making her unstoppable and dealing significant physical damage upon arrival. She can recast it to pull herself back to her starting location if the target is still within range.
abilities.original_description: Briar kicks her pillory's hemolith gemstone, marking the first champion it hits as her prey. She then beelines straight to them, fearing other surrounding enemies upon arriving at her target, and enters a state of complete hemomania. She will pursue her prey until death, gaining the benefits of Blood Frenzy as well as additional Armor, Magic Resistance, Life Steal, and Move Speed. Briar kicks her pillory's hemolith gemstone and flies to the location of the first champion it hits, marking them as her prey. On landing, she deals <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to everything nearby and causes enemies who are not her prey to <status>Flee</status> for {{ fearduration }} seconds. She then enters an empowered <keywordMajor>Blood Frenzy</keywordMajor> and will pursue her prey until death. During this time, she gains {{ totalresists }} <scaleArmor>Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR>, {{ lifestealpercent*100 }}% Lifesteal, and an additional <speed>{{ extramovespeedpercent*100 }}% Move Speed</speed>.

abilities.name: League of Draven
abilities.mechanics_description: **League of Draven (Passive):** This is an auto-target passive ability. Each time Draven catches one of his spinning axes, or kills a minion, monster, or champion, he gains bonus gold. This passive is used offensively to snowball gold advantages for more items and increased damage output.
abilities.original_description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

abilities.name: Spinning Axe
abilities.mechanics_description: Draven's Spinning Axe is a **skillshot** that, when cast, attaches to Draven's next auto-attack. It then **bounces** off the target to a new location, and if caught, Draven can **re-cast** it to throw another. This ability is primarily used **offensively** to amplify and chain his auto-attack damage, allowing for significant burst and sustained damage.
abilities.original_description:
Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once. Draven readies a Spinning Axe, causing his next Attack to deal an additional {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and ricochet into the air. If Draven catches it, he readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can hold two Spinning Axes at once.

abilities.name: Blood Rush
abilities.mechanics_description: Draven's Blood Rush (W) is an **auto-target buff**. Upon activation, Draven gains bonus Movement Speed and Attack Speed for a short duration, with the cooldown being significantly reduced if he catches one of his spinning axes. This ability is primarily used **offensively** to chase down enemies, position for follow-up axes, and amplify his overall damage output.
abilities.original_description:
Draven gains increased Move Speed and Attack Speed. The Move Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush. Draven becomes Ghosted, gains {{ e2 }}% Move Speed decaying over {{ e3 }} seconds and {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

When Draven catches a Spinning Axe, this Ability's Cooldown is refreshed.

abilities.name: Stand Aside
abilities.mechanics_description: **Stand Aside (E):** This is a **skillshot** projectile that Draven throws in a **linear** direction. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it deals damage, inflicts crowd control by **throwing them upwards and slightly to the side**, and then **fizzles out**.
abilities.original_description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed. Draven chucks a sideways axe that deals <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>, <status>Knocks Back</status>, and <status>Slows</status> by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.mechanics_description: Draven's ultimate, Whirling Death, is a global skillshot that sends two massive axes flying towards the target location, dealing damage to enemies they pass through. The axes will return to Draven after reaching their maximum range or hitting a champion, again dealing damage to enemies along their path and slowing them. This ability is primarily used offensively to secure kills from afar, finish off fleeing enemies, or engage in teamfights with high damage potential.
abilities.original_description:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction. Executes enemies who have less health than Draven's number of Adoration stacks. Draven hurls two massive axes that deal {{ rcalculateddamage }} physical damage. Upon hitting a champion or Recasting, they reverse direction and return to Draven. The axes deal {{ rdamagereductionperhit*100 }}% less damage for each enemy hit, down to a minimum of {{ rmindamagepercent }}%.

If Whirling Death would leave an enemy champion with less health than {{ rpassivestackscoefficient*100 }}% of Draven's current League of Draven stacks ({{ rpassivetruedamage }}), he will execute them.

abilities.name: Spectral Maw
abilities.mechanics_description: Viego launches a skillshot in a target direction that damages and briefly crowds control enemies hit, marked with a soul. He can then reactivate the ability to dash to a marked enemy, dealing additional damage.
abilities.original_description:
Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit. Begin Charging: Viego begins gathering Mist, Slowing himself by {{ selfslowpercent*100 }}%.

Release: Viego dashes forward and hurls the gathered Mist. Deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ stunduration }} to {{ maxstuntt }} seconds based on charge time.

abilities.name: Blade of the Ruined King
abilities.mechanics_description: Viego's Q, "Blade of the Ruined King", is a **skillshot** that he casts in a line in front of him. It deals damage to the first enemy hit and, if it strikes a champion, Viego can **strike again** shortly after with a bonus damage auto-attack that also heals him.
abilities.original_description:
Viego's spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current Health damage On-Hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an Ability, stealing Health.

Viego can activate this Ability to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him. Passive: Viego's Attacks deal an additional {{ totalpercenthealthonhit }} current Health physical damage. His first Attack against an enemy he has recently damaged with an Ability hits a second time, dealing {{ secondattackdamage }} physical damage and restoring {{ healmodvschamps*100 }}% of damage dealt as Health. These bonuses are kept during Possession.

Active: Viego stabs forward, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Sovereign's Domination
abilities.mechanics_description: Sovereign's Domination is a passive ability that triggers automatically when Viego defeats an enemy champion. Upon a takedown, Viego gains a temporary possession of the enemy's body, allowing him to cast their basic abilities, use their movement speed, and get one use of their ultimate ability.
abilities.original_description: Enemies who fall before Viego become wraiths.
