By attacking a wraith, Viego temporarily seizes control of the dead enemy's body, healing for a percentage of his target's max health and gaining access to their basic abilities and items. He replaces their Ultimate with a free cast of his own.

abilities.name: Harrowed Path
abilities.mechanics_description: Harrowed Path is a **skillshot** where Viego dashes a short distance in a target direction, leaving a spectral mist that deals damage and slows enemies who walk through it. It's primarily used **offensively** for trading, engaging, or disengaging by applying a debuff and CC.
abilities.original_description: Viego commands the Black Mist to haunt and surround a piece of terrain. Viego can hide in the Mist as a wraith, gaining camouflage, Move Speed, and Attack Speed. Viego sends forth a spectre to haunt the first terrain hit, surrounding it with Mist for {{ mistduration }} seconds. Viego gains <keywordStealth>Camouflage</keywordStealth>, <speed>{{ totalmovespeed }} Move Speed</speed>, and <attackSpeed>{{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> while inside the Mist.

abilities.name: Heartbreaker
abilities.mechanics_description: Viego's ultimate, **Heartbreaker**, is a targeted ability that he can cast if he dashes through an enemy champion he has recently damaged. It functions as a powerful offensive tool, dealing significant magic damage and knocking away all other nearby enemy champions.
abilities.original_description: Viego teleports to a nearby location and executes an enemy champion on arrival, piercing their heart and causing a destructive shockwave around them that knocks away their allies. Viego discards any souls he is currently <keywordMajor>Possessing</keywordMajor> and teleports. On arrival he Attacks the champion with the lowest percent Health, briefly <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% and dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} + {{ totalpercenthealth }}% missing Health physical damage</physicalDamage>. Other nearby enemies are <status>Knocked Back</status> and take <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>.

abilities.name: Dancing Grenade
abilities.mechanics_description: Dancing Grenade is a skillshot that bounces to up to four nearby enemies, dealing damage to each. It's used offensively to poke, clear waves, and burst down targets.
abilities.original_description:
Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills. Jhin launches a cartridge that deals {{ totaldamage }} physical damage before bouncing to a nearby enemy that has not been hit yet.

The cartridge can hit a maximum of {{ tooltipmaxtargetshit }} times. Enemies that die shortly after being hit increase the damage of subsequent hits by {{ percentamponkill*100 }}%.

abilities.name: Captive Audience
abilities.mechanics_description: Captive Audience is a targeted skillshot where Jhin throws a bouncing grenade that lands at a target location. It explodes after a short delay, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies in a small AoE, then bounces to two additional nearby enemies, dealing less damage with each bounce.
abilities.original_description:
Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse. Passive: Champions Jhin kills will create and detonate a Lotus Trap at their location.

Active: Jhin places an invisible Lotus Trap for {{ trapduration }} minutes that creates a zone that Slows by {{ trapslowamount*100 }}% when stepped on by an enemy. After {{ trapdetonationtime }} seconds, the trap detonates, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

This ability has 2 charges ({{ ammorechargeratetooltip }} second refresh).

abilities.name: Deadly Flourish
abilities.mechanics_description: Deadly Flourish is a linear skillshot that Jhin fires from his current position. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it deals damage and briefly roots them, allowing Jhin to follow up with his auto-attack for bonus damage.
abilities.original_description:
Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or damaged by Jhin, they are rooted. Jhin fires a long range shot dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to the first champion hit and other enemies along the way.

If this skill strikes a champion that has been damaged by an allied champion within the last {{ spottingduration }} seconds, it will Root them for {{ rootduration }} seconds and grant Jhin Whisper's Move Speed.

abilities.name: Whisper
abilities.mechanics_description: Jhin's Whisper is a passive ability that enhances his auto-attacks. He gains increased attack speed and critical strike chance from items and levels, but his attack speed is capped and converted into bonus damage. Upon landing a critical strike, Jhin also gains a burst of movement speed, adding offensive power and utility to his auto-attack focused kit.
abilities.original_description: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of Move Speed.

abilities.name: Curtain Call
abilities.mechanics_description: Curtain Call is a four-shot linear skillshot ultimate that begins with a short cast time. Each shot damages enemies in a line, with the fourth shot dealing significantly more bonus damage based on critical strike damage, making it a potent offensive zoning and execute tool.
abilities.original_description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike. Jhin sets up and channels, enabling him to fire 4 super shots, each dealing between <physicalDamage>{{ damagecalc }}</physicalDamage> and <physicalDamage>{{ maxincreasecalc }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first champion hit based on their percentage missing health and <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. The fourth shot critically strikes for {{ fourthshotmultiplier*100 }}% damage.

abilities.name: Crushing Blow
abilities.mechanics_description: Crushing Blow is a **dash** ability that Wukong uses **offensively** to deal damage and apply a debuff to his target. He can also use it **defensively** by casting it on an allied minion or monster to escape.
abilities.original_description:
Wukong's next attack gains attack range, deals bonus damage, and reduces the target's armor for a few seconds. Wukong and his Clone's next Attack gains {{ attackrangebonus }} range, deals an additional {{ bonusdamagett }} physical damage, and removes {{ armorshredpercent*100 }}% Armor for {{ shredduration }} seconds.

This Ability's cooldown is reduced by {{ cooldowndecrease }} seconds every time Wukong or his Clone hit an enemy with an Attack or Ability.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

abilities.name: Stone Skin
abilities.mechanics_description: Stone Skin is a passive ability that automatically grants Wukong bonus armor and magic resist when he has no allied champions nearby, and this bonus is reduced when he is near allies. It is used defensively, providing Wukong with increased durability when he is isolated or needs to tank damage alone.
abilities.original_description: Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.

abilities.name: Warrior Trickster
abilities.mechanics_description: Wukong's Warrior Trickster is a **dash** where he instantly **becomes untargetable and invisible** for a short duration while sending out a **clone** in the direction he was moving. This clone mimics his next basic attack, deals a small amount of damage, and can be used offensively for surprise attacks or defensively to dodge crucial enemy abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Wukong becomes Invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies. Wukong dashes and becomes Invisible for {{ stealthduration }} second, leaving behind a stationary Clone for {{ cloneduration }} seconds.

The Clone Attacks nearby enemies Wukong has recently damaged and will mimic his ultimate, each dealing {{ clonedamagemod*100 }}% of normal damage.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.mechanics_description: Cyclone is a circular AoE ability Wukong casts around himself that deals damage and knocks up enemies within the radius. Enemies hit by the initial cast and subsequent pulses are knocked up, providing crowd control and burst damage in teamfights.
abilities.original_description:
Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Move Speed.

Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up. Wukong gains {{ movespeed*100 }}% Move Speed and spins his staff, Knocking Up nearby enemies for {{ knockupduration }} seconds and take {{ totaldamagett }} plus {{ percenthpdamagett }} max Health physical damage over {{ spinduration }} seconds.

This Ability can be cast a second time within {{ recastwindow }} seconds before going on cooldown.

abilities.name: Nimbus Strike
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Nimbus Strike (E):** Wukong dashes a short distance to a target enemy, dealing magic damage and briefly slowing them. This ability can be cast on an enemy champion, minion, or monster.

**Mechanics and Usage:** Nimbus Strike is a **point-and-click dash** used for **offensive engagement** to deal damage and apply a self-buff that causes his next attack to strike multiple enemies. It is also used offensively as an **anti-flash tool** with its quick engagement range.
abilities.original_description: Wukong dashes to a targeted enemy and sends out images to attack enemies near his target, dealing damage to each enemy struck. Wukong dashes to an enemy, sending out Clones that mimic the dash to up to {{ extratargets }} additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. He and his Clone gain {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ attackspeedduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Handshake
abilities.mechanics_description: Renata Glasc's Handshake is a linear skillshot that deals damage and **roots** the first enemy champion hit, forcing them to walk slowly towards her. This ability is primarily used for **crowd control**, setting up engages or peeling for allies by displacing a dangerous enemy.
abilities.original_description:
Renata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction. Renata sends out a missile from her arm, Rooting the first enemy hit for {{ rootduration }} second and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Recast: Renata Pulls the enemy in a direction, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemies they are thrown into and Stunning for {{ stunduration }} seconds if the thrown enemy is a champion.

abilities.name: Bailout
abilities.mechanics_description: Bailout is a linear skillshot that deals damage and applies a brief movement speed buff to enemies hit. If an allied champion is hit instead, they receive a shield and increased movement speed.
abilities.original_description:
Renata buffs an allied champion to fight harder, delaying their death and potentially saving them if they get a takedown. Renata infuses an ally champion, granting {{ ascalc }} Attack Speed and {{ mscalc }} Move Speed towards enemies, increasing to {{ finalascalc }} Attack Speed and {{ finalmscalc }} Move Speed over {{ duration }} seconds. Takedowns refresh the duration of the buff.

If the ally would die, they instead return to full Health, which then decays over 3 seconds.

If they get a Takedown while decaying, they will be set to {{ triumphpercent }}% max Health and stop decaying.

The Champion's death can be delayed by healing or similar effects while in the decaying state, but cannot be prevented unless the Champion gets a Takedown. Champions can only delay their death once.

abilities.name: Loyalty Program
abilities.mechanics_description: Loyalty Program is a **skillshot** that Renata Glasc throws in a target direction, dealing damage and **applying a debuff** to enemies hit; enemies affected by the debuff will **prioritize attacking hostile targets**, effectively turning them against their own team. This makes the ability highly **offensive and utility-focused**, capable of disrupting enemy formations and creating kill opportunities.
abilities.original_description: Renata sends out a pair of chemtech missiles, shielding allies and damaging and slowing enemies hit. Renata sends out a pair of chemtech missiles, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> surrounding enemies and enemies hit by 30% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Allies hit gain <shield>{{ shieldcalc }} Shield</shield> for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Leverage
abilities.mechanics_description: Renata Glasc's passive, **Leverage**, is an auto-target ability. When Renata attacks an enemy champion with an ability, her next basic attack against that champion becomes a skillshot that marks them with **Leverage**. An ally who attacks a **Leveraged** enemy champion will deal bonus magic damage, consuming the mark and causing a small berserk effect on the target.
abilities.original_description: Renata's Attacks deal bonus damage and mark enemies. Renata's allies can damage marked enemies to deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Hostile Takeover
abilities.mechanics_description: Renata Glasc's Hostile Takeover is a linear skillshot that fires a projectile. Enemies hit are forced to attack their nearest ally violently, dealing damage and applying a charm debuff.
abilities.original_description:
Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, causing any enemies hit to go Berserk. Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, Berserking enemies for {{ berserkduration }} seconds, causing them to Attack the nearest unit, prioritizing their allies.

While Berserk, enemies gain {{ bonusattackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Fleet of Foot
abilities.mechanics_description: Sivir's passive, Fleet of Foot, is an **auto-target buff** that **reactively** grants her movement speed after hitting an enemy champion with an ability. This **utility** is primarily used **offensively** for chase and repositioning, or **defensively** to escape.
abilities.original_description: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Ricochet
abilities.mechanics_description: Sivir's Ricochet is a **skillshot** that launches a magical boomerang, dealing damage to the first enemy hit and then **bouncing to up to four additional enemies** behind it. It's primarily used **offensively** to clear waves, poke, and hit multiple targets in teamfights with its cleaving damage.
abilities.original_description:
Sivir's next few basic attacks gain additional attack speed and bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage while bouncing. For the next {{ buffduration }} seconds, Sivir gains {{ ricochetattackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed and her auto attacks are empowered to bounce to additional surrounding enemies dealing {{ bouncedamage }} physical damage each bounce for up to {{ maxbounces }} bounces.

These bounces critically strike if the attack generating them does.

abilities.name: Spell Shield
abilities.mechanics_description: Sivir's Spell Shield is a **skillshot** that creates a magical barrier around herself. It **defensively** blocks the next enemy ability and grants a burst of movement speed, allowing her to engage or disengage more safely.
abilities.original_description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives health and a burst of movement speed if a spell is blocked. Sivir creates a magical barrier for {{ e1 }} seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy Ability. If an ability is blocked, Sivir restores <healing>{{ totalheal }} health</healing> and triggers Fleet of Foot.

abilities.name: Boomerang Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Sivir's Q, Boomerang Blade, is a linear skillshot that travels outwards and then returns back to her. It's used offensively to deal damage to enemies in its path both going out and coming back, and can be used to farm safely or trade in lane.
abilities.original_description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way. Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }}</physicalDamage> to all enemies it cuts through. Hitting non-champions reduces the damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of {{ falloffminimum*100 }}%.

abilities.name: On The Hunt
abilities.mechanics_description: Sivir's ultimate, On The Hunt, is an auto-target buff that grants her and nearby allied champions greatly increased movement speed for a short duration, primarily used offensively to initiate fights or chase down enemies due to its movement speed and the ability for subsequent auto-attacks to apply On The Hunt's damage buff. It also provides a mild defensive benefit by allowing her to reposition quickly or escape unfavorable situations.
abilities.original_description:
Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge of Move Speed for a period of time. In addition, Sivir's attacks reduce her spell cooldowns. Sivir rallies her nearby allies, granting them {{ maxms*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ ultduration }} seconds.

Sivir's attacks against champions while On The Hunt reduce the cooldown of her basic abilities by 0.5 seconds.

Takedowns on recently damaged enemies refreshes the duration of the hunt.

abilities.name: Razor Shuriken
abilities.mechanics_description: Razor Shuriken is a linear skillshot that Zed throws in a chosen direction, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. It's primarily used offensively for poking, trading, and contributing damage in combos, especially after placing shadows to hit multiple targets.
abilities.original_description:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens.

Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit. Zed and his Shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and {{ passthroughdamage }} physical damage to each additional enemy.

abilities.name: Contempt for the Weak
abilities.mechanics_description: Contempt for the Weak is Zed's passive ability. When Zed attacks an enemy champion with an ability or his basic attack, he marks them. His next three basic attacks against this marked champion deal bonus magic damage and grant him increasing attack speed. This passive is used offensively to amplify Zed's damage output and is triggered by applying abilities or basic attacks to champions.
abilities.original_description: Zed's basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every few seconds against the same enemy champion.

abilities.name: Living Shadow
abilities.mechanics_description: Living Shadow is a linear skillshot ability where Zed throws a shadow that mimics his abilities. It's primarily used offensively to create harass opportunities and set up combos, but can also be used defensively for escape or repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow. Passive: Zed gains {{ e3 }} Energy whenever he and his Shadows strike an enemy with the same Ability.

Active: Zed's Shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for {{ e5 }} seconds. Recasting this Ability will cause Zed to switch positions with this Shadow.

abilities.name: Shadow Slash
abilities.mechanics_description: Shadow Slash is a circular skillshot that Zed throws, dealing damage to all enemies hit. Zed can reactivate it within a short window to perform the same attack from his shadow's current location, often used offensively to maximize damage output and clear waves.
abilities.original_description:
Zed and his Shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed. Zed and his Shadows slash, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's Cooldown by {{ shadowhitcdr }} seconds.

Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are Slowed by {{ movespeedmod*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but are Slowed by {{ movespeedmodbonus*-100 }}% instead.

abilities.name: Death Mark
abilities.mechanics_description: **Death Mark (R)** is a point-and-click ability that allows Zed to dash to a target enemy champion, leaving behind a Living Shadow identical to himself. After a short delay, this shadow detonates, dealing significant magical damage based on the damage Zed deals to the target while the mark is active. Zed uses Death Mark offensively for burst damage and to position himself to continue a damage rotation.
abilities.original_description:
Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked. Zed becomes Untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After {{ rdeathmarkduration }} seconds, the mark triggers, dealing {{ rcalculateddamage }} physical damage and repeating {{ rdamageamp*100 }}% of all damage dealt to the target by Zed while the mark was active.

The dash leaves a Shadow behind for {{ rshadowdurationdisplayed }} seconds. Zed can Recast this Ability to switch positions with this Shadow.

abilities.name: Feral Scream
abilities.mechanics_description: Feral Scream is a **cone-shaped skillshot** that deals magic damage and silences enemies hit in the area, preventing them from casting spells. It's primarily used **offensively** to disrupt enemy spellcasters and set up for further damage or crowd control.
abilities.original_description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds. Cho'Gath roars, <status>Silencing</status> enemies for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Vorpal Spikes
abilities.mechanics_description: Vorpal Spikes is a **cone-shaped skillshot** that deals damage to enemies hit. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal AoE damage, and at later ranks, it can also **slow enemies**, adding a utility component and aiding in engagement or disengagement.
abilities.original_description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him. Cho'Gath's next 3 Attacks launch spikes that deal <magicDamage>{{ flatdamagecalc }} plus {{ maxhealthpercentcalc }} of the target's max Health magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slow</status> by {{ slowamountpercentage }}%, decaying over {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.mechanics_description: Feast is a point-and-click ultimate that deals true damage to a target enemy champion, executing them if their health is below a certain threshold. Successfully consuming a target with Feast grants Cho'Gath a stack of his passive, increasing his maximum health.
abilities.original_description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health. Cho'Gath ravenously feeds on an enemy, dealing <trueDamage>{{ rdamage }} true damage</trueDamage> to champions or <trueDamage>{{ rmonsterdamage }}</trueDamage> to minions or jungle monsters. If this kills the target, Cho'Gath gains a stack, which causes him to grow in size and gain <healing>{{ rhealthperstack }} max Health</healing>. Only {{ rminionmaxstacks }} stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic jungle monsters.

abilities.name: Carnivore
abilities.mechanics_description: Carnivore is not a discrete ability that is activated. Instead, it is Cho'Gath's passive ability that **automatically** triggers and restores health whenever he **kills any unit**, enemy minions, monsters, or champions. This provides both sustain for laning and ramp-up combat longevity as Cho'Gath accumulates Feast stacks from champion kills.
abilities.original_description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.mechanics_description: Rupture is a **linear skillshot** that Cho'Gath hurls forward, **damaging enemies and knocking them up** if they are hit by the initial eruption around the target location. It's primarily used **offensively for damage and crowd control**, often to set up further attacks or disrupt enemy positioning.
abilities.original_description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them. Cho'Gath ruptures the ground, <status>Knocking Up</status> enemies for {{ e5 }} second, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage</magicDamage>, and <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Mana Barrier
abilities.mechanics_description: Mana Barrier is a passive ability that automatically grants Blitzcrank a shield when his health drops below a certain percentage. This shield's strength scales with his maximum mana, providing a significant defensive buff that utilizes his mana pool and helps him survive lethal damage.
abilities.original_description: Blitzcrank gains a shield based on their mana when dropping to low health.

abilities.name: Rocket Grab
abilities.mechanics_description: Rocket Grab is a linear skillshot that Blitzcrank fires in a direction. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it deals magic damage, briefly stuns them, and crucially, pulls them towards Blitzcrank, making it a primary offensive and utility tool for initiating fights or catching out isolated targets.
abilities.original_description: Blitzcrank fires their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them. Blitzcrank fires their right hand, <status>Pulling</status> the first enemy hit towards them and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.mechanics_description: Blitzcrank's W, Overdrive, is a self-buffing ability that **automatically targets him**, granting him a significant burst of movement speed and attack speed for a short duration. This ability is primarily used **offensively for engaging, chasing, or repositioning** during combat, though it leaves him slowed after the buff expires.
abilities.original_description:
Blitzcrank super charges themself to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. They are temporarily slowed after the effect ends. Blitzcrank supercharges themself, gaining {{ movespeedmod*100 }}% decaying Move Speed and {{ attackspeedmod*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ duration }} seconds.

Afterwards, Blitzcrank is Slowed by {{ movespeedmodreduction*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Power Fist
abilities.mechanics_description: Power Fist is an auto-target ability that empowers Blitzcrank's next basic attack. Upon landing, it deals bonus magic damage and briefly knocks the target up, serving as an offensive tool for burst damage and a disruptive crowd control effect.
abilities.original_description: Blitzcrank charges up their fist to make the next attack deal double damage and pop their target up in the air. Blitzcrank charges up their fist, causing their next Attack to <status>Knock Up</status> for {{ ccduration }} second(s) and deal <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>.

abilities.name: Static Field
abilities.mechanics_description: Static Field is a **toggle-based** ultimate that passively stores energy for each auto attack Blitzcrank makes. When activated, Blitzcrank **unleashes an area-of-effect shock** around himself that deals magic damage and **silences** enemies. It's primarily used offensively for burst damage and crowd control, with the passive component providing a small damage buffer during combat.
abilities.original_description:
Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly. Passive: While this ability is available, lightning charges Blitzcrank's fists, marking those Attacked. After 1 second, they are shocked for {{ passivedamage }} magic damage.

Active: Blitzcrank overcharges, dealing {{ activedamage }} magic damage and Silencing nearby enemies for {{ silenceduration }} seconds. Their shields are also destroyed.

abilities.name: Mystic Shot
abilities.mechanics_description: Mystic Shot is a linear skillshot that Ezreal fires. It deals damage to the first enemy hit and applies on-hit effects, making it his primary poke and damage tool.
abilities.original_description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit. Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ damage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit and reducing his Ability Cooldowns by {{ cdrefund }} seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Shift
abilities.mechanics_description: Arcane Shift is a targeted dash that Ezreal uses to reposition himself. It is primarily used defensively for evasion and kiting, but can also be used offensively to engage or follow up on enemy movements.
abilities.original_description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux. Ezreal teleports then fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. The bolt prioritizes enemies affected by <spellName>Essence Flux</spellName>.

abilities.name: Essence Flux
abilities.mechanics_description: Essence Flux is a narrow, linear skillshot that travels a medium distance. On impact with an enemy champion, it applies a debuff that marks them for 4 seconds; Ezreal's subsequent attacks and abilities hitting a marked champion deal bonus magic damage.
abilities.original_description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage. Ezreal fires a magical orb that sticks to the first champion, structure, or epic jungle monster hit for {{ detonationtimeout }} seconds. If Ezreal hits that target with an Attack or Ability, it detonates, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Detonating with an Ability refunds the Mana cost of that Ability plus <scaleMana>{{ manareturn }} Mana</scaleMana>.

abilities.name: Rising Spell Force
abilities.mechanics_description: **Rising Spell Force (Passive):** This is a stacking buff that triggers automatically when Ezreal successfully hits an enemy with any of his abilities. Each ability cast that hits an enemy grants Ezreal a stack of Rising Spell Force, increasing his attack speed for a short duration. This passive is used offensively to increase Ezreal's damage output by allowing him to weave in more auto-attacks between abilities.
abilities.original_description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

abilities.name: Trueshot Barrage
abilities.mechanics_description: Trueshot Barrage is a global, linear skillshot that Ezreal fires in target direction, dealing damage to all enemies hit. It's primarily used offensively to poke enemies from afar or secure kills on retreating targets, but can also be used defensively to clear waves or deter dives.
abilities.original_description: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters). Ezreal fires a massive energy arc that deals <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. The arc deals {{ damagereductionwaveclear.0*100 }}% damage to minions and non-epic jungle monsters.

abilities.name: Lucent Singularity
abilities.mechanics_description: Lucent Singularity is a skillshot that Lux throws in a target direction, which detonates after a short delay, dealing area damage and slowing enemies. It's primarily used offensively for damage and to apply CC, but can also be used defensively to zone enemies or create space.
abilities.original_description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect. Lux creates a light zone that <status>Slows</status> by {{ e1 }}% and reveals the area. After {{ e3 }} seconds or on <recast>Recasting</recast> this Ability, it detonates, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagett }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> for an additional {{ slowlingerduration }} second.

abilities.name: Light Binding
abilities.mechanics_description: Light Binding is a linear skillshot that travels a significant distance, rooting the first enemy champion it hits and dealing magic damage. It can be used offensively to initiate on targets or defensively to peel for allies by rooting an attacking enemy.
abilities.original_description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units. Lux fires a ball of light, <status>Rooting</status> the first two enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagett }} magic damage</magicDamage> to each.

abilities.name: Illumination
abilities.mechanics_description: Lux's passive, Illumination, is a debuff applied by her damaging abilities. When Lux detaches an ability that deals damage, she marks the target with Illumination for a few seconds. Enemies marked with Illumination take bonus damage from Lux's subsequent auto-attacks.
abilities.original_description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for a few seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

abilities.name: Prismatic Barrier
abilities.mechanics_description: Lux's Prismatic Barrier (W) is a linear skillshot that she throws in a target direction, **shielding herself and any allied champions it passes through**. The barrier then returns to Lux, **shielding allies again on the return trip**, making it a strong defensive and repositioning tool.
abilities.original_description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage. Lux throws her wand, granting <shield>{{ totalshieldtt }} Shield</shield> for {{ e3 }} seconds to allies it passes through. Then it returns, granting the same <shield>Shield</shield> on its return.

abilities.name: Final Spark
abilities.mechanics_description: **Final Spark (R)** is a long-range, linear skillshot that deals significant damage to all enemies hit in a straight line. It is primarily used offensively for burst damage and securing kills, and can also be used to finish off fleeing enemies or clear waves from a safe distance.
abilities.original_description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration. Lux fires a dazzling ray of light, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to all enemies in a line.

abilities.name: Unseen Threat
abilities.mechanics_description: **Unseen Threat (Passive):** Kha'Zix's next basic attack against an enemy champion becomes empowered after not being seen by an enemy for a short duration or while in brush. This empowered attack deals bonus magic damage and briefly slows the target, making it a key tool for initiating fights and bursting down isolated enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Nearby enemies that are Isolated from their allies are marked. Kha'Zix's abilities have interactions with Isolated targets.

When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Taste Their Fear
abilities.mechanics_description: **Taste Their Fear (Q):** This is a targeted ability that Kha'Zix uses by striking his target with his evolved claws. It deals significant physical damage, and its damage output is greatly amplified if Kha'Zix strikes an isolated target, making it his primary tool for offensive burst and assassination.
abilities.original_description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Reaper Claws</font>, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear. Kha'Zix slashes a nearby enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ spell.khazixq:basedamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>. This deals <physicalDamage>{{ spell.khazixq:isodamage }} damage</physicalDamage> instead to enemies <keywordMajor>Isolated</keywordMajor> from their allies.

abilities.name: Void Spike
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Spike is a skillshot that Kha'Zix throws in a target direction, dealing damage to enemies it passes through. It's primarily used offensively to deal poke damage and can be empowered by his ultimate for increased range and a second activation.
abilities.original_description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Spike Racks</font>, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets are slowed for extra. Kha'Zix fires a spike dealing <physicalDamage>{{ basedamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit in a small area. If Kha'Zix is inside the area, he restores <healing>{{ healamount }} Health</healing>

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.mechanics_description: Kha'Zix leaps to a target location, a targeted dash that deals damage to enemies in a small radius upon landing. This ability is primarily used offensively for engaging, chasing, or repositioning aggressively due to its damage and mobility.
abilities.original_description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist. Kha'Zix leaps, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> upon landing.

abilities.name: Void Assault
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Assault is a dash that Kha'Zix uses to teleport a short distance. It is primarily used offensively to reposition for attacks, chase targets, or escape after engaging, and Kha'Zix becomes untargetable during the dash.
abilities.original_description:
Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, Void Assault gains increased Invisibility duration, and an additional use. Active: Kha'Zix becomes Invisible for {{ stealthduration }} seconds and gains {{ bonusmovementspeedpercent*100 }}% Move Speed. Kha'zix may Recast this Ability once within {{ recastwindow }} seconds.

Passive: Leveling up this Ability allows Kha'zix to Evolve one of his Abilities, granting it additional effects.
  • Taste Their Fear: Gain Ability range, Attack range, and lowers Cooldown by {{ spell.khazixq:effect4amount }}% against Isolated targets.
  • Void Spike: Fires 3 spikes and Slows by {{ spell.khazixw:effect3amount }}%, increased against Isolated targets.
  • Leap: Increased range and refreshes Cooldown on champion takedown.
  • Void Assault: Invisibility duration lasts {{ evolvedstealthduration }} seconds and gains second Recast.

abilities.name: Bridge Between
abilities.mechanics_description: Bridge Between is not an ability for Udyr. Udyr's passive is called **Awakened Fury**. It is an auto-target passive that enhances Udyr's basic attacks after switching stances, granting bonus attack speed and empowering his next few auto-attacks to deal bonus magic damage.
abilities.original_description: Udyr has four basic Abilities that swap between Stances and can Recast an Ability to renew it with Ultimate benefits. Additionally, after using an Ability, Udyr's next two Attacks gain Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Blazing Stampede
abilities.mechanics_description: Blazing Stampede is an **auto-target dash** that Udyr can use offensively to quickly bridge gaps and deal damage, or defensively to reposition. Casting it grants a temporary movement speed buff and allows Udyr to **awaken** the ability for a second dash with knock-up crowd control and additional damage.
abilities.original_description:
Udyr gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even more movement speed and immunity to immobilizing effects for a couple seconds. Stampede Stance: Udyr gains {{ movespeed*100 }}% Move Speed, decaying over {{ movespeedduration }} seconds. Additionally, Udyr's Attacks dash him to the target and Stun for {{ stunduration }} seconds ({{ icd }} second Cooldown per target).

Awaken: Grants immunity to Immobilizing and Disabling effects and an additional {{ movespeedbonus }} Move Speed for {{ unstoppableduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Wilding Claw
abilities.mechanics_description: Udyr's Wilding Claw (Q) is an auto-attack reset that empowers his next two attacks to deal bonus magic damage and apply a debuff that increases subsequent damage taken by the target. It is used offensively to enhance Udyr's damage output during trades and all-ins.
abilities.original_description:
Udyr gains attack speed and his next two attacks deal bonus physical damage. Recast: Gain even more attack speed, and the next two attacks call lightning to strike the target. Claw Stance: Udyr gains {{ attackspeedbase*100 }}% Attack Speed and his Attacks deal {{ onhitdamage }} physical damage %i:OnHit% On-Hit for {{ attackspeeddurationbase }} seconds. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks in this stance deal a bonus {{ maxhponhit1 }} max Health physical damage and gain {{ attackrange }} range.

Awaken: Increase bonus Attack Speed to {{ empoweredtotalas }} and max Health damage to {{ q2totalonhithpdamage }}. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks call lightning six times, dealing a total of {{ empoweredlightningbonusmax }} max Health magic damage to isolated targets (strikes bounce to other nearby targets when possible).

abilities.name: Iron Mantle
abilities.mechanics_description: Iron Mantle is a stance switch for Udyr that, when activated, grants him bonus armor and magic resist. It functions as an auto-target ability that Udyr can trigger to enter a defensive state.
abilities.original_description:
Udyr gains a shield and his next two attacks heal him. Recast: Gain an even bigger shield and heal based on max health over the next couple seconds. Mantle Stance: Udyr gains {{ totalshield }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks gain {{ lifesteal*100 }}% Life Steal and restore {{ lifeonhit }} Health.

Awaken: Gain {{ recastshield }} Shield, restore {{ recastheal }} Health over {{ shieldduration }} seconds, and Udyr's next two Attacks instead have {{ lifesteal*200 }}% Life Steal and restore {{ lifeonhitawakened }} Health.

abilities.name: Wingborne Storm
abilities.mechanics_description: Wingborne Storm (R) is a channeled stance for Udyr that grants him increased attack range and causes his attacks to release a lightning AoE that deals damage and slows enemies. It is used offensively for sustained area damage and the slow provides utility for sticking to targets or peeling. Udyr activates this stance and then his basic attacks gain the storm effect.
abilities.original_description:
Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Recast: Empower and unleash the storm, causing it to track enemies and deal additional damage. Storm Stance: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm for {{ buffduration }} seconds, dealing {{ stormdamage }} magic damage per second to nearby enemies and Slowing them by {{ slowpotency*100 }}%. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks in this stance deal {{ pulsedamage }} magic damage to enemies in the storm.

Awaken: Unleash the storm, causing it to follow Udyr's last Attacked enemy, deal an additional {{ percenthpblast }} max Health magic damage over the duration, and Slow by an additional {{ empoweredslow }}.

abilities.name: The Relentless Storm
abilities.mechanics_description: Volibear's passive, **The Relentless Storm**, is an auto-target buff that empowers his next three basic attacks after casting an ability or receiving damage from an enemy champion. These empowered attacks deal bonus magic damage and briefly launch Volibear towards his target, allowing for offensive pressure and engaging.
abilities.original_description: Volibear's Attacks and abilities grant Attack Speed, and eventually cause his Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Thundering Smash
abilities.mechanics_description: Volibear's **Thundering Smash (Q)** is an **auto-attack reset and empowered auto-attack**. Upon activation, Volibear gains movement speed towards an enemy and his next attack deals bonus magic damage, briefly stunning the target. This ability is primarily used offensively for burst damage and to enable crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Volibear gains speed towards enemies, Stunning and damaging the first one he Attacks. Volibear gains {{ minspeedcalc }} Move Speed, doubled to {{ maxspeedcalc }} towards enemy champions for the next {{ duration }} seconds. While active, Volibear's next Attack deals {{ calculateddamage }} physical damage and Stuns the target for {{ stunduration }} second.

Volibear becomes enraged if an enemy Immobilizes him before he Stuns a target, ending the Ability early but refreshing its Cooldown.

abilities.name: Frenzied Maul
abilities.mechanics_description: Frenzied Maul is a point-and-click ability that Volibear uses offensively to deal damage and execute a target, consuming his own health to empower the attack. This makes him a strong duelist who can trade health for damage to secure kills.
abilities.original_description:
Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them. Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals Volibear. Volibear mauls an enemy, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and marking them for {{ markduration }} seconds.

If this Ability is used on a marked target, its damage is increased to {{ empowereddamage }} and Volibear restores {{ baseheal }} plus {{ percentmissinghealthhealingratio }} missing Health.

abilities.name: Sky Splitter
abilities.mechanics_description: Sky Splitter is a targeted ability that Volibear uses on an enemy, launching lightning from the sky that deals damage and slows the target. It's primarily an offensive tool used to initiate combat or finish off fleeing enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location, dealing damage and Slowing enemies while granting Volibear a Shield if he's inside the blast radius. Volibear summons a thundercloud that fires a lightning bolt, dealing {{ totaldamagetooltip }} plus {{ percentdamage*100 }}% max Health magic damage and Slowing by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If Volibear is inside the blast zone, he gains a {{ shieldapratiotooltip }} plus {{ shieldamount*100 }}% max Health Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Stormbringer
abilities.mechanics_description: Volibear's ultimate, Stormbringer, is a targeted dash that allows him to leap to a target enemy champion, regardless of vision. Upon arrival, he gains increased health and deals magic damage in an area around his landing spot, chaining lightning to nearby enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Volibear leaps to a target location, Slowing and damaging enemies beneath him while gaining bonus Health. Enemy towers near his landing location become temporarily disabled. Volibear transforms and leaps, gaining {{ healthamount }} Health and {{ bonusattackrange }} Attack Range for the next {{ transformduration }} seconds.

Upon landing, Volibear cracks the earth, Disabling nearby towers for {{ towerdisableduration }} seconds and dealing {{ towerdamagetooltip }} physical damage to them. Nearby enemies are Slowed by {{ slowamount*100 }}%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies directly underneath Volibear suffer {{ sweetspotdamagetooltip }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Soul Eater
abilities.mechanics_description: Nasus' passive, Soul Eater, automatically heals him for a percentage of the physical damage he deals with his basic attacks and abilities. This is an auto-target passive ability used for sustained offense and defense, providing him with significant lane sustain and survivability in combat.
abilities.original_description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

abilities.name: Siphoning Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: **Siphoning Strike (Q)** is a point-and-click auto-attack enhancer for Nasus. It deals damage and, crucially, permanently increases Nasus's attack damage by a small amount each time he successfully lands a kill with it, making it his primary tool for scaling and damage output.
abilities.original_description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target. Nasus' next Attack deals <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>. Killing an enemy with this Attack permanently increases its damage by {{ basicstacks }}, increased to {{ bigstacks }} against champions, large minions and large jungle monsters.

abilities.name: Wither
abilities.mechanics_description: Nasus targets a single enemy champion with a point-and-click ability. Wither applies a strong slow to the enemy's movement and attack speed and is primarily used for utility to debuff a key target in fights, allowing Nasus or his team to catch up or peel for themselves.
abilities.original_description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Move Speed and Attack Speed over time. Nasus ages a champion, <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ slowbase }}%, increasing to {{ maxslowtooltiponly }}% over {{ duration }} seconds. Their <attackSpeed>Attack Speed</attackSpeed> is also reduced by {{ attackspeedslowmult*100 }}% of the <status>Slow</status>.

abilities.name: Spirit Fire
abilities.mechanics_description: Nasus targets a ground location, causing spectral flames to erupt after a short delay, dealing damage to all enemies within the area. This ability is used offensively to deal sustained damage and kite enemies, as it applies a debuff that reduces their movement and attack speed.
abilities.original_description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it. Nasus ignites a spirit flame, dealing <magicDamage>{{ initialdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Enemies in the area lose <scaleArmor>{{ e2 }}% Armor</scaleArmor> and take <magicDamage>{{ totaldotdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> over {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Fury of the Sands
abilities.mechanics_description: Nasus's Fury of the Sands (R) is an auto-target ultimate that, when activated, grants him increased size, bonus damage, and lifesteal. It is primarily used offensively to increase his sustained damage and survivability in extended fights, and defensively as it provides a decaying shield upon activation.
abilities.original_description:
Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance. Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ bonushealth }} and Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ initialresistgain }}.

While the storm rages, nearby enemies take {{ damagecalc }} of their maximum Health as magic damage each second and Siphoning Strike has a {{ qcdr*100 }}% reduced Cooldown.

abilities.name: Tidal Wave
abilities.mechanics_description: Tidal Wave is a **linear skillshot** that Nami casts. It travels across the ground, damaging enemies and knocking them up, then slowing them.
abilities.original_description:
Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides. Nami summons a tidal wave, Knocking Up for 0.5 seconds, Slowing by {{ e4 }}%, and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. The duration of the Slow increases based on distance the wave traveled, up to {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

abilities.name: Aqua Prison
abilities.mechanics_description: Nami's Q, Aqua Prison, is a linear skillshot that travels a moderate distance and briefly stuns and damages the first enemy champion it hits. It's primarily used for crowd control and setting up trades or escapes.
abilities.original_description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact. Nami hurls a bubble, <status>Stunning</status> for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagett }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Surging Tides
abilities.mechanics_description: **Surging Tides (Passive):** Nami's basic abilities and her auto-attacks apply a buff to allied champions who are hit by them, causing their next movement towards Nami or from Nami to grant them bonus movement speed. This passive is applied automatically when her abilities or auto-attacks connect with an ally.
abilities.original_description: When Nami's Abilities hit allied champions they gain Move Speed for a short duration.

abilities.name: Ebb and Flow
abilities.mechanics_description: Ebb and Flow is a skillshot that **bounces** between allies and enemies, dealing damage to and healing from each subsequent target. It can be used offensively to damage enemies and poke, or defensively to heal allies and provide sustain in lane.
abilities.original_description:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies. Nami unleashes a stream of water that bounces between allied and enemy champions. Each champion can only be hit once, and it hits up to {{ maxtargets }} targets.
  • Restores {{ totalheal }} Health to allies and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.
  • Deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemies and will bounce to a nearby allied champion.
    The damage and healing value is modified by {{ bouncescaling }} each bounce.

abilities.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
abilities.mechanics_description: Nami's E, Tidecaller's Blessing, is an **auto-target buff** that can be cast on an ally champion or herself. When cast, Nami's next few ally basic attacks or abilities will **deal bonus magic damage** and **slow the target** on hit. This ability is primarily used **offensively** to empower an ally's damage output, making it effective for engaging or adding burst damage to trades.
abilities.original_description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks and spells deal bonus magic damage and slow the target. Nami empowers an allied champion's next {{ hitcount }} Attacks and Abilities for {{ buffduration }} seconds, causing them to <status>Slow</status> their targets by {{ totalslow }} for {{ slowduration }}s and deal an additional <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Moonsilver Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Moonsilver Blade is an auto-target passive that enhances Diana's next three attacks after casting an ability. These empowered attacks deal bonus magic damage and grant her bonus attack speed.
abilities.original_description: Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for an additional magic damage. After casting a spell, Diana gains Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Crescent Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Crescent Strike is a *linear skillshot* that Diana uses to execute *offensive damage* and apply her passive mark, setting up for further burst damage.
abilities.original_description:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds. Diana unleashes an arc of lunar energy, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and marking with Moonlight for {{ moonlightduration }} seconds.

Moonlight reveals enemies that are not stealthed.

abilities.name: Pale Cascade
abilities.mechanics_description: **Pale Cascade (W)** is an auto-targeted ability where Diana summons three orbs that orbit her. Enemies hit by an orb take magic damage, and the final orb to hit an enemy grants Diana a shield. It's used offensively for damage and burst, with the shield providing a significant defensive utility.
abilities.original_description:
Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength. Diana creates three orbiting spheres for {{ shieldduration }} seconds that explode on contact, each dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage, up to a max of {{ totalmaxdamage }} damage.

Diana also gains {{ shieldvalue }} Shield for the same duration. When the last sphere detonates, she gains an additional {{ shieldvalue }} Shield and refreshes the duration.

abilities.name: Moonfall
abilities.mechanics_description: Moonfall is a circular AoE skillshot that pulls all enemies within its radius towards Diana's current location after a short delay, dealing moderate magic damage. Diana can cast this from a distance, making it a tool for initiating fights, grouping enemies for follow-up abilities, or peeling for herself and her team.
abilities.original_description:
Diana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them.

If Diana pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled. Diana Pulls In, Slows by {{ slowtooltip }}%, and reveals nearby enemies for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If Diana hits at least one enemy champion, she calls to the moon, dealing {{ rexplosiondamage }} magic damage plus {{ rmultihitamplification }} for each champion pulled beyond the first, up to a max of an additional {{ maxdamage }} damage.

abilities.name: Lunar Rush
abilities.mechanics_description: Lunar Rush is a dash that Diana can use to move to a target enemy. If she hits an enemy with another one of her abilities first, the cooldown on Lunar Rush is significantly reduced, allowing for rapid subsequent dashes. This makes it a primary tool for engaging, chasing, and dealing damage.
abilities.original_description:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush. Diana becomes as the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. If the target is afflicted with Moonlight, this Ability's Cooldown is refreshed.

abilities.name: Noxious Slipstream
abilities.mechanics_description: Noxious Slipstream is Singed's passive ability. It is an auto-target ability that triggers when Singed casts a spell or uses an active item. Upon activation, Singed gains a burst of movement speed, allowing him to kite enemies or quickly disengage.
abilities.original_description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.

abilities.name: Mega Adhesive
abilities.mechanics_description: Singed's Mega Adhesive is a ground-targeted area-of-effect (AoE) ability that creates a sticky puddle. Enemies who walk into the adhesive are significantly slowed, making them vulnerable to Singed's pursuit and further spell casts.
abilities.original_description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it. Singed hurls a cask of sticky liquid, <status>Grounding</status> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies in the area by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ wduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Poison Trail
abilities.mechanics_description: Poison Trail is a **toggle** ability that Singed activates to leave behind a lingering line of poison. This poison deals damage over time to enemies who walk through it, making it a **utility** tool for zone control and sustained damage rather than an offensive burst ability.
abilities.original_description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path. <toggle>Toggle:</toggle> Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals <magicDamage>{{ damagepersecond }} magic damage</magicDamage> per second.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.mechanics_description: Singed's E, Fling, is a point-and-click ability that grabs the targeted enemy and throws them over his shoulder behind him. This ability is used offensively to displace enemies, often setting them up for Singed's poison trail or to disrupt their positioning.
abilities.original_description:
Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted. Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ basedamage }} plus {{ e3 }}% max Health magic damage.

If Singed flings a target into his Mega Adhesive, they are Rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Insanity Potion
abilities.mechanics_description: Insanity Potion is a **toggle** ability that Singed activates to empower himself. Upon activation, it grants him increased health regeneration, mana regeneration, movement speed, and tenacity for a duration, which is **used both offensively and defensively** to chase down enemies, escape danger, and sustain through fights.
abilities.original_description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds. Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ statamount }} <scaleAP>Ability Power</scaleAP>, <scaleArmor>Armor</scaleArmor>, <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR>, <speed>Move Speed</speed>, <healing>Health Regen</healing>, and <scaleMana>Mana Regen</scaleMana> for {{ duration }} seconds. During this effect, Singed's <spellName>Poison Trail</spellName> also applies {{ grievousamount*100 }}% Grievous Wounds for {{ grievousduration }} second.

abilities.name: Void Stone
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Stone is Kassadin's passive ability. It grants him magic resistance and reduces the cooldown of his other abilities. It's always active and doesn't require direct use from the player.
abilities.original_description: Kassadin takes reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

abilities.name: Null Sphere
abilities.mechanics_description: Kassadin's Q, **Null Sphere**, is a point-and-click ability that launches a projectile at a single enemy target, dealing magic damage and applying a silence debuff. It is primarily used offensively for trading and burst damage, with the silence providing a significant window to disrupt enemy spellcasting.
abilities.original_description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage. Kassadin fires an orb of void energy, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and interrupting channels. Kassadin also gains <shield>{{ totalshield }} Magic Shield</shield> for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Force Pulse
abilities.mechanics_description: Kassadin fires a linear skillshot that damages and slows enemies hit. This ability is primarily used offensively to deal damage and apply crowd control, often to kite enemies or secure kills.
abilities.original_description:
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him. Passive: Force Pulse's Cooldown is reduced by {{ reductionperspellcast }} second whenever any Ability is used near Kassadin.

Active: Kassadin unleashes a void pulse, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

abilities.name: Nether Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Nether Blade is an auto-attack reset that, when activated, causes Kassadin's next auto-attack to deal bonus magic damage and apply a debuff that reduces enemy magic resistance. It is used offensively to amplify his auto-attack damage and burst potential.
abilities.original_description:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana. Passive: Kassadin's Attacks deal an additional {{ onhitdamage }} magic damage.

Active: Kassadin charges his blade, causing his next Attack to deal {{ activedamage }} magic damage and restore {{ missingmanaratio }}% missing Mana, increased to {{ championmissingmanaratio }}% against champions.

abilities.name: Riftwalk
abilities.mechanics_description: Riftwalk is a short-range blink that Kassadin uses to instantly teleport a fixed distance in the direction he is facing. It's primarily used offensively to close gaps and deal damage, but can also be used defensively for repositioning or escaping, albeit at the cost of mana.
abilities.original_description:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage. Kassadin teleports to a nearby location, dealing {{ basedamage }} magic damage.

Each subsequent use of this Ability within the next {{ rstackduration }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ bonusdamage }} magic damage. The cost and damage increases can stack up to {{ maxstacks }} times.

abilities.name: 90 Caliber Net
abilities.mechanics_description: **90 Caliber Net (E):** This is a skillshot ability that fires a net in a line. It damages and slows the first enemy hit, while simultaneously pushing Caitlyn backward, creating distance and interrupting her own movement. It's primarily used defensively to escape engagement or offensively to set up further attacks by slowing a target.
abilities.original_description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back. Caitlyn fires a net, pushing her backwards. The net <status>Slows</status> the first target hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second and deals <magicDamage>{{ netdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.mechanics_description: Caitlyn's passive, Headshot, triggers after she has auto-attacked a target **four times**. Her **fifth auto-attack** becomes a special, empowered shot that gains **increased range** and deals **critical strike damage** (even if the base attack would not normally crit), making it an offensive tool for extended trades and punishing enemies.
abilities.original_description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

abilities.name: Ace in the Hole
abilities.mechanics_description: Ace in the Hole is a long-range, linear skillshot that Caitlyn channels to fire a bullet. It can be aimed by moving the cursor during the channel, and will pass through minions and monsters to hit the first champion it encounters, dealing high damage.
abilities.original_description:
Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally. Caitlyn takes a moment to channel and line up the perfect shot, then she fires, dealing {{ rtotaldamage }} physical damage, but other enemy champions can intercept it. This Ability grants True Sight of the target during the channel.

Deals up to an additional {{ critchanceamp*100 }}% based on Caitlyn's Critical Strike chance.

abilities.name: Piltover Peacemaker
abilities.mechanics_description: Caitlyn's Q, "Piltover Peacemaker," is a linear skillshot that fires a piercing bullet, dealing damage to all enemies in its path. It's primarily used offensively to deal damage, poke enemies from a distance, and can be angled slightly to hit a wider area or multiple targets.
abilities.original_description:
Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Caitlyn revs her rifle to fire a piercing shot dealing {{ initialdamage }} physical damage. After the bolt strikes the first target, it opens into a wider shot that deals {{ secondarydamage }} physical damage.

Enemies revealed by Yordle Snap Trap always take full damage.

abilities.name: Yordle Snap Trap
abilities.original_description: Caitlyn sets a trap that, when sprung, reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds, granting Caitlyn an empowered Headshot. Caitlyn sets a trap that <status>Roots</status> the first champion that steps on it for {{ e6 }} seconds and granting <keywordStealth>True Sight</keywordStealth> of them for 3 seconds. Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds, and {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once. This Ability has {{ e5 }} charges ({{ ammorechargetime }} second refresh).

abilities.name: Mortal Steel
abilities.mechanics_description: Mortal Steel is a linear skillshot that Yone dashes forward through. Hitting an enemy with the first cast marks them, and a second cast within a short window deals increased damage and grants a shield.
abilities.original_description:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward with a gust of wind knocking enemies Airborne. Yone thrusts forward, dealing {{ qdamage }} physical damage.

On hit, grants a stack for {{ buffduration }} seconds. At 2 stacks, this ability causes Yone to dash forward with a wave of wind that Knocks Up for {{ q3knockupduration }} seconds and deals {{ qdamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Way of the Hunter
abilities.mechanics_description: **Way of the Hunter (Passive):** Yone's next two attacks after using an ability deal bonus magic damage and grant him a movement speed buff. This passive functions as an auto-attack reset and an offensive buff, enhancing Yone's damage output and mobility after casting his other abilities.
abilities.original_description: Yone deals magic damage with every second Attack. In addition, his critical strike chance is increased.

abilities.name: Spirit Cleave
abilities.mechanics_description: Spirit Cleave is a **dash** that deals damage in a **cone** in front of Yone. It can be cast twice in quick succession, with the second cast dealing increased damage based on a percentage of a target's **missing health**.
abilities.original_description:
Cleaves forward, damaging all enemies in a cone. Grants a shield to Yone, the value is increased by the number of champions hit by the swipe.

Spirit Cleave's cooldown and cast time scale with attack speed. Yone cleaves forward, dealing {{ basedamage*0.5 }} + {{ maxhealthdamage*50 }}% max Health physical damage and {{ basedamage*0.5 }} + {{ maxhealthdamage*50 }}% max Health magic damage.

If Yone hits, he gains {{ wshield }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds. The amount of Shield increases for each champion struck.

abilities.name: Soul Unbound
abilities.mechanics_description: Yone's E, Soul Unbound, is a mobility-focused dash that allows him to briefly detach his spirit. Upon activation, Yone dashes forward, leaving his body behind and marking the first enemy champion hit. He can then freely move around for a short duration, and if he returns to his spirit form before the duration ends, he teleports back to his original body, dealing significant magic damage to all enemies in his path.
abilities.original_description:
Yone's spirit leaves his body behind, gaining Move Speed. When this ability ends, Yone's spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage he dealt as a spirit. Yone enters a spirit form for {{ returntimer }} seconds, leaving his body behind for the duration and gaining {{ startingms*100 }}% to {{ movementspeed*100 }}% ramping Move Speed.

When the spirit form ends, Yone snaps back to his body and repeats {{ deathmarkpercent*100 }}% of all Attack and Ability damage he dealt to champions during this time. You may Recast this ability during spirit form.

Recast: End spirit form early.

abilities.name: Fate Sealed
abilities.mechanics_description: Yone's R, Fate Sealed, is a **linear skillshot** that deals damage, knocks enemies airborne, and allows Yone to **dash** to the final target hit. It is primarily used **offensively** to initiate fights, chain crowd control with his other abilities, and secure kills.
abilities.original_description: Yone blinks behind the last champion in a line with a slash so powerful it pulls all enemies hit towards him. Yone strikes all enemies along a path for <physicalDamage>{{ tooltipdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <magicDamage>{{ tooltipdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, teleporting behind the last champion hit and <status>Knocking Up</status> victims towards Yone.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.mechanics_description: Annie's Incinerate (W) is a cone-shaped skillshot that deals magic damage to all enemies hit. It's primarily used offensively for area-of-effect damage and to quickly apply her passive stun to multiple targets.
abilities.original_description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area. Annie projects a wave of fire, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.mechanics_description: **Disintegrate (Q)** is a point-and-click magical damage projectile that refunds its mana cost and cooldown if it kills the target unit. Annie uses this ability offensively for poke, last-hitting minions, and to maximize burst damage, especially when empowered by her passive, Pyromania.
abilities.original_description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target. Annie hurls a fireball, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. If the target dies, Annie refunds the Mana cost and reduces the Cooldown by 50%.

abilities.name: Molten Shield
abilities.mechanics_description: Molten Shield is a self-cast ability that grants Annie a temporary shield absorbing damage and dealing magic damage to enemies who auto-attack her. It is used defensively to survive burst damage while offensively punishes aggressive attackers.
abilities.original_description:
Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells. Annie grants an ally champion {{ shieldblocktotal }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds and {{ movespeedcalc }} Decaying Move Speed for {{ movementspeedduration }} seconds. While the shield holds, enemies who hit the shielded ally with an Attack or Ability receive {{ damagereturn }} magic damage once per shield.

Tibbers always gains the effects of Molten Shield when summoned.

abilities.name: Pyromania
abilities.mechanics_description: Pyromania is Annie's passive ability. After casting **four spells**, Annie's next damaging ability will **disrupt** the target. This allows Annie to stun enemies for crowd control and burst damage.
abilities.original_description:
After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.

Annie begins the game and respawns with Pyromania available.

abilities.name: Summon: Tibbers
abilities.mechanics_description: Summon: Tibbers is a targeted ability that summons a controllable fire elemental, Tibbers, at a target location. Upon summoning, Tibbers deals area-of-effect damage and stuns nearby enemies, and can then be controlled by Annie to attack enemies or move.
abilities.original_description:
Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him. Passive: Annie gains {{ rpercentpenbuff*100 }}% Magic Penetration.

Annie summons her bear Tibbers, dealing {{ initialburstdamage }} magic damage. For the next {{ tibberslifetime }} seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for {{ tibbersauradamage }} magic damage per second.

Tibbers becomes enraged when summoned, if Annie stuns an enemy champion, and if Annie dies. When enraged, Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Move Speed decaying over 3 seconds.

Recast: Manually issue orders to Tibbers.

abilities.name: Tongue Lash
abilities.mechanics_description: Tongue Lash (Q) is a linear skillshot. It deals damage and slows enemies hit, and if it hits the same target three times in a short period, the third hit stuns them.
abilities.original_description:
Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion.

Applies a stack of An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they are stunned and the stacks are consumed. Deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit and Slows them by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

On champion hit, heals Tahm for {{ baseheal }} +{{ percenthealthhealing*100 }}% of his missing Health and applies a stack of An Acquired Taste dealing {{ spell.tahmkenchpassive:totaldamage }} extra magic damage. If that champion already had 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they will also be Stunned for {{ stunduration }} seconds, consuming the stacks.

Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour enemy champions who already have 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste from a distance when you hit them.
