abilities.name: An Acquired Taste
abilities.mechanics_description: Tahm Kench's passive, **An Acquired Taste**, is an auto-target ability that applies a mark to enemy champions upon basic attacks. Hitting an enemy champion with three auto-attacks or abilities in quick succession consumes these marks, enabling Tahm Kench to use his **Devour** and **Tongue Lash** abilities in a more potent, empowered way.
abilities.original_description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of <spellName>An Acquired Taste</spellName>. At three stacks, he can use <spellName>Devour</spellName> on an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.mechanics_description: Tahm Kench's E, Thick Skin, is a point-and-click ability that converts a portion of damage he *takes* into grey health, which then heals him over time. This ability is primarily defensive, granting him survivability and sustain by converting incoming damage into a temporary health pool.
abilities.original_description:
Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat.

Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield. Passive: {{ greyhealthratio*100 }}% of damage Tahm Kench takes is stored by his Thick Skin, increased to {{ greyhealthratioenhanced*100 }}% if there are at least {{ enhancedthreshold }} nearby enemy champions. If Kench has not taken damage within {{ ooctimer }} seconds, Thick Skin will rapidly be consumed to heal Tahm for {{ greyhealthhealingratio }} of its value.

Active: Convert all your stored Thick Skin into a Shield, lasting {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Abyssal Dive
abilities.mechanics_description: **Abyssal Dive (W)** is a targeted dash that Tahm Kench uses to reposition himself. After a short delay, he dives to an enemy champion's location, dealing damage and knocking them up if they are an enemy. This ability is primarily used offensively to engage with crowd control or defensively to escape by targeting an ally.
abilities.original_description:
Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area. Dive down and then re-appear at target location, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Knock Up all enemies in an area for {{ knockupduration }} second. Hitting at least one enemy champion refunds {{ champrefund*100 }}% of the Cooldown and Mana cost.

Devoured allies can be taken along for the ride (but can always hop out early).

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.mechanics_description: Tahm Kench's Devour (R) is a point-and-click ability that allows him to **swallow** an enemy champion or ally, applying a **slow** and granting him incredible **mobility** (a boosted movement speed dash) while they are inside. He can then **spit** them out as a skillshot projectile, dealing damage and stunning enemies hit by the landing spot.
abilities.original_description:
Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds, dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally. Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds. He can Recast to spit them out.

Enemy Champions: Require 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste. Are devoured for up to {{ enemyduration }} seconds and take {{ basedamage }} (+{{ percenthpdamage }} of their Max Health) magic damage. Tahm Kench is Slowed by {{ slowamount*100 }}% and Grounded during this effect.

Ally Champions: Are devoured for up to {{ allyduration }} seconds and are granted {{ totalshield }} Shield which decays gradually after being spit out. Allies can also choose to exit early. Tahm Kench is Grounded during this effect, but can cast Abyssal Dive and gains {{ allyspeedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ allyduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Transcendent
abilities.mechanics_description: Transcendent is Syndra's passive ability. It buffs her other abilities at higher ranks, increasing their damage and cooldown reduction. Syndra's primary way of interacting with this passive is by leveling up her other abilities, as Transcendent itself has no cast or targeting method as it is a passive.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra collects Splinters of Wrath from gaining levels and damaging enemies which upgrade her abilities.

Dark Sphere: Syndra can hold an additional charge
Force of Will: Bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Increased width and slows all targets
Unleashed Power: Executes low health targets

abilities.name: Dark Sphere
abilities.mechanics_description: Syndra's **Dark Sphere (Q)** is a linear skillshot that conjures a dispelable Sphere that detonates on impact, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit. It is primarily used offensively for poke and to set up her other abilities by creating persistent Spheres on the ground.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers. Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. The Dark Sphere remains for {{ sphereduration }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other Abilities.

{{ spell.syndrapassive:q1upgradethreshold }} Splinters of Wrath: Syndra can store {{ upgrade1maxammo }} charges of Dark Sphere.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.mechanics_description: Force of Will is a targeted ability that Syndra uses to pick up and throw a Dark Sphere. It is primarily used offensively to deal damage and stun opponents after acquiring a sphere, or defensively to create distance/block projectiles.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Move Speed of enemies. Syndra grabs a Dark Sphere, enemy minion, or non-epic monster. She drags it with her and can Recast for up to 5 seconds.

Recast: Syndra hurls the object, dealing {{ throwdamage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ totalslowamount }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds.

{{ spell.syndrapassive:wupgradethreshold }} Splinters of Wrath: This Ability deals an additional {{ tooltiponlypassivebonuspercent }} true damage.

abilities.name: Scatter the Weak
abilities.mechanics_description: Scatter the Weak is a skillshot that Syndra fires in a target direction, damaging and briefly stunning the first enemy hit. Its primarily used offensively to initiate damage or CC, or defensively as a disengage tool.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned. Syndra projects a wave of force, Knocking Back enemies and Dark Spheres and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Dark Spheres that are pushed Stun enemies for {{ stunduration }} seconds and deal {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

{{ spell.syndrapassive:eupgradethreshold }} Splinters of Wrath: This Ability's width is increased and Slows enemies by {{ upgradedslowamount*100 }}% for {{ upgradedslowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Unleashed Power
abilities.mechanics_description: Syndra's Unleashed Power (R) is an auto-targeting ability that launches up to 7 Dark Spheres at an enemy champion, dealing significant magic damage. It is primarily used offensively for burst damage, allowing Syndra to quickly assassinate targets during fights.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres. Passive: Dark Sphere gains an additional {{ qhasteperrank }} Ability Haste for each rank of Unleashed Power.

Syndra draws on her full cataclysmic power, launching the 3 Dark Spheres orbiting her plus up to 4 more nearby at an enemy champion. Each Dark Sphere deals {{ damagecalc }} magic damage (max {{ maxdamagecalc }} magic damage).

{{ spell.syndrapassive:rupgradethreshold }} Splinters of Wrath: This Ability executes enemies below {{ upgradeexecutethreshold*100 }}% Health.

abilities.name: Iron Ambassador
abilities.mechanics_description: Iron Ambassador is a **passive** ability that automatically applies to Poppy's attacks and abilities after a short cooldown. It causes her next auto-attack to deal **bonus magic damage** in a small area around the target, useful for **offensive** zoning and maximizing trading potential.
abilities.original_description: Poppy throws her buckler that bounces off the target. Poppy can pick it up to gain a temporary shield.

abilities.name: Hammer Shock
abilities.mechanics_description: Hammer Shock is a linear skillshot that Poppy throws her hammer forward, dealing damage to enemies in its path and slowing them. The hammer then returns to Poppy, dealing damage again and briefly knocking aside any enemies it hits on its return path.
abilities.original_description:
Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay. Poppy smashes the ground, dealing {{ basedamage }} plus {{ healthdamagepercent }}% max Health physical damage and making the ground unstable.

The unstable area Slows enemies by {{ e3 }}% and erupts after {{ e4 }} second, dealing {{ basedamage }} plus {{ healthdamagepercent }}% max Health physical damage again.

abilities.name: Steadfast Presence
abilities.mechanics_description: Poppy activates Steadfast Presence, empowering her next attack to deal bonus magic damage and briefly slow enemies hit. This ability is a point-and-click empowered auto-attack used offensively to increase her burst damage and provide a minor crowd control effect.
abilities.original_description:
Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to gain Move Speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded. Passive: Poppy gains {{ bonusarmor }} Armor and {{ bonusmr }} Magic Resist. This bonus is doubled if Poppy is below {{ passiveempoweredhealthpercent*100 }}% Health.

Active: Poppy gains {{ e2 }}% Move Speed and projects a field around her for {{ e1 }} seconds that stops enemy dashes. Enemies who are stopped by the field are Grounded and Slowed by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ groundingduration }} seconds and take {{ interruptdamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Heroic Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Heroic Charge is a **linear skillshot** that Poppy uses to **dash forward**, dealing damage and **stunning** the first enemy champion hit by slamming them into terrain. If it hits an enemy unit not against terrain, they are simply knocked aside and take damage.
abilities.original_description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned. Poppy tackles an enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ tackledamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and carrying them forward. If Poppy tackles them into terrain, the enemy is <status>Stunned</status> for {{ e3 }} seconds and take an additional <physicalDamage>{{ tackledamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>.

abilities.name: Keeper's Verdict
abilities.mechanics_description: Poppy's Keeper's Verdict is a channeled skillshot that can be reactivated. The first cast sends out a wave that damages enemies, and the second cast, if timed correctly, allows Poppy to follow up with a powerful punch that knocks enemies airborne. This ability serves primarily as an offensive tool for damage and crowd control, often used to isolate targets or disrupt enemy formations.
abilities.original_description:
Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away. Begin Casting: Poppy begins charging her hammer for up to {{ channelmaxduration }} seconds, Slowing herself by {{ selfslow }}%.

Release: Poppy smashes the ground, creating a shockwave that deals {{ damage }} physical damage to the first champion hit and surrounding enemies, Knocks them Back towards their Nexus, and makes them Untargetable while they fly. The range and Knock Back distance increase with charge duration.

An uncharged swing deals {{ halfdamage }} physical damage and Knocks Up for {{ knockupdurationsnap }} seconds.

abilities.name: Perseverance
abilities.mechanics_description: Garen's Perseverance passive automatically regenerates health over time, with faster regeneration occurring while out of combat. This ability is used defensively to sustain Garen in lane and recover after trades or skirmishes.
abilities.original_description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.

abilities.name: Courage
abilities.mechanics_description: Garen's Courage (W) is an **auto-target** ability that grants him **damage reduction** and **Tenacity** for a short duration. He activates it reactively to mitigate incoming damage from champions and monsters, allowing him to survive trades or dives.
abilities.original_description:
Garen passively increases his Armor and Magic Resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration. Passive: Garen has {{ resistsfortooltip }} bonus Armor and {{ resistsfortooltip }} bonus Magic Resist. Killing units permanently grants {{ resistgainonkilltooltip }} resists, up to a max of {{ resistmax }}.

Active: Garen steels his courage for {{ drduration }} seconds, reducing incoming damage by {{ drpercent*100 }}%. He also gains {{ totalshield }} Shield and {{ upfronttenacity*100 }}% Tenacity for {{ upfrontduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Decisive Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Garen's Decisive Strike is a point-and-click ability that grants him a significant burst of movement speed and empowering his next auto-attack to deal bonus physical damage and silence the target. It is primarily used offensively to initiate combat, chase down enemies, and guarantee a quick burst of damage with the empowered auto-attack.
abilities.original_description:
Garen gains a burst of Move Speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them. Garen removes all Slowing effects on him and gains {{ movementspeedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ movementspeedduration }} second(s).

His next Attack Silences for {{ silenceduration }} seconds and does {{ totaldamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.mechanics_description: Judgment is a channeled spin that Garen uses to deal damage to nearby enemies. He can move while spinning, applying damage and a silence to any enemies caught within its radius.
abilities.original_description:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. Garen rapidly spins his sword for {{ duration }} seconds, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage {{ f1 }} times over the duration. The nearest enemy takes {{ nearestenemybonus*100 }}% increased damage. Champions hit by {{ stackstoshred }} strikes lose {{ shredamount*100 }}% Armor for {{ shredduration }} seconds.

Recast: Garen ends this Ability early.

abilities.name: Demacian Justice
abilities.mechanics_description: Garen's Demacian Justice (R) is an **auto-target ultimate** that deals significant **single-target magic damage** to a chosen enemy champion. This ability is solely used **offensively** for burst damage, and its damage output is amplified if the target is marked as the "Villain."
abilities.original_description: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion. Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to slay his enemy, dealing <trueDamage>{{ basedamage }} plus {{ executedamage*100 }}% missing Health true damage</trueDamage>.

abilities.name: Audacious Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Audacious Charge is a targeted dash that allows Xin Zhao to lunge towards an opponent and knock them up. This ability is primarily used offensively for engaging, dealing damage, and disrupting enemies, but can also be used defensively to escape or reposition.
abilities.original_description:
Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, gaining increased Attack Speed and dealing damage to all enemies in the area, slowing them briefly. This Ability gains increased range against Challenged targets. Xin Zhao charges an enemy, dealing {{ chargedamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by {{ baseslowamount }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Xin Zhao also grants himself {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This Ability's range is increased on enemies that are Challenged.

abilities.name: Determination
abilities.mechanics_description: Xin Zhao's passive, Determination, is an auto-target ability. Each third consecutive basic attack or ability cast on the same target marks them and deals bonus magic damage, while also healing Xin Zhao for a percentage of his missing health, making it a tool for extended trades.
abilities.original_description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

abilities.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
abilities.mechanics_description: Xin Zhao's **Wind Becomes Lightning (W)** is a **three-hit combo**. The first two attacks are auto-attack resets that deal bonus physical damage, while the third attack knocks the target airborne. It is primarily used **offensively** for sustained damage and to initiate or extend a fight with crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies and marking them as Challenged. Xin Zhao slashes, dealing {{ slashdamage }} physical damage, then thrusts, dealing {{ thrustdamage }}. Enemies hit by the thrust are Slowed by {{ e6 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Champions and Large Monsters hit by the thrust are marked as Challenged for {{ markduration }} seconds and revealed unless Stealthed.

abilities.name: Three Talon Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Three Talon Strike is a combo-based, self-cast ability that activates on a short delay, launching three rapid auto-attack resets that deal damage. It's primarily used offensively for burst damage and to quickly apply on-hit effects.
abilities.original_description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air. Xin Zhao's next 3 Attacks deal an additional {{ bonusdamage }} physical damage and reduces his other Ability's Cooldowns by 1 second. The third Attack also Knocks Up for {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Crescent Guard
abilities.mechanics_description: Xin Zhao's Crescent Guard (R) is an **auto-targeting** ability that **dashes** him towards a target, dealing moderate damage and knocking aside nearby enemies. It also grants him a **shield** that scales with his bonus AD, making it a **both** offensive and defensive tool for initiation and survivability.
abilities.original_description:
Xin Zhao passively challenges an enemy he damaged recently. When activated, Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back, becoming impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created. Passive: The last champion Xin Zhao damaged with an Attack or Audacious Charge is Challenged for {{ markduration }} seconds.

Active: Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ totaldamage }} plus {{ percentcurrenthealthdamage*100 }}% current Health physical damage and Knocks Back all non-Challenged enemies.

Afterwards, Xin Zhao becomes immune to damage from enemies outside the sweep range for {{ missiledefensebaseduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: We Are More
abilities.mechanics_description: Naafiri's passive, "We Are More," is an **auto-target** mechanic where successive attacks from Naafiri and her pack deal bonus damage. This effect is **offensive**, used to amplify her sustained damage output and trading potential in lane and in skirmishes.
abilities.original_description: Naafiri spawns packmates that attack the targets of her attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Darkin Daggers
abilities.mechanics_description: Darkin Daggers is a **two-part skillshot** that Naafiri throws forward. The first cast deals damage and applies a bleed; the second cast, if it hits a champion or elite monster, marks them and allows Naafiri to **dash** through them, dealing damage again. This ability is primarily for **offense**, providing damage, burst potential, and a repositioning tool to stick to targets or escape.
abilities.original_description:
Naafiri hurls up to two daggers, each inflicting bleed, or each inflicting bonus damage if the target is already bleeding.

Packmates leap to attack the first champion or monster hit by this skill.
Naafiri hurls Darkin-tainted blades, dealing {{ spell.naafiriq:totaldamagefirstcast }} physical damage and inflicting a bleed, dealing {{ spell.naafiriq:totalbleeddamage }} physical damage over {{ spell.naafiriq:bleedduration }} seconds.

Naafiri can Recast this Ability. If enemies hit are already bleeding from this Ability, it instead deals the remaining bleed damage plus between {{ spell.naafiriq:totalmindamagesecondcast }} and {{ spell.naafiriq:totalmaxdamagesecondcast }} physical damage, based on their missing Health. If that target was a champion or large monster, Naafiri restores {{ spell.naafiriq:totalhealsecondcast }} Health.

Packmates will leap at the first champion or monster hit and attack them for {{ spell.naafirip:packmatetauntduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: The Call of the Pack
abilities.mechanics_description: Naafiri targets a location, leaping to it and dashing through enemy champions, dealing damage and marking them. Her Packmates then leap to any marked enemies, attacking them as well.
abilities.original_description:
Naafiri becomes Untargetable and empowers her pack, spawning additional packmates and gaining increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.
Naafiri becomes Untargetable for {{ untargetableduration }} second and prepares to hunt, spawning {{ packmatestoadd }} additional Packmates and gaining {{ bonusad }} Attack Damage and {{ movespeedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ duration }} seconds.

Packmates become Untargetable and are recalled to Naafiri.

abilities.name: Hounds' Pursuit
abilities.mechanics_description: Naafiri's ultimate, Hounds' Pursuit, is a dash ability that targets a single enemy champion. Upon activation, Naafiri dashes to the target, dealing damage and knocking them back, while also summoning her pack to join the fight.
abilities.original_description:
Naafiri and her packmates dash at a champion, dealing damage. Naafiri reveals nearby enemies if she scores a takedown and can recast this Ability once. The second cast grants a shield. Naafiri dashes at an enemy champion, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and briefly Slowing them. Packmates become Untargetable and dash alongside Naafiri, dealing {{ packmatedamage }} physical damage per Packmate.

If Naafiri scores a Takedown within {{ takedownwindow }} seconds she reveals nearby enemies and can recast this Ability once. The second cast grants {{ shieldtotal }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.mechanics_description: Eviscerate is a **point-and-click skillshot** that lunges Naafiri forward to strike her target, dealing damage and slowing them. It can be used offensively for burst damage or defensively as a repositioning tool during combat.
abilities.original_description:
Naafiri dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them. Naafiri surges forward, dealing {{ totaldamagefirstslash }} physical damage, then explodes in a flurry of blades, dealing {{ totaldamagesecondslash }} physical damage.

Packmates become Untargetable and are recalled to Naafiri restoring 100% Health.

abilities.name: Deadly Venom
abilities.mechanics_description: Twitch's passive, **Deadly Venom**, is applied by his auto-attacks and abilities. Each application deals bonus magic damage over time, stacking further applications for increased damage.
abilities.original_description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.mechanics_description: Ambush is a targeted ability that Twitch activates to become invisible and gain a movement speed bonus. Upon exiting stealth (by moving, attacking, or casting, or after the duration ends), his next basic attack deals bonus damage. It is primarily used offensively for surprise engages and burst damage, or defensively for escaping and repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Move Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset. Twitch Camouflages and gains {{ e3 }}% Move Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. The Move Speed increases to {{ e3 }}% while near an enemy champion that can't see him. After exiting Camouflage, Twitch gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e6 }} seconds.

When an enemy champion dies while afflicted with Venom, this Ability's Cooldown is refreshed.

abilities.name: Venom Cask
abilities.mechanics_description: Venom Cask is a ground-targeted skillshot that creates a lingering poison cloud. Enemies within the cloud take periodic damage and are slowed, making it effective for zoning, area denial, and dealing sustained damage.
abilities.original_description:
Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target. Twitch hurls a cask that adds a stack of Deadly Venom to all enemies struck and leaves behind a toxic cloud that persists for {{ duration }} seconds.

Enemies that remain within the cloud are Slowed by {{ totalslowamount }}% and receive an additional stack of Deadly Venom each second.

abilities.name: Contaminate
abilities.mechanics_description: Twitch's Contaminate (E) is a skillshot that detonates at the target location, dealing damage and applying a poison debuff to all enemies hit. It is primarily used offensively to deal burst damage and secure kills, especially in conjunction with his passive, Deadliness (Q), which stacks his poison effects.
abilities.original_description:
Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases. Deals {{ basedamage }} physical damage to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom, plus an additional {{ physicaldamageperstack }} physical damage and {{ magicdamageperstack }} magical damage per stack of Deadly Venom.

Max Damage: {{ maxphysicaldamage }} physical damage and {{ maxmagicdamage }} magical damage.

abilities.name: Spray and Pray
abilities.mechanics_description: Spray and Pray is a point-and-click ultimate that significantly expands Twitch's auto-attack range and makes his attacks pierce through all enemies in a line. It is used offensively to deal massive sustained damage to multiple targets at extreme range, shredding both squishy champions and tankier targets.
abilities.original_description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path. Twitch unleashes his crossbow, gaining {{ bonusrange }} Attack Range and {{ bonusad }} Attack Damage, and causing his Attacks to become piercing bolts for {{ duration }} seconds. These bolts hit all enemies they pass through, but deal {{ falloffdamage*100 }}% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of {{ minimumfalloffdamage*100 }}% damage.

abilities.name: Triumphant Roar
abilities.mechanics_description: Triumphant Roar is Alistar's passive ability. When Alistar or an ally champion near him within a certain range takes damage, Alistar unleashes a small AoE heal around himself. This passive is automatically triggered by incoming damage and is used defensively to sustain Alistar and nearby allies in combat.
abilities.original_description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Headbutt
abilities.mechanics_description: Alistar's Headbutt (W) is a point-and-click ability that dashes him forward a short distance, dealing damage and knocking back his target. It's primarily used offensively to initiate fights, displace enemies, or set up combos with his Pulverize (Q), but can also be used defensively to push threats away.
abilities.original_description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back. Alistar rams into an enemy, <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Back</status> and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Pulverize
abilities.mechanics_description: Pulverize is a **point-and-click** ability that Alistar uses **offensively** to deal damage and **utility** by knocking up and stunning his target, in addition to knocking nearby enemies back. It's often combo'd with his Headbutt (W) to displace enemies and follow up with the stun.
abilities.original_description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air. Alistar smashes the ground, <status>Knocking Up</status> enemies for {{ knockupduration }} second and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Will
abilities.mechanics_description: Alistar's ultimate, "Unbreakable Will," is a **toggle** ability that, when activated, grants him a significant **damage reduction** buff and **immunity to crowd control** for its duration. It provides substantial **defensive utility**, allowing him to survive burst damage and remain engaged in fights or escape dangerous situations.
abilities.original_description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration. Alistar immediately cleanses all <status>Disabling</status> effects and takes {{ rdamagereduction }}% reduced damage for {{ rduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Trample
abilities.mechanics_description: Alistar's **Trample** (E) is a toggle ability that, once activated, allows Alistar to passively **auto-attack** an enemy. Each auto-attack on that target stacks **Trample**, and when the stack requirement is met, Alistar's next auto-attack deals bonus damage and **stuns** the target with a **point and click** effect. Trample is primarily used offensively for its damage and lockdown potential, enabling follow-up abilities and team coordination.
abilities.original_description:
Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them. Alistar begins trampling the ground, becoming Ghosted and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages a champion grants a stack.

At {{ e5 }} stacks, Alistar's next Attack against champions Stuns for {{ e6 }} second and deals an additional {{ attackbonusdamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Drakehound's Step
abilities.mechanics_description: Drakehound's Step is a passive ability for Ambessa that enhances her auto-attacks. After Ambessa uses an ability, her next auto-attack within a short window will automatically target an enemy, dealing bonus damage and launching them slightly forward. This ability is used offensively to empower her auto-attacks after casting other abilities, adding burst damage and minor crowd control.
abilities.original_description: Entering an attack or movement command while casting an ability will cause Ambessa to dash a short distance once the ability is cast, granting her next attack bonus range, damage, and attack speed, and refunding energy.

abilities.name: Cunning Sweep / Sundering Slam
abilities.mechanics_description: Cunning Sweep is a **skillshot** that Ambessa uses offensively to deal damage and apply a debuff. Sundering Slam, her **auto-target** follow-up, deals bonus damage and slows enemies struck by Cunning Sweep, making it a powerful **burst combo**.
abilities.original_description:
Ambessa sweeps her twin drakehounds in a semicircle in front of her, dealing bonus damage to enemies hit by the blades. Striking an enemy will transform the next cast of this ability for a short period of time, causing her to slam her twin drakehounds down in a line in front of her, dealing bonus damage to the first enemy hit. Cunning Sweep: Ambessa sweeps her blades forward, dealing {{ calc_damage_1_max }} + {{ calc_damage_1_percent_max }} max Health physical damage to enemies at the edge of the strike. All other enemies take {{ calc_damage_1_min_ratio }} damage. Striking an enemy readies a Sundering Slam.

Sundering Slam: Ambessa slams her blades down, dealing {{ calc_damage_2_max }} + {{ calc_damage_2_percent_max }} max Health physical damage against the first enemy hit. All other enemies take {{ calc_damage_2_min_ratio }} damage.

abilities.name: Repudiation
abilities.mechanics_description: Repudiation is a **self-cast ability** on Ambessa that grants her a temporary buff based on nearby enemy champions. It is used **defensively and for utility**, offering Ambessa a shield and potentially empowering her passive, providing survivability and offensive potential.
abilities.original_description: Ambessa gains a shield, briefly braces herself, and then slams the ground to damage nearby enemies. If she blocked any non-minion damage while bracing herself, this ability will deal increased damage. Ambessa gains <shield>{{ calc_shield }} Shield</shield> for {{ shield_duration }} seconds and braces herself for {{ buff_duration }} seconds. She then slams the ground, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ calc_damage_low }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to nearby enemies, which increases to <physicalDamage>{{ calc_damage_high }} physical damage</physicalDamage> if she braced herself from damage from an enemy champion, large monster, or structure.

abilities.name: Public Execution
abilities.mechanics_description: "Public Execution" is a linear skillshot that Ambessa fires in a target direction. Enemies hit take damage, with additional damage dealt to enemies below a certain health threshold, rewarding aggressive, finishing plays.
abilities.original_description:
Ambessa blinks to the farthest enemy champion in a line of her choosing and suppresses them upon her arrival. She then slams the enemy into the ground where they take damage and are stunned. Passive: Ambessa gains {{ armor_penetration*100 }}% %i:scaleAPen% Armor Penetration and her Abilities heal her for {{ calc_omnivamp }} of the damage she dealt.

Active: Ambessa becomes Unstoppable and blinks to the farthest enemy champion in a line, Suppressing the target for {{ suppress_duration }} seconds and then slamming them into the ground, dealing {{ calc_damage }} physical damage and Stunning them for {{ stun_duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Lacerate
abilities.mechanics_description: Lacerate is a linear skillshot; Ambessa swings her blade in a straight line, dealing damage and applying a bleed to enemies hit. Beyond raw damage, it provides a crucial mid-range poke and can be used to secure kills or soften targets before engaging.
abilities.original_description: Ambessa whips her twin drakehounds around herself, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Initiating Drakehound's Step from this ability causes her to strike a second time at the end of its dash. Ambessa whips her chains around, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ calc_damage_flat }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies by <status>{{ slow_amount*100 }}%</status>, which decays over {{ slow_duration }} second. Initiating <spellName>Drakehound's Step</spellName> from this Ability will trigger an additional strike.

abilities.name: Rebirth
abilities.mechanics_description: Anivia's passive, **Rebirth**, is an auto-target ability that activates when she dies. Instead of dying, she transforms into an egg and can regenerate health; if she survives for a duration, she is reborn. This ability is primarily defensive, acting as a lifeline that allows her a second chance to escape or re-engage.
abilities.original_description: Upon taking fatal damage, Anivia reverts to an egg and is reborn with full health.

abilities.name: Crystallize
abilities.mechanics_description: Crystallize is a linear skillshot that Anivia fires. Upon impact with a champion, enemy minion, or monster, or after traveling a set distance, it creates a wall of ice that blocks movement for a short duration. This ability is primarily used defensively to peel for herself or allies, or offensively to isolate targets for her team.
abilities.original_description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts. Anivia summons a wall of ice {{ e2 }} units wide. The wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds before it melts.

abilities.name: Flash Frost
abilities.mechanics_description: Flash Frost is a linear skillshot that Anivia fires in a target direction. It deals magic damage and slows enemies hit, with the projectile exploding on the first target struck, damaging and stunning all enemies in a small area around it.
abilities.original_description:
Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area. Anivia fires a massive chunk of ice, dealing {{ totalpassthroughdamage }} magic damage and Chilling enemies for {{ slowduration }} seconds, Slowing them by {{ spell.glacialstorm:slowamount }}%. At the end of its range, the ice detonates, Stunning enemies for {{ stunduration }} seconds and dealing {{ totalexplosiondamage }} magic damage.

Anivia can Recast this ability while the ice flies to detonate it early.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.mechanics_description: Frostbite is a skillshot that, upon hitting an enemy, applies a debuff that makes them vulnerable to subsequent Anivia abilities. When Anivia hits a Frostbite-afflicted target with another one of her damaging abilities, the target is stunned. This allows Anivia to chain her abilities for significant damage and CC.
abilities.original_description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing damage. If the target was recently hit by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled. Anivia blasts an enemy with a freezing wind, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Against <keywordMajor>Chilled</keywordMajor> enemies, Anivia deals <magicDamage>{{ empowereddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> instead.

abilities.name: Glacial Storm
abilities.mechanics_description: Glacial Storm is a **circular AoE skillshot** that can be reactivated to end prematurely. It provides **sustained damage and slows** to all enemies within its radius, making it a potent zoning and area denial tool.
abilities.original_description:
Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance. Toggle: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail that Slows enemies by {{ slowamount }}% and deals {{ totaldamagepersecond }} magic damage per second. The storm increases in size over {{ growthtime }} seconds.

When the storm is fully formed, it Chills, Slows by {{ slowpercentempoweredtt }}%, and does {{ empowereddamagepersecondtooltiponly }} magic damage per second instead.

abilities.name: Decimating Smash
abilities.mechanics_description: Decimating Smash is a **charged, linear skillshot** that Sion swings in a line, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Holding the charge increases the range and damage, making it a potent tool for **offensive engagement and crowd control**.
abilities.original_description:
Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned. Begin Charging: Sion charges a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds.

Release: Sion slams his axe down, briefly Slowing and dealing between {{ mindamagetotal }} and {{ maxdamagetotal }} physical damage based on charge time. If Sion charged for at least 1 second, enemies are Knocked Up and Stunned for between {{ basestuntime }} and 2.25 seconds based on charge time.

abilities.name: Roar of the Slayer
abilities.mechanics_description: Sion charges up and slams his axe in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and knocking aside enemies **not** in the center. He can use it offensively for damage and to peel enemies with the knockback.
abilities.original_description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through. Sion fires a shockwave, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ slowamount }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds and removing <scaleArmor>{{ armorshred }}% Armor</scaleArmor> for {{ armorshredduration }} seconds. Non-champions hit are <status>Knocked Back</status>. Enemies hit by a <status>Knocked Back</status> unit take the same damage and effects.

abilities.name: Soul Furnace
abilities.mechanics_description: Soul Furnace is a point-and-click ability that Sion **charges up** to gain a shield and then **detonates** it for area damage. It's primarily used defensively for survivability and to deal splash damage on activation.
abilities.original_description:
Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health. Passive: Sion gains {{ hpperkill }} max Health when he kills a unit, or {{ hpperchampkill }} for champion takedowns, large minions and large monsters.

Active: Sion gains {{ totalshield }} Shield for 6 seconds. After {{ e7 }} seconds if the shield still holds, Sion can Recast to detonate the shield to deal {{ totaldamage }} plus {{ e4 }}% max Health magic damage.

abilities.name: Glory in Death
abilities.mechanics_description: Glory in Death's passive is an **auto-target** ability that activates upon Sion's death. It passively grants him a temporary health increase, and upon dying, he enters a **death state** where he can continue attacking and using abilities with bonus damage for a short duration. This allows for last-minute offensive plays or finishing off low-health enemies.
abilities.original_description: After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
abilities.mechanics_description: Sion's R is a linear skillshot that he charges up, gaining speed and the ability to steer, knocking aside and damaging enemies he collides with. It's primarily used offensively to engage, cover long distances quickly, and apply crowd control with knock-ups and knock-backs.
abilities.original_description:
Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged. Sion charges Unstoppably in a direction for 8 seconds, turning towards the mouse cursor. Sion stops on colliding with an enemy champion or wall or on Recasting this Ability.

At the end of the charge, Sion deals between {{ mindamagetotal }} and {{ maxdamagetotal }} physical damage based on distance travelled. Enemies close to Sion are Stunned for between {{ minstunduration }} and {{ maxstunduration }} seconds based on distance travelled. Enemies in a larger area are Slowed by {{ slowamount }}% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Stage Presence
abilities.mechanics_description: Stage Presence is a passive ability that triggers after Seraphine casts a basic ability, augmenting her next basic attack to deal bonus magic damage and increase its range. This allows her to extend her poke range and add extra damage following ability usage.
abilities.original_description: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.

abilities.name: Surround Sound
abilities.mechanics_description: Seraphine's Surround Sound (W) is a skillshot that targets an area, creating a shield for herself and nearby allies. If used again within a short window, it grants a burst of movement speed.
abilities.original_description:
Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well. Seraphine spurs her nearby allied champions in song, granting them {{ hastevalueallies }} Move Speed, herself {{ wmsbonustotal }} decaying Move Speed and both {{ shieldvalueseraphine }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

If Seraphine is already Shielded, she calls out to her allies to join her, restoring {{ wmissinghpheal }}% missing Health to them after a {{ whealsplitdelay }} second delay.

abilities.name: High Note
abilities.mechanics_description: Seraphine's High Note is a skillshot that travels in a line, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit. If it passes through another allied champion, its range is extended, and she can follow up with an auto-attack empowered by her passive to echo the ability's damage an additional time.
abilities.original_description: Seraphine deals damage in an area. Seraphine projects a pure note, dealing <magicDamage>{{ explosiondamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, increased against champions and monsters by the target's missing Health percentage up to <magicDamage>{{ totalempowereddamage }} damage</magicDamage> below {{ executethreshold*100 }}% Health.

abilities.name: Beat Drop
abilities.mechanics_description: Seraphine's Beat Drop (E) is a skillshot that can be cast again to charm enemies hit by the initial cast. Initially, it deals magic damage and slows enemies in a line; a second cast will cause those affected by the slow to be charmed, causing them to walk harmlessly towards Seraphine.
abilities.original_description:
Seraphine deals damage and impairs the movement of enemies in a line. Seraphine unleashes a heavy soundwave, dealing {{ finaldamage }} magic damage to enemies in a line and Slowing them by {{ slowvalue }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Enemies that are already Slowed are Rooted instead, and Immobilized enemies are Stunned.

abilities.name: Encore
abilities.mechanics_description: Seraphine's ultimate, Encore, is a **skillshot** (linear cone) that deals damage and **charms** all enemies hit, forcing them to move towards Seraphine. This charm extends through allies, allowing it to hit multiple targets and be used both offensively to engage and defensively to peel for herself and her team.
abilities.original_description:
Seraphine deals damage and charms enemies hit, refreshing the range with every allied or enemy champion hit. Seraphine takes the stage, projecting a captivating force that Charms for {{ rchannelduration }} seconds and deals {{ r1totaldamage }} magic damage.

Any champions struck (including allies) become part of the performance, extending the range of this Ability. Allied champions gain maximum Notes.

abilities.name: Alpha Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Alpha Strike is a point-and-click ability that allows Master Yi to become untargetable and dash to an area, striking up to three nearby enemies. It's primarily used offensively to deal damage and secure kills, while the untargetability offers a brief defensive window.
abilities.original_description:
Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown. Master Yi becomes Untargetable and teleports to rapidly strike enemies near his target, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to all enemies hit after {{ alphastrikebounces }} hits.

This Ability can strike the same enemy repeatedly if there are no other targets, dealing {{ subsequenthitmultiplier*100 }}% damage for subsequent hits ({{ subesquentdamage }}), for a maximum single target total of {{ singletotaldamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Double Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: **Double Strike** is a passive ability that automatically triggers on Master Yi's basic attacks. After attacking, Master Yi has a chance to perform a second, less damaging auto-attack immediately afterwards. This ability is used offensively to increase Master Yi's sustained damage output and burst potential in combat.
abilities.original_description: Every few consecutive basic attack, Master Yi strikes twice.

abilities.name: Wuju Style
abilities.mechanics_description: Wuju Style is an auto-target ability that Master Yi **toggles on** to imbue his auto-attacks with bonus true damage for its duration. It's primarily used offensively to increase his sustained damage output in extended trades and duels.
abilities.original_description: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks. Master Yi's Attacks deal an additional <trueDamage>{{ totaldamage }} true damage</trueDamage> for {{ duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Highlander
abilities.mechanics_description: Highlander is a self-buff activated by Master Yi. Upon activation, it grants him greatly increased movement and attack speed, and makes him immune to slows for its duration, allowing him to chase enemies, escape danger, or significantly ramp up his damage output in combat.
abilities.original_description:
Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Move Speed and Attack Speed as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist. Passive: Champion takedowns reduce the remaining Cooldown of Master Yi's basic Abilities by {{ rcooldownrefund*100 }}%.

Active: Master Yi enters a trance, gaining {{ rmsbonus }}% Move Speed, {{ rasbonus }}% Attack Speed, and immunity to Slows for {{ rduration }} seconds. Champion takedowns extend the duration of this Ability by {{ rkillassistextension }} seconds.

abilities.name: Meditate
abilities.mechanics_description: Meditate is a **channeled ability** that Master Yi activates to **heal himself** over time, making it primarily a **defensive** tool to sustain through fights or recover after engaging. During the channel, Master Yi gains significantly **damage reduction**, further enhancing its defensive utility.
abilities.original_description:
Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels. Master Yi channels, restoring {{ totalheal }} Health over {{ healduration }} seconds. This healing is increased by up to {{ maxmissinghealthpercent*100 }}% based on Master Yi's missing Health.

While channeling and for {{ drlinger }} seconds afterwards, he takes {{ initialdr }} reduced damage, decreased to {{ damagereduction*100 }}% after the first {{ initialextradrduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Radiant Volley
abilities.mechanics_description: Radiant Volley is a skillshot that Meli fires in a line, dealing damage to enemies hit. It is primarily used offensively to deal damage and apply pressure.
abilities.original_description:
Mel fires a barrage of projectiles that explode around a target location, dealing damage repeatedly to enemies within the area. Mel unleashes a barrage of {{ explosioncount }} projectiles that explode in the area around a target location.

Each explosion deals {{ totalexplosiondamage }} magic damage, adding up to {{ alldamagehit }} magic damage total.

abilities.name: Searing Brilliance
abilities.mechanics_description: Searing Brilliance is a passive ability for Mel. When Mel casts a spell, her next basic attack within a short window will consume its charge and deal bonus magic damage. This ability is used offensively to amplify Mel's damage output, particularly during short trade patterns or burst combos.
abilities.original_description:
Whenever Mel uses an ability, she gains three bonus projectiles (up to nine maximum) on her next attack.

When Mel deals damage through an ability or attack, she applies Overwhelm, which can stack infinitely. If the enemy is hit by Mel with enough Overwhelm damage, the stacks are consumed to execute the target.

abilities.name: Solar Snare
abilities.mechanics_description: Solar Snare is a **skillshot** that launches a projectile in a target direction. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it **roots** them and deals damage, applying a debuff that grants subsequent damage from Mel a bonus effect.
abilities.original_description:
Mel fires a radiant orb forward, rooting those at its center while the area around it slows enemies and deals damage over time. Mel fires a radiating orb, Rooting enemies at its center for {{ rootduration }} seconds and dealing {{ damage }} magic damage.

The orb builds up a hostile area around it that Slows enemies by {{ areaslowamount*100 }}% and deals {{ areadamagepersecond }} magic damage per second.

abilities.name: Rebuttal
abilities.mechanics_description: Mel's **Rebuttal (W)** is a **point-and-click** ability that deals damage and **silences** enemies in a small area around her target. It's primarily used **offensively** to follow up on engage or to disrupt enemy spellcasting, but can also offer a small defensive component by preventing enemies from using their abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Mel forms a barrier around herself that reflects enemy projectiles back at the attacker, prevents her from taking damage, and grants her movement speed. Mel forms a barrier around herself that reflects projectiles from enemy champions, prevents her from taking damage, and gives her {{ movespeed*100 }}% decaying Move Speed for {{ duration }} second(s).

Reflected projectiles deal {{ damagepercent }} original damage as magic damage.

abilities.name: Golden Eclipse
abilities.mechanics_description: **Mel's Golden Eclipse (R)** is a linear skillshot that Mel throws out. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it detonates, dealing significant magic damage and a brief stun to **Mel** and the primary target, while also creating a large, damage-over-time zone that heals allies within it.
abilities.original_description:
Mel strikes all enemies marked with Overwhelm regardless of their distance from her, dealing additional damage for each stack of Overwhelm.

Ranks of Golden Eclipse increase Overwhelm's damage. Passive: Overwhelm damage is increased to {{ passiveflatdamage }} magic damage plus {{ passivestackdamage }} magic damage per stack.

Active: Mel unleashes her power on all enemies affected by Overwhelm, dealing {{ ultflatdamage }} magic damage plus {{ ultstackdamage }} magic damage per Overwhelm stack.

Can only be cast when an enemy champion is affected by Overwhelm.

abilities.name: New Destiny
abilities.mechanics_description: New Destiny is a point-and-click mechanic tied to Graves' auto-attacks. Each auto-attack consumes a charge of "Grit" and deals bonus magic damage, with the damage increasing based on his Crit Damage stat.
abilities.original_description: Graves' shotgun has some unique properties. He must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attacks fire 4 bullets, which cannot pass through units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.mechanics_description: Smoke Screen is a **skillshot** that Graves throws in a target direction, creating a smoke cloud that **reduces vision** and **slows enemies** inside for a short duration. It is primarily used for **utility and disruption**, allowing Graves to disengage, set up engagements, or create opportunities for his team.
abilities.original_description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their Move Speed reduced briefly. Graves creates a cloud of black smoke for 4 seconds, <status>Slowing</status> enemies inside by {{ e2 }}% and blocking their vision outside the area. The initial impact deals <magicDamage>{{ impactdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: End of the Line
abilities.mechanics_description: End of the Line is a linear skillshot that Graves fires, dealing damage in a line and stopping at the first enemy hit. A second cast can be used to dash through an enemy, or simply move in any direction if no enemy is present, allowing for both offensive positioning and escape.
abilities.original_description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 1 second, or after colliding with terrain. Graves fires a powder round dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>. After 1 second or after colliding with terrain, it detonates, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldetonationdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> along the travel path again and to enemies near the blast.

abilities.name: Quickdraw
abilities.mechanics_description: Quickdraw is a dash that Graves uses by aiming in a direction, becoming briefly untargetable and firing a shotgun blast in a cone away from his final position. This ability is primarily used offensively for repositioning and damage, or defensively to dodge incoming attacks and escape.
abilities.original_description:
Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost. Graves dashes and reloads one Shell into his shotgun. He also gains a stack for 4 seconds (max {{ e0 }} stacks) or two stacks if he dashes towards an enemy champion. Stacks grant him {{ e5 }} Armor. Stacks are refreshed when damaging a non-minion.

Each bullet hit from Graves' Attacks reduces this Ability's Cooldown by {{ e4 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Collateral Damage
abilities.mechanics_description: Graves' ultimate, **Collateral Damage**, is a **linear skillshot** that explodes on the first enemy champion hit or at its maximum range, dealing significant magic damage in a wide cone behind the impact point. It's primarily used offensively for **burst damage** and to **zone enemies**, as the broad cone can hit multiple targets if positioned correctly.
abilities.original_description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone. Graves fires an explosive cartridge, blasting himself backwards. The cartridge deals <physicalDamage>{{ damage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy champion or reaching the end of its range, the cartridge explodes outward, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ falloffdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>.

abilities.name: Way of the Wanderer
abilities.mechanics_description: Yasuo's passive, Way of the Wanderer, is a **buff** gained passively. He gains **Flow** by moving, which converts into a **defensive shield** when he takes damage from a champion or monster after reaching maximum Flow.
abilities.original_description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is increased. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

abilities.name: Steel Tempest
abilities.mechanics_description: Steel Tempest is a linear skillshot that deals physical damage. It can be cast rapidly, stacking up to two times, and striking a third time with an empowered "Sweeping Blade" effect fires a tornado that travels a fixed distance, knocking up enemies hit.
abilities.original_description:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things. Yasuo thrusts, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage. If he hits, he gains a stack for {{ gatheringstormduration }} seconds. While he has 2 stacks, his next use of this Ability fires a whirlwind from range, dealing the same damage and Knocking Up for {{ knockupdurationtooltiponly }} second.

If used while dashing, this Ability strikes in a circle rather than a stab.

abilities.name: Wind Wall
abilities.mechanics_description: Wind Wall is a **linear skillshot channel** that creates a narrow wall of wind. This wall **blocks all enemy projectiles** that travel through it, regardless of damage, making it a powerful defensive and utility tool for Yasuo.
abilities.original_description: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds. Yasuo creates a drifting wall of wind that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Sweeping Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Sweeping Blade is a targeted dash that allows Yasuo to move through a target enemy, dealing damage and marking them. It's a core mobility tool for Yasuo, enabling him to execute offensive engages, escape sticky situations, and set up his ultimate.
abilities.original_description:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases subsequent dash's damage, up to a max amount.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.

If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle. Yasuo dashes through a target, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. Each use of this Ability grants {{ bonusdamageperstack }} bonus damage to subsequent uses for {{ stackduration }} seconds, stacking up to {{ maxstacks }} times.

This Ability has a {{ e2 }} second per-target Cooldown.

abilities.name: Last Breath
abilities.mechanics_description: Yasuo's Last Breath is a targeted point-and-click ability that allows him to dash to an airborne enemy champion, dealing damage and briefly knocking them and any other nearby airborne enemies up further. This ability is primarily used offensively to eliminate priority targets or to follow up on crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration. Yasuo teleports to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing {{ damage }} physical damage and holding all nearby Airborne enemies up for an additional {{ rknockupduration }} second. Yasuo also gains maximum Flow, but loses all Steel Tempest stacks.

Afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes ignore {{ rpercentarmorpen }}% bonus Armor for {{ rbuffduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: The Darkin Scythe
abilities.mechanics_description: The Darkin Scythe is Kayn's passive ability. It is an auto-target ability that heals Kayn when he damages enemy champions with his abilities or attacks. This passive allows Kayn to sustain in lane and skirmishes, enabling him to stay in fights longer and apply more pressure.
abilities.original_description:
Kayn wields an ancient weapon and fights Rhaast, the darkin within it, for control. Either the Darkin will triumph, or Kayn will master Rhaast and become the Shadow Assassin.

Darkin: Heal for a percentage of spell damage dealt to champions.

Shadow Assassin: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champions, deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.mechanics_description: Shadow Step is a **skillshot dash** that allows Kayn to move through terrain. It is primarily used **offensively** to reposition for attacks or to chase targets, and **defensively** to escape danger by phasing through walls.
abilities.original_description:
Kayn can walk through terrain. Kayn gains {{ e1 }}% Move Speed, becomes Ghosted, and can move through Terrain for {{ e2 }} seconds. When he first enters terrain, he restores {{ totalhealing }} Health.

Being Immobilized and spending more than {{ e3 }} consecutive seconds outside of Terrain ends this Ability early.

Shadow Assassin: Gain {{ e5 }}% Move Speed, Slow immunity, and reduce the Cooldown to {{ assassincdreduction }} seconds.

abilities.name: Reaping Slash
abilities.mechanics_description: Kayn slashes in a line in front of him with his scythe, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and healing himself for a portion of the damage dealt. Reaping Slash is a linear skillshot primarily used offensively for damage and sustained healing in combat.
abilities.original_description:
Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage. Kayn dashes then spins his scythe, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to enemies he passes through, then deals the damage again to nearby enemies.

Darkin Slayer: Instead deal {{ darkinflatdamage }} plus {{ darkinpercentdamage }} max Health physical damage.

abilities.name: Blade's Reach
abilities.mechanics_description: Blade's Reach is a linear skillshot that Kayn swings his scythe in a line, dealing damage to enemies hit and slowing them. Kayn can then reactivate the ability to dash a fixed distance in the direction he swung. This ability is primarily used offensively to poke, zone, follow up on engage, or escape.
abilities.original_description:
Kayn damages and slows targets in a line. Kayn swipes his scythe upward, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and Slowing enemies hit by {{ e3 }}%, decaying over {{ e5 }} seconds.

Shadow Assassin: Kayn can move while using this Ability and increases its range.

Darkin Slayer: Additionally Knocks Up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} second.

abilities.name: Umbral Trespass
abilities.mechanics_description: Kayn's "Umbral Trespass" (R) is a dash that can be cast on an enemy champion. Kayn becomes untargetable and moves *through* the target, dealing damage and applying a debuff that amplifies post-mitigation damage taken by the primary target. Kayn can then reactivate the ability to dash an additional time from the target's location, making it a powerful tool for both assassination and repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out. Passive: Champions damaged by Kayn are marked for 3.15 seconds.

Kayn infests a marked enemy, becoming Untargetable. After {{ infestduration }} seconds or after Recasting, Kayn bursts out, dealing {{ damage }} physical damage to the enemy.

Shadow Assassin: Increases this Ability's range, the distance Kayn exits, and refreshes The Darkin Scythe's Cooldown on exit.

Darkin Slayer: Instead deals {{ slayerdamage }} max Health physical damage and restores {{ healvalue }} Health ({{ slayerhealpercent*100 }}% damage amount).

abilities.name: Five Point Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Five Point Strike is a targeted ability that Akali uses to dash a short distance to her target, dealing damage. It is typically used offensively to initiate combat, chase down enemies, or finish off low-health opponents.
abilities.original_description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing. Akali slings kunai in an arc, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies at the tip by {{ slowpercentage*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Assassin's Mark
abilities.mechanics_description: Assassin's Mark is an auto-target passive ability that marks an enemy champion for a short duration after Akali hits them with an ability or empowered auto-attack. Akali can then consume the mark with her next auto-attack to deal bonus magic damage and briefly gain movement speed.
abilities.original_description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next Attack with bonus range and damage.

abilities.name: Twilight Shroud
abilities.mechanics_description: Twilight Shroud is a **skillshot** (circular) ability that Akali throws, creating a shroud of mist at the target location. Within the shroud, Akali gains **stealth** and increased **movement speed**, making it a primarily **defensive** or **utility** tool for repositioning, escaping, or setting up ambushes.
abilities.original_description:
Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Move Speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her. Akali drops a smoke bomb, unleashing a spreading cover of smoke lasting {{ baseduration }} seconds and granting herself {{ movementspeed }}% Move Speed decaying over {{ movementspeedduration }} seconds.

Akali increases her max Energy by {{ energyrestore }} while the shroud is active.

While inside the smoke, Akali is Invisible.

abilities.name: Shuriken Flip
abilities.mechanics_description: Shuriken Flip is a **two-part ability**. The first cast is a **skillshot** that throws a shuriken to a target location, marking the first enemy hit. The second cast allows Akali to **dash** to her marked target, dealing damage and flipping over them to strike enemies behind. It's primarily used **offensively** for damage and to extend her reach for engages or follow-ups.
abilities.original_description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage. Akali flips backwards as she throws a shuriken, dealing <magicDamage>{{ e1damage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and marking the first enemy or smoke cloud hit. Akali can <recast>Recast</recast> this once to dash to the marked target, dealing <magicDamage>{{ e2damagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Perfect Execution
abilities.mechanics_description: Akali's Perfect Execution is a two-part cast ability; the first cast is a dash that can be aimed at a target enemy champion, allowing her to pass through them and mark them. The second cast, an instant after landing, is a powerful AoE explosion around Akali that deals significant damage to marked enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes. Akali vaults over an enemy champion, dealing {{ cast1damage }} magic damage to all enemies in her path.

Akali can Recast after {{ cooldownbetweencasts }} seconds to execute a piercing thrust, dashing and dealing {{ cast2damagemin }} to {{ cast2damagemax }} magic damage based on missing Health.

abilities.name: Blooming Burst
abilities.mechanics_description: Blooming Burst is a linear skillshot that damages enemies in a line, dealing more damage to enemies hit by the outer edge of the bloom. It is primarily used offensively for poke and burst damage.
abilities.original_description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units. Neeko throws a seed that blooms to deal <magicDamage>{{ explosiondamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. If it kills a unit or hits a champion or large monster, it will bloom again, dealing <magicDamage>{{ seconddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Max 2 extra blooms.

abilities.name: Inherent Glamour
abilities.mechanics_description: Neeko's passive, **Inherent Glamour**, is an auto-targeting ability that allows her to disguise herself as an allied champion. She can use this passively to deceive enemies for offensive plays by initiating ambushes or defensively to escape dangerous situations by appearing to be a different, less threatening target.
abilities.original_description: Neeko can look like an ally champion or as other units on the map. Receiving immobilizing crowd control, casting damaging spells, damaging enemy towers as a non-champion, or your disguise taking damage equal to its healthbar breaks the disguise.

abilities.name: Pop Blossom
abilities.mechanics_description: Neeko's "Pop Blossom" (R) is a **channeled, circular AoE ability that can be detonated early or automatically**. It is used offensively to deal **burst magic damage and crowd control enemies with a stun**.
abilities.original_description:
After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air, knocking up all nearby enemies. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised. After a delay Neeko leaps into the air, Knocking Up all nearby enemies for {{ delayuntilexplosion }} seconds. She then crashes down, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

This Ability can be prepared in secret if Neeko is disguised. {{ delaybeforepassiveremoval }} seconds after casting this ability Neeko breaks her disguise.

abilities.name: Tangle-Barbs
abilities.mechanics_description: Tangle-Barbs is a linear skillshot that travels a set distance, damaging and slowing enemies hit. If it hits an enemy champion or takedown an enemy, it will root all enemies in the area around the initial target for a short duration.
abilities.original_description:
Neeko slings a tangle that damages and roots everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer. Neeko slings a tangle that deals {{ basedamage }} magic damage and Roots for {{ minrootduration }} seconds.

The tangle becomes empowered after hitting an enemy, growing larger, moving faster, and Rooting for {{ maxrootduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Shapesplitter
abilities.mechanics_description: Shapesplitter is a **dash** ability that allows Neeko to **reposition** herself a short distance. Upon activation, Neeko instantly **swaps places** with a **decoy clone** that travels in the direction she was facing, while Neeko herself is **untargetable** for a very brief moment during the swap.
abilities.original_description:
Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack, briefly increasing her move speed. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction and recast to change the direction of the clone. Passive: Every 3rd Attack deals an additional {{ passivebonusdamagecalc }} bonus magic damage and increases Neeko's Move Speed by {{ passivehaste }}% for {{ passivehasteduration }} second.

Active: Neeko becomes invisible for {{ stealthduration }} seconds and projects a clone that lasts {{ cloneduration }} seconds. Neeko and the clone gain {{ haste }}% Move Speed for {{ hasteduration }} seconds.

The clone can be controlled using the Move Pet Click hotkey or by Recasting this Ability.
The clone mirrors her spellcasts, emotes, and recall.

abilities.name: Mark of the Kindred
abilities.mechanics_description: **Mark of the Kindred (Passive)** is an auto-targeting debuff applied to enemy champions that Lamb can "mark" for a hunt. Once marked, Lamb's next few attacks against that mark deal bonus true damage and grant increased movement speed.
abilities.original_description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

abilities.name: Wolf's Frenzy
abilities.mechanics_description: Wolf's Frenzy is a circular AoE ability that Kindred casts, sending Wolf to attack enemies within the marked area. It is used offensively to deal damage and apply Mark of the Kindred in the area, and can also be used defensively to deter enemies with its damage and slow.
abilities.original_description:
Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him. Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health. Passive: Kindred gains stacks as they move and attack. At 100 stacks, Kindred's next Attack restores up to {{ attackheal }} Health based on their missing Health.

Active: Kindred claims a territory, ordering Wolf to bite at the last enemy Lamb Attacked. Wolf's bites deal {{ basewolfdamage }} plus {{ percentwolfdamage }} current Health magic damage.

abilities.name: Mounting Dread
abilities.mechanics_description: Mounting Dread is a skillshot that Kindred dashes a short distance in a target direction, dealing Mark of the Kindred damage and slowing enemies hit. It is primarily used offensively for burst damage and to stick to targets, but the short dash also offers repositioning utility.
abilities.original_description:
Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage. Kindred weakens an enemy, Slowing them by {{ totalslow }}% for {{ slowduration }} second.

Kindred's third Attack against the target within {{ totalduration }} seconds of each other directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing {{ basebitedamage }} plus {{ percentbitedamage }} missing Health physical damage.

Wolf's pounce critically strikes for {{ basebitedamage }} plus {{ critdamage }} missing Health physical damage instead if they are below {{ healththreshold }} Health.

abilities.name: Lamb's Respite
abilities.mechanics_description: Lamb's Respite is a targeted ability that creates a zone around Kindred, preventing allies within it from dying. It is primarily used defensively to grant a clutch save or to allow for a risky engage, as it prevents any unit within its area from dropping below a certain health threshold for its duration.
abilities.original_description:
Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed. Kindred blesses the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds, allowing no unit, ally, enemy, or neutral to die while inside. Upon reaching 10% Health, units can't be damaged or healed while still inside the zone.

When the blessing ends, all units inside heal for {{ e1 }} Health.

abilities.name: Dance of Arrows
abilities.mechanics_description: Kindred's **Dance of Arrows (Q)** is a **targeted ability** that, after a brief dash, fires a **burst of three spectral arrows** in a **small circular AoE** around Kindred. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal damage and apply on-hit effects, but its mobility also offers **defensive** repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets. Kindred vaults, firing an arrow at up to 3 enemies, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and gaining {{ totalqattackspeed }} Attack Speed for {{ e8 }} seconds.

While inside of Wolf's Frenzy, this Ability's Cooldown is reduced to {{ e4 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Dirty Fighting
