abilities.mechanics_description: Akshan's passive, Dirty Fighting, is an auto-target ability that marks enemies hit by his attacks or abilities. Upon marking a third distinct enemy, Akshan unleashes a burst of area-of-effect damage around them, making it an offensive tool for cleave damage.
abilities.original_description:
Every three hits from Akshan's Attacks and Abilities deals bonus damage and grants him a Shield if the target was a champion.

When Akshan Attacks, he fires an additional Attack for reduced damage. If he cancels the additional Attack, he instead gains Move Speed.

abilities.name: Going Rogue
abilities.mechanics_description: "Going Rogue" is a dash that Akshan can recast to fire a grappling hook, latching onto terrain to swing around. This ability is primarily used for repositioning and engaging/disengaging fights, offering significant mobility and outplay potential rather than direct damage.
abilities.original_description:
Akshan passively marks enemy champions as Scoundrels when they kill his ally champions. If Akshan kills a Scoundrel, he resurrects the allies they killed, gains bonus gold, and clears all marks.

When activated, Akshan enters camouflage and gains Move Speed and Mana Regen while moving towards Scoundrels. Akshan loses the camouflage quickly while he is not in brush or near terrain.

abilities.name: Comeuppance
abilities.mechanics_description: Akshan's ultimate, "Comeuppance," is an auto-targeting, multi-hit projectile that locks onto the nearest enemy champion within range, firing up to three times based on subsequent activations. It is used offensively to deliver high burst damage, especially against lone targets or to finish off fleeing enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Akshan locks onto an enemy champion and starts storing bullets. When released, he fires all stored bullets, dealing damage based on missing health to the first champion, minion, or structure hit. Akshan locks onto a champion and begins overcharging his gun for up to {{ channelduration }} seconds, storing up to {{ numberofbullets }} bullets.

Recast: Akshan unleashes the stored bullets, each dealing at least {{ damageperbulletwithcrit }} physical damage to the first enemy or structure hit, increased up to {{ maxdamageperbullet }} physical damage based on missing Health.

abilities.name: Heroic Swing
abilities.mechanics_description: Akshan fires a grappling hook in a target direction that attaches to the first champion hit. He can then **recast** the ability to swing around the hooked champion in a circle, dealing damage to any enemies he passes through. This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and repositioning, allowing him to initiate or follow up on engagements from unexpected angles.
abilities.original_description:
Akshan fires a grappling hook into terrain then swings around it, repeatedly firing at the nearest enemy while swinging. He can jump off early or gets knocked off when colliding with champions or terrain. First Cast: Akshan fires a grappling hook, attaching to the first terrain hit.

Second Cast: Akshan swings around the terrain, repeatedly firing at the nearest enemy for {{ asmoddamagetodeal }} physical damage per shot.

Third Cast: Akshan dives off the rope, firing a final shot.

Colliding with an enemy Champion or terrain ends the swing early.

Champion takedowns refresh this Ability's Cooldown.

abilities.name: Avengerang
abilities.mechanics_description: Akshan throws his Avengerang in a line, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and returning to him. If the Avengerang hits an enemy champion or monster, it gains increased range and damage, and he can recast it to throw it again before it returns. This ability is a primary damage tool, used both offensively for poke and burst, and defensively for wave clear and to potentially disengage or re-engage in fights due to its scalable range.
abilities.original_description:
Akshan throws a boomerang that deals damage going out and coming back, extending its range each time it hits an enemy. Akshan throws a boomerang that deals {{ finaldamage }} physical damage, extending the range each time an enemy is hit.

Champion hits grant Akshan {{ totalhaste }} Move Speed decaying over {{ hasteduration }} second.

abilities.name: Spider Queen
abilities.mechanics_description: **Spider Queen (Passive):** Elise's basic abilities in Spider Form apply a damage-over-time effect to marked targets. This passive is automatically triggered when Elise's Spider Form abilities hit an enemy, passively enabling sustained damage and increasing her kill pressure in trades.
abilities.original_description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

abilities.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
abilities.mechanics_description: Neurotoxin is a point-and-click ability in spider form that deals bonus magic damage based on the target's missing health. Venomous Bite is a point-and-click ability in human form that deals magic damage and heals Elise if it damages an enemy champion.
abilities.original_description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is. Human Form: Elise injects neurotoxin, dealing {{ basedamage }} plus {{ humanpercenthealth }} current Health magic damage.

abilities.name: Cocoon / Rappel
abilities.mechanics_description: Cocoon is a linear skillshot that stuns the first enemy hit. Rappel allows Elise to become untargetable and leap to a target location or enemy, then perform an empowered attack.
abilities.original_description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased. Human Form: Elise fires a cocoon, Stunning and revealing the first enemy hit for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Spider Form
abilities.mechanics_description: Spider Form is a **toggleable ultimate ability** with no cooldown, allowing Elise to **instantly switch between Human and Spider forms** by reactivating it. Switching forms **displaces Elise slightly** and allows her to use the unique abilities of her current form, fundamentally altering her playstyle between ranged poke/control and melee assassination.
abilities.original_description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes. <keywordMajor>Human Form</keywordMajor>: Elise transforms into a menacing spider, becoming melee, gaining access to <keywordMajor>Spider Form</keywordMajor> Abilities and summons all dormant <keywordMajor>Spiderlings</keywordMajor>.

abilities.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Volatile Spiderling (Human Form):** Elise summons a Skittering Spiderling that moves towards a target location. Upon reaching it or dying, it explodes dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

**Skittering Frenzy (Spider Form):** Elise commands her summoned Spiderlings to attack a target enemy. If Elise herself attacks the same target, she gains a burst of bonus magic damage on her next auto-attack and heals for a portion of the damage dealt by her and her Spiderlings.

**Mechanics & Usage:** Human Form's Volatile Spiderling is a summon at a target location, useful for zoning or poke. Spider Form's Skittering Frenzy is an auto-target command that enhances Spiderling damage and provides a self-buff to Elise, allowing for offensive burst and sustain.
abilities.original_description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed. Human Form: Elise summons an explosive spider that moves to a location and explodes when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds. The spider deals {{ spell.elisehumanw:totaldamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Petricite Burst
abilities.mechanics_description: Petricite Burst is an auto-targeting passive ability that Sylas triggers after casting a spell. Upon activation, Sylas leaps forward, creating an explosion that deals magic damage to nearby enemies.
abilities.original_description: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst. Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.

abilities.name: Chain Lash
abilities.mechanics_description: Chain Lash (Q) is a two-part skillshot. The first cast fires a short-range projectile that damages and slows enemies in a line. The second cast, if a hostile unit was hit on the first cast, Sylas whips his chains back to that target, dealing damage again and pulling himself towards them. It's primarily an offensive tool for damage and engage, with the slow providing a brief window for follow-up attacks or escapes.
abilities.original_description:
Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage. Sylas lashes his chains out, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ slowamountcalc }} for {{ slowduration }} seconds. The place where the chains intersect explodes, dealing a further {{ explosiondamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Kingslayer
abilities.mechanics_description: Sylas's Kingslayer (W) is a self-cast ability that grants him a shield and heals him based on damage dealt to an enemy champion. It is a point-and-click ability used offensively for burst damage and survivability, and defensively to sustain through fights.
abilities.original_description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions. Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing <magicDamage>{{ mindamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Against champions, Sylas restores between <healing>{{ minhealing }}</healing> and <healing>{{ maxhealing }} Health</healing> based on his missing Health (max healing at or below {{ maxexecutethreshold*100 }}% Health).

abilities.name: Hijack
abilities.mechanics_description: Sylas's ultimate, **Massacre**, is an auto-targeting dash that allows him to leap to a target enemy champion, dealing magic damage and knocking them up. He can then reactivate the ability to perform a series of chained attacks, dealing further magic damage and healing himself. Using it offensively for burst damage and dive potential is its primary function, though the self-heal offers a minor defensive component.
abilities.original_description:
Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely. Sylas hijacks an enemy champion, allowing him to cast a copy of their ultimate Ability, based on his Ultimate level and using his stats.

Hijacking an enemy places a Cooldown on them for {{ pertargetcooldown }}% (modified by Sylas' Ability Haste) of the enemy's ultimate's Cooldown, with a minimum of {{ minimumenemycooldown }} seconds, during which time Sylas cannot hijack them again.

abilities.name: Abscond / Abduct
abilities.mechanics_description:
Abscond / Abduct is a two-part ability:

1.  **Abscond (First Cast):** Sylas casts a short, linear skillshot that winds up before traveling. On impact, it deals magic damage and briefly roots the first enemy hit.
2.  **Abduct (Second Cast):** If the first cast hits an enemy, Sylas can immediately cast Abduct, dashing to the rooted target and pulling them towards him.

This ability is used offensively for engaging, setting up combos with its damage and root, and defensively by allowing an escape or repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits. Sylas quickly dashes, and prepares a Recast for 3.5 seconds.

Recast: Sylas throws his chains, pulling himself to the first enemy hit, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage, and Knocking Up for {{ knockupduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Death Defied
abilities.mechanics_description: Death Defied is a passive ability that **automatically activates** when Karthus reaches 0 health, making him **invulnerable** and allowing him to **continue casting his spells** for a short duration from beyond the grave before dying. This passive is primarily **offensive**, enabling Karthus to finish off kills or deal crucial damage even after being seemingly defeated.
abilities.original_description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.

abilities.name: Lay Waste
abilities.mechanics_description: **Lay Waste (Q)** is a **targeted skillshot** that Karthus *can* target an area, dealing magic damage to the closest enemy. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal damage and apply pressure, especially when Karthus is unable to reach enemies directly or needs to farm safely.
abilities.original_description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies.  Karthus creates a blast of magic, dealing <magicDamage>{{ qdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. If the blast hits only one enemy, it instead deals <magicDamage>{{ qsingletargetdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Requiem
abilities.mechanics_description: Requiem is an **auto-targeting, global ultimate** that deals significant magic damage to all enemy champions globally after a brief channel. It is used **offensively** primarily for finishing off low-health targets across the map or securing kills in teamfights.
abilities.original_description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions. Karthus channels for 3 seconds, then deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to enemy champions, regardless of distance.

abilities.name: Wall of Pain
abilities.mechanics_description: Wall of Pain is a linear skillshot that creates a destructible wall, slowing enemies who pass through it and dealing magic damage over time. It is primarily used for zone control, setting up kills by slowing enemies for allies or for Karthus's other abilities, and for disengaging defensively.
abilities.original_description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Move Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period. Karthus creates a wall that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through lose <scaleMR>{{ e1 }}% Magic Resist</scaleMR> for {{ e5 }} seconds and are <status>Slowed</status> by {{ e3 }}% decaying over the duration.

abilities.name: Defile
abilities.mechanics_description: Defile is a narrow, linear skillshot that Karthus casts in a target direction. It deals continuous magic damage to all enemies hit and applies a stacking debuff that further reduces their magic resistance, making it an offensive ability primarily used to zone, poke, and amplify followed-up damage.
abilities.original_description:
Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana. Passive: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle: Karthus creates a necrotic aura, dealing {{ totaldps }} magic damage per second to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Fury of the North
abilities.mechanics_description: Fury of the North is a passive ability that Sejuani applies to herself and nearby allies. It's a **buff** that grants **defensive** properties, allowing them to take reduced damage after being hit by crowd control effects. This passive is **auto-targeted** onto allies in range and can be triggered multiple times.
abilities.original_description: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

abilities.name: Winter's Wrath
abilities.mechanics_description: Winter's Wrath is a linear skillshot that Sejuani throws forward, dealing damage and applying a stack of her passive, Frost Armor, to enemies hit. It is primarily used offensively for damage and to stack her passive for subsequent abilities and crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage, slowing enemies and applying Frost stacks. Sejuani swings her flail, dealing {{ firsthitdamagetooltip }} physical damage and Knocking Back minions and jungle monsters. She then lashes out again, dealing {{ secondhitdamagetooltip }} physical damage and briefly Slowing targets.

Both swings apply stacks of Permafrost.

abilities.name: Arctic Assault
abilities.mechanics_description: **Arctic Assault (Q)** is a linear skillshot dash that damages and knocks up the first enemy hit, serving as a primary engage tool to initiate combat and apply crowd control. It can also be used to reposition for follow-up attacks or to escape.
abilities.original_description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion. Sejuani charges, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage</magicDamage> to enemies and <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Up</status> for {{ e4 }} seconds. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Permafrost
abilities.mechanics_description: **Permafrost (E)** is a targeted skillshot that Sejuani casts in a direction, dealing damage and applying a stack of her passive, Frost. Enemies hit by subsequent abilities or auto-attacks from allies (or Sejuani herself) while they have Frost stacks will consume them to briefly immobilize and deal additional damage.
abilities.original_description:
Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks. Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' Attacks apply a stack to champions and jungle monsters.

Active: Sejuani deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to target enemy with 4 stacks and Stuns them for {{ e1 }} second.

abilities.name: Glacial Prison
abilities.mechanics_description: Sejuani's **Glacial Prison** is a **linear skillshot** that launches a frozen projectile. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it stuns them and all enemies in a small radius, dealing damage, while Sejuani herself dashes to the primary target.
abilities.original_description:
Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies. Sejuani throws her True Ice bola, Stunning and revealing the first enemy champion hit for {{ e2 }} second and dealing {{ minordamagetooltip }} magic damage.

If the bola travels at least 25% of its range, it Stuns and reveals for {{ e6 }} seconds instead. It then also creates an ice storm that Slows surrounding enemies by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. All affected enemies take {{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Haymaker
abilities.mechanics_description: Haymaker is a **point and click** style ability that Sett **charges up** by taking damage. Upon reactivation, he unleashes a **powerful punch** in a **linear cone** in front of him, dealing significant **physical damage** based on bonus attack damage and his **bonus health**, while also granting him a **strong shield**.
abilities.original_description:
Sett passively stores damage he takes as Grit. On cast, Sett expends all stored Grit to gain a shield and punch an area, dealing true damage in the center and physical damage on the sides. Passive: Sett stores {{ damagestored*100 }}% of damage taken as Grit, up to {{ maxgrit }}. Grit decays quickly {{ adrenalinestoragewindow }} seconds after the damage was taken.

Active: Sett consumes all Grit, gaining a {{ shieldconversion*100 }}% Grit consumed Shield decaying over {{ shieldmaxduration }} seconds. Sett then delivers a massive punch, dealing {{ damagecalc }} plus {{ damageconversion }} Grit consumed true damage to enemies in the center (max {{ f1 }} damage). Enemies not in the center instead take physical damage.

abilities.name: Knuckle Down
abilities.mechanics_description: Knuckle Down is an **auto-attack reset skillshot** that Sett throws out two punches, with the second punch dealing bonus true damage and knocking enemies back. He uses it offensively to **deal burst damage** and create opportunities for follow-up crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Sett's next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. Sett also gains Move Speed while moving towards enemy champions. Sett itches for a fight, gaining {{ msamount*100 }}% Move Speed towards enemy champions for {{ msduration }} seconds.

Additionally Sett's next two Attacks deal an additional {{ basedamage }} plus {{ maxhealthdamagecalc }} max Health physical damage.

abilities.name: Facebreaker
abilities.mechanics_description: Facebreaker is a **point-and-click** ability that **deals damage** and **slows** the target. Sett charges up for a brief moment before delivering a forceful punch, and if he hits an enemy, he can then **recast** the ability to **dash** to another nearby enemy, **stunning** them. This ability is primarily used offensively for burst damage and crowd control, but the dash can also be used defensively to reposition over obstacles or disengage.
abilities.original_description: Sett pulls in all enemies on opposite sides of him, dealing damage and stunning them. If enemies were only on one side, they are slowed instead of stunned. Sett smashes enemies on either side of him into each other, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ damagecalc }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. If Sett grabbed at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are <status>Stunned</status> for {{ stunduration }} second.

abilities.name: The Show Stopper
abilities.mechanics_description: "The Show Stopper" is a targeted ability that causes Sett to leap towards an enemy champion, slamming them into the ground. This deals significant physical damage and continues to damage enemies in a cone behind the target, stunning them briefly.
abilities.original_description: Sett carries an enemy champion through the air and slams them into the ground, dealing damage and slowing all enemies near where they land. Sett grabs an enemy champion and <status>Suppresses</status> them as he carries them forward, then slams them into the ground, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ damagecalc }} plus {{ maxhealthdamage*100 }}% of the grabbed enemy's bonus Health physical damage</physicalDamage> to surrounding enemies and <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} second. Enemies take less damage the further they are from where Sett lands.

abilities.name: Pit Grit
abilities.mechanics_description: Pit Grit is a passive ability for Sett that stores a percentage of damage taken as `Grit` in his `Overpowered` bar. When Sett's `Grit` bar is full, his next basic attack will consume the `Grit` to empower himself, granting a shield and dealing bonus physical damage. This ability is used both offensively, to amplify his damage output, and defensively, to gain a temporary shield for survivability.
abilities.original_description: Sett's basic attacks alternate between left and right punch. Right punch is slightly stronger and faster. Sett also hates losing, gaining additional health regeneration based off of his missing health.

abilities.name: Eternal Hunger
abilities.mechanics_description: Warwick's **Eternal Hunger** is an auto-target passive that triggers on his basic attacks. It deals bonus magic damage on-hit and heals Warwick for a percentage of the damage dealt, providing both offensive sustainability and defensive self-healing through consistent auto-attack trading.
abilities.original_description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

abilities.name: Blood Hunt
abilities.mechanics_description: Blood Hunt is a non-targeted ability that Warwick activates to gain movement speed towards enemy champions that are below a certain health threshold. It provides Warwick with a powerful *utility* buff for closing gaps and initiating fights, making it primarily offensive for chasing and engaging.
abilities.original_description:
Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 25% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple. Passive: Warwick can sense champions below 50% Health, gaining {{ passivemsbonus }}% Move Speed towards them. Spells and attacks against enemies below 50% Health grant {{ passiveasbonus }}% Attack Speed. These effects are increased by 200% against enemies below 25% Health.

Active: Warwick can briefly sense all enemies, and gains this Ability's passive effect against the closest champion for 8 seconds, regardless of Health. If no champions are found, this Ability's cooldown is reduced by 30%.

abilities.name: Jaws of the Beast
abilities.mechanics_description: Jaws of the Beast is a targeted ability that Warwick **lunges forward and bites** his target, dealing damage and briefly **suppressing** them. This ability is primarily used **offensively** to initiate or follow up on engagements, providing a strong CC lockdown for burst damage.
abilities.original_description:
Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt. Tap: Warwick lunges forward and bites, dealing {{ basebitedamage }} plus {{ targetpercenthpdamage }}% max Health magic damage and healing for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

Hold: Warwick lunges and clamps his jaws on the target, leaping behind them. While clamped, Warwick follows all movement of the target. After releasing his hold, he does the same damage and healing.

abilities.name: Infinite Duress
abilities.mechanics_description: Warwick's ultimate, Infinite Duress, is a long-range, unstoppable dash that suppresses and fears the first enemy champion it hits. It's primarily used offensively to initiate fights, secure kills with its crowd control, or defensively to escape sticky situations by suppressing and moving past an enemy.
abilities.original_description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus Move Speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds. Warwick leaps a huge distance that scales with his <speed>Move Speed</speed>, <status>Suppressing</status> the first champion he collides with while he channels for {{ rduration }} seconds. He attacks that champion 3 times over the duration, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damagecumulative }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Warwick <healing>heals for 100% of all damage dealt</healing> during the channel.

abilities.name: Primal Howl
abilities.mechanics_description: Primal Howl is a **self-cast ability** that Warwick lets out a **fear howl**, sending nearby enemies fleeing in **random directions** for a short duration. This ability is primarily used for **crowd control and disengage** rather than direct damage, offering utility to isolate targets or escape dangerous situations.
abilities.original_description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second. Warwick gains {{ e1 }}% damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. After it ends, Warwick howls, <status>Fearing</status> nearby enemies for {{ e3 }} second. Warwick can <recast>Recast</recast> to end the Ability early.

abilities.name: H-28 G Evolution Turret
abilities.mechanics_description: Heimerdinger's Q, H-28 G Evolution Turret, is an **auto-target** ability that allows him to **place stationary turrets** at a target location. These turrets automatically attack nearby enemies, dealing **offensive damage** and providing **defensive zoning** and area control.
abilities.original_description:
Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers). Heimerdinger constructs a Turret that attacks nearby enemies. Heimerdinger can have {{ maxturrets }} turrets active at once. Turrets slowly build up charge. At max charge, they fire a stronger attack.

If Heimerdinger gets too far away, his Turrets will deactivate after 8 seconds.

This Ability has {{ maxkits }} charges.

abilities.name: Hextech Affinity
abilities.mechanics_description: Hextech Affinity is a passive ability that automatically grants Heimerdinger Hextech Turrets and Tech-Disruptor Grenades cooldown reduction as he levels up. This passive is not directly "used" by the player but rather passively enhances Heimerdinger's overall cooldown efficiency, allowing him to deploy and reuse his turrets and grenades more frequently for sustained offensive pressure and utility.
abilities.original_description: Gain Move Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

abilities.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
abilities.mechanics_description: Hextech Micro-Rockets is a linear skillshot that Heimerdinger fires in a target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies in its path. It's primarily used offensively to poke enemies from a distance and deal damage, especially when combined with his turrets.
abilities.original_description:
Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor. Heimerdinger unleashes a barrage of {{ rockets }} rockets that deal {{ damage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit. Additional rocket hits deal reduced damage.

Max Damage: {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Nearby Turrets gain 20% charge per rocket that hits a champion.

abilities.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
abilities.mechanics_description: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade is a skillshot that Heimerdinger throws. It detonates on impact with an enemy or terrain, dealing magic damage and applying a powerful slow to all enemies hit within the area.
abilities.original_description:
Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units. Heimerdinger hurls a grenade that deals {{ damage }} magic damage in an area and Slows by {{ slowpercent.0*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Enemies in the center are also Stunned for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

Hitting a champion fully charges nearby Turrets.

abilities.name: UPGRADE!!!
abilities.mechanics_description: Heimerdinger's ultimate, UPGRADE!!!, is an auto-targeted ability that empowers his next basic ability cast by adding a significant bonus effect. It is primarily used offensively to deal burst damage with an enhanced Rocket Grab (W) or Turrets (Q), or for wave clear and area denial with an enhanced Grenade (E).
abilities.original_description:
Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects. Heimerdinger upgrades his next non-ultimate Ability.

H-28Q Apex Turret: Place an upgraded Turret for 8 seconds that doesn't count towards Heimerdinger's max turrets, deals {{ qultdamage }} magic damage per shot and {{ qultdamagebeam }} magic damage per charged shot. Its attacks deal damage in an area, Slow by 25% for 2 seconds, and it is immune to crowd control.

Hextech Rocket Swarm: Fires 4 waves of rockets that each deal {{ wultdamage }} magic damage. Champions and jungle monsters hit by additional rockets take reduced damage, and minions take increased damage. Max Damage: {{ wulttotaldamage }} magic damage.

CH-3X Lightning Grenade: Throws a bouncing grenade that discharges three times, dealing {{ eultdamage }} magic damage. The Stun and Slow areas are larger.

Recast: Cancel this Ability.

abilities.name: Aria of Perseverance
abilities.mechanics_description: Aria of Perseverance is an **auto-targeting ability** that Sona uses to **defensively heal herself and nearby allied champions**. Her subsequent ability uses empower this heal, making it a core part of Sona's supportive kit for sustain in lane and during teamfights.
abilities.original_description:
Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield. Active: Sona restores {{ totalheal }} Health to herself and a nearby allied champion, prioritizing the most wounded. She then begins a new Melody.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ auraduration }} seconds, granting allied champions {{ totalshield }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

Gain a stack of Accelerando whenever you heal another injured ally and every time you protect another ally from at least {{ accelerandoshieldbreakpoint }} damage with this shield.

Power Chord - Diminuendo: Power Chord also reduces physical and magic damage dealt by the target by {{ totaldiminuendoweakenpercent }} for {{ diminuendoduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Crescendo
abilities.mechanics_description: Sona's Crescendo (R) is a linear skillshot that travels forward from Sona, dealing damage and applying crowd control to enemies hit. It also buffs nearby allies with Empowered abilities after casting, providing a defensive heal and shield to allies in its path.
abilities.original_description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Sona strikes an irresistible chord, <status>Stunning</status> enemy for {{ stunduration }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Power Chord
abilities.mechanics_description: Power Chord is a passive ability that empowers Sona's next auto-attack after she casts three spells. This empowered auto-attack deals bonus damage and applies a unique bonus effect based on her last basic ability cast: **Diminuendo** (reduces enemy damage), **Staccato** (deals bonus damage), or **Tempo** (temporarily grants Sona increased movement speed).
abilities.original_description:
Accelerando: Sona gains non-Ultimate ability haste permanently for her basic abilities as she uses her abilities well, up to a cap. Beyond that cap, further successful uses reduce her ultimate's remaining cooldown instead.

Power Chord: Every few spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what basic Ability Sona last activated.

abilities.name: Song of Celerity
abilities.mechanics_description: **Song of Celerity (E):** This is a self-buff that Sona toggles on to gain increased movement speed. When activated, it also grants a burst of movement speed to nearby allied champions. Song of Celerity is primarily used for repositioning, chasing down enemies, or rapidly escaping danger defensively.
abilities.original_description:
Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Move Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Move Speed. Active: She begins a new Melody and grants herself {{ totalselfmovementspeed }} Move Speed for {{ selfmovementspeeddurationmin }} seconds, extended to up to {{ selfmovementspeeddurationmax }} seconds if she doesn't take damage.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ auraduration }} seconds that grants allied champions {{ totalallymovementspeed }} Move Speed for {{ allymovementspeedduration }} seconds.

Power Chord - Tempo: Power Chord also Slows the target by {{ totaltempomovespeedslow }} for {{ tempoduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Hymn of Valor
abilities.mechanics_description: Sona's Hymn of Valor is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and provides a temporary aura to nearby allies, granting them bonus attack damage. It is primarily used offensively for poke and to empower her team's auto-attackers.
abilities.original_description:
Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies. Sona deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the nearest two enemies, prioritizing champions. She then begins a new Melody. Gain a stack of Accelerando for every champion you damage with this.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ auraduration }} seconds, granting allied champions an additional {{ totalonhitdamage }} magic damage %i:OnHit% on their next Attack within {{ onhitduration }} seconds.

Power Chord - Staccato: Power Chord bonus damage ({{ totalstaccatodamage }} total magic damage).

abilities.name: Loaded Dice
abilities.mechanics_description: Twisted Fate's Loaded Dice is a passive ability that automatically applies on-hit effects to his basic attacks after he uses a spell. This allows him to deal bonus damage and a variety of additional beneficial effects to enemies with his empowered auto-attacks.
abilities.original_description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.

abilities.name: Wild Cards
abilities.mechanics_description: Wild Cards is a linear skillshot that allows Twisted Fate to throw three cards in a cone, damaging enemies hit. It is primarily used offensively for poke and burst damage, and can be used defensively to clear minion waves or deter approaching enemies.
abilities.original_description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through. Twisted Fate throws three cards that deal <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> each.

abilities.name: Pick a Card
abilities.mechanics_description: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card (W) is a **no target** ability that allows him to **cycle through three cards** (Blue, Red, Gold) by repeatedly pressing W. After selecting a card by pressing W a second time, his **next auto-attack will consume the chosen card** and apply its unique effect: Blue for mana restore, Red for AoE damage and slow, or Gold for a stun and damage.
abilities.original_description:
Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects. Twisted Fate begins shuffling his deck, allowing him to Recast to lock in one of three cards and enhance his next Attack.
  • The Blue Card deals {{ bluedamage }} magic damage and restores {{ e6 }} Mana.
  • The Red Card deals {{ reddamage }} to nearby enemies and Slows by {{ e2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.
  • The Gold Card deals {{ golddamage }} and Stuns for {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Destiny
abilities.mechanics_description: Twisted Fate's Destiny (R) is a global auto-targeting teleportation ability. Upon activation, Twisted Fate reveals all enemy champions on the map for a short duration and then can be reactivated within a few seconds to teleport to a target location near him, making it a powerful engage and repositioning tool.
abilities.original_description:
Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds. Twisted Fate focuses on his cards, granting True Sight of all enemy champions on the map for {{ e1 }} seconds and allowing him to Recast.

Recast: Twisted Fate teleports up to {{ e4 }} units away.

abilities.name: Stacked Deck
abilities.mechanics_description: Stacked Deck is a point-and-click ability that empowers Twisted Fate's **next three auto-attacks** to deal bonus magic damage, with the third strike dealing significantly more. It's primarily used **offensively** for burst damage after or during a lock-on with his ultimate, or to finish off low-health targets.
abilities.original_description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased. <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Twisted Fate gains <attackSpeed>{{ attackspeedbonus }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> and every 4th Attack deals an additional <magicDamage>{{ bonusdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
abilities.mechanics_description: "Fury of the Xer'Sai" is Rek'Sai's passive and works as an auto-target ability. While underground, Rek'Sai generates Fury over time and by hitting enemies with abilities or basic attacks; once Fury is full, her next basic attack consumes it to heal her, making it a crucial sustain tool for both offensive engagements and defensive trading.
abilities.original_description: Rek'Sai generates Fury by Attacking and hitting with basic Abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.

abilities.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
abilities.mechanics_description: Rek'Sai's ability Burrows after a brief activation, making her untargetable and able to move freely underground. While burrowed, her basic abilities are replaced with unique, targeted effects that primarily focus on scouting and dealing damage to enemies, with the ability to Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby opponents.
abilities.original_description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Unburrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies. Unburrowed: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining access to new Abilities but cannot Attack. She gains {{ burrowedmovespeed }} Move Speed, {{ visionradiusmod*-100 }}% reduced vision range, and nearby enemies that move and are otherwise unseen will have their positions revealed to Rek'sai and her allies.

abilities.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker (Q):**

*   **Queen's Wrath (Unburrowed):** A point-and-click ability that Rek'Sai targets enemies in range for three rapid strikes, dealing adaptive damage. It is primarily used offensively for sustained damage in her unburrowed state.
*   **Prey Seeker (Burrowed):** A linear skillshot that Rek'Sai fires, dealing damage and applying a tremor sense debuff to the first enemy hit and any enemies in its path. This ability is used offensively to initiate, scout, and deal damage from a safe, burrowed position.
abilities.original_description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that damages and reveals enemies hit. Unburrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 Attacks within {{ buffduration }} seconds gain {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed and deal an additional {{ totaldamagetooltip }} physical damage to nearby enemies. Attacks refresh the duration of this Ability.

abilities.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Furious Bite:** A point-and-click auto-attack modifier that deals bonus damage to targets below a certain health threshold, executing them if they fall below.
**Tunnel:** A targeted ground placement that creates a reusable tunnel, allowing Rek'Sai to quickly burrow and emerge from it.

**Usage:** Furious Bite is primarily an offensive execution tool, while Tunnel provides significant mobility and repositioning for both offensive engagements and defensive escapes.
abilities.original_description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing physical damage, or bonus true damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance. Unburrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target, dealing {{ spell.reksaie:basedamage }} physical damage. At max Fury, the bite deals {{ spell.reksaie:empowereddamage }} true damage instead.

abilities.name: Void Rush
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Rush is a **dash** targeting a specific enemy champion. Upon arrival, Rek'Sai **deals damage** to the target and nearby enemies, knocking them airborne.
abilities.original_description: Rek'Sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their maximum health. Rek'Sai targets an enemy damaged by her in the last {{ preymarkduration }} seconds and then dives underground, becoming Untargetable. Moments later, she leaps unstoppably at her target, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ rbasedamagecalc }} plus {{ percenthealthdamage }}% max Health physical damage</physicalDamage> and resets the cooldown of <keywordMajor>Burrow / Un-burrow</keywordMajor>.

abilities.name: Piercing Darkness
abilities.mechanics_description: **Piercing Darkness (Q)** is a linear skillshot fired from Senna's mist-wreathed rifle. It damages enemies in a line and heals allied champions she hits, making it a versatile tool for both offense and defense.
abilities.original_description:
From the twin barrels of her Relic Cannon, Senna fires a unified beam of light and shadow through a target, healing allies and damaging enemies. Senna shoots a bolt of piercing shadow through an ally or enemy, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to enemies and Slowing them by {{ totalslow }} for {{ slowduration }} second(s). Restores {{ totalheal }} Health to allied champions.

Attacks reduce this Ability's Cooldown by {{ cdreductiononhit }} second.

abilities.name: Last Embrace
abilities.mechanics_description: Senna targets a location, creating a mist that **heals allies** within it and **damages enemies** who enter. This mist **slows enemies** and can be used defensively to heal allies or offensively to apply pressure and discourage enemy movement.
abilities.original_description: Senna sends forth a wave of Black Mist. If it hits an enemy it latches onto them hungrily, rooting them and everything nearby after a brief delay. Senna sends forth the Black Mist, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ damage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit. After a {{ delaytime }} second delay the target and other nearby enemies are <status>Rooted</status> for {{ rootduration }} second(s).

abilities.name: Absolution
abilities.mechanics_description: Senna's Absolution passive grants her a chance to deal bonus on-hit damage and heal herself for a portion of the damage dealt whenever she lands an attack or ability on an enemy champion. This passive functions as an auto-target mechanic, rewarding aggressive poking and trades with sustained damage and healing.
abilities.original_description:
When units die near Senna, their souls are periodically trapped by the Black Mist. Senna can attack these souls to free them, absorbing the Mist that held them in death. Mist fuels her Relic Cannon's power with increased Attack Damage, Attack Range, and Critical Strike Chance.

Attacks from Senna's Relic Cannon take longer to fire, deal bonus damage, and briefly grant her a portion of her target's Move Speed.

abilities.name: Curse of the Black Mist
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Curse of the Black Mist (E)** is a circular skillshot that creates a mist that Senna can channel (toggle) to become invisible and gain a movement speed bonus. Allies within the mist also gain invisibility.

It is primarily used for **defensive repositioning and engaging/disengaging**, offering a unique tool for Senna and her team to reposition safely or initiate fights.
abilities.original_description: Senna draws the Mist she has stored in her weapon into a storm around her, embracing darkness and becoming a wraith within. Allies who enter the area are camouflaged and also appear as wraiths as the Mist shrouds them. Wraiths gain increased Move Speed, are unselectable, and hide their identities. Senna dissolves into a cloud of Black Mist for {{ buffduration }} seconds, becoming a Wraith. Allied champions who enter the Mist are <keywordStealth>Camouflaged</keywordStealth> and become Wraiths when they leave. Wraiths gain <speed>{{ totalms }} Move Speed</speed>, are Unselectable, and hide their identities as long as no enemy champions are nearby.

abilities.name: Dawning Shadow
abilities.mechanics_description: **Senna's R - Dawning Shadow** is a global, linear skillshot that can be aimed through allies and enemies. It deals damage to enemies hit and heals allies hit, with a soul-gathering component for Senna on enemy champions who die within the cast range.
abilities.original_description: Senna calls upon the relic stones of fallen Sentinels, splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light. She then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm, while damaging enemies caught in the center. Senna fires a beam of light that deals <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to all enemy champions hit. Allied champions hit in a wider area receive <shield>{{ totalshield }} Shield</shield> for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.mechanics_description: Shaco's **Backstab** is a passive ability that automatically triggers when he attacks an enemy from behind. This passive offensively enhances his auto-attacks, dealing bonus magic damage.
abilities.original_description: Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.

abilities.name: Deceive
abilities.mechanics_description: Shaco's **Deceive** is a blink (short-range teleport) that grants him temporary bonus damage on his next auto-attack. He uses this ability offensively to quickly close distance and execute a powerful surprise attack.
abilities.original_description:
Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and critically striking if he attacks from behind. Shaco teleports and becomes Invisible for {{ stealthduration }} seconds. Using Jack In The Box or Hallucinate does not break Invisibility.

Shaco's next Attack while Invisible deals an additional {{ totaldamage }} physical damage. If striking from behind, this Attack critically strikes for {{ qcritdamagemod }} damage.

abilities.name: Jack In The Box
abilities.mechanics_description: **Jack in the Box (W)** is a **placeable trap** that, once triggered by a nearby enemy, leaps out and fears them after a short delay, dealing magic damage. This ability is primarily used for **utility and defense**, creating zoning tools, providing crowd control, and setting up ambushes or escapes.
abilities.original_description:
Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies. Shaco creates a trap that stealths itself after {{ e5 }} seconds and lasts for {{ trapduration }} seconds. It activates when an enemy comes near or when revealed, Fearing nearby enemy Champions for {{ fearduration }} seconds, or {{ minionfearduration }} seconds for minions and jungle monsters.

Once activated, the trap fires at all nearby enemies for 5 seconds, dealing {{ aoedamage }} magic damage, or {{ stdamage }} damage if focused on a single target.

Jack in the Box's attacks deal an additional {{ monsterbonusdamage }} damage to monsters.

abilities.name: Two-Shiv Poison
abilities.mechanics_description: Shaco's Two-Shiv Poison is an auto-attack enhancement, making his next basic attack **automatically trigger on a single target** (auto-target). It is used offensively to deal bonus magic damage and apply a potent slow debuff to the target.
abilities.original_description:
Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their Move Speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage if the target is below 30% health. Passive: While this Ability is off Cooldown, Shaco's Attacks Slow the target by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ slowdurationpassive }} seconds.

Active: Shaco throws a shiv, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ slowdurationactive }} seconds. If the target has less than {{ executehealththreshold*100 }}% Health, the shiv deals {{ totalexecutedamage }} damage instead.

abilities.name: Hallucinate
abilities.mechanics_description: Hallucinate is an **auto-target** ability used both **offensively and defensively**. Upon activation, Shaco creates a clone of himself that runs towards Shaco's current location and explodes after a short delay, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. The clone can also draw enemy turret aggro and be targeted by abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies. Shaco briefly disappears, then reappears with a clone that lasts {{ clonelifetime }} seconds and detonates when it dies, dealing {{ explosiontotaldamage }} magic damage and spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes that trigger immediately. The clone deals {{ cloneaadamagepercent*100 }}% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ cloneincomingdamagepercent*100 }}% increased damage.

Mini Jack in the Boxes deal {{ aoedamage }} magic damage, or {{ stdamage }} magic damage if firing at only one enemy, and Fear for {{ boxfearduration }} second.

abilities.name: Hextech Capacitor
abilities.mechanics_description: Hextech Capacitor is a passive ability that automatically grants Jayce a temporary movement speed boost after he **switches between his Hammer Stance and his Acceleration Gate combo**. This passive serves a **utility** purpose, aiding in engagement, disengagement, or repositioning.
abilities.original_description: When Jayce swaps weapons he gains Move Speed for a short duration.

abilities.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
abilities.mechanics_description: Jayce's To the Skies! (Ranged stance) is a linear skillshot fired from his hammer that damages the first enemy hit and applies a stacking slow. Shock Blast (Melee stance) is a point-and-click ability that allows Jayce to dash to a targeted location, dealing damage to enemies upon arrival.
abilities.original_description:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit. Mercury Hammer: Jayce leaps to an enemy, dealing {{ spell.jaycetotheskies:damage }} physical damage to surrounding enemies and Slowing them by {{ spell.jaycetotheskies:slow*-100 }}% for {{ spell.jaycetotheskies:slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
abilities.mechanics_description: Jayce's ultimate, **Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer**, is a stance-swap ability that instantly switches him between his ranged Hammer stance and melee Cannon stance. This transformation allows him to either reposition for a ranged engagement with the Cannon's enhanced poke and potential for knocking enemies back, or to enter melee range with the Hammer, granting him increased defense and additional AoE damage on his next attack.
abilities.original_description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage. Mercury Hammer: Jayce transforms his weapon into the Mercury Cannon, gaining Attack Range and new Abilities. Jayce's next Attack removes {{ spell.jaycestancehtg:rangedformshred }} Armor and Magic Resist for {{ spell.jaycestancehtg:shredduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Lightning Field is a **toggle** ability that Jayce can activate on his To Hammer stance. While active, it passively pulses **shockwave damage** to nearby enemies, increasing with each enemy hit, and allows him to **auto-target** subsequent melee attacks with bonus magic damage. It is primarily used **offensively** for sustained damage in melee range and to enhance his overall burst potential.
abilities.original_description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks. Mercury Hammer - Passive: Jayce's Hammer Attacks grant {{ spell.jaycestaticfield:managain }} Mana.

Mercury Hammer - Active: Jayce creates an electric aura dealing {{ spell.jaycestaticfield:damage }} magic damage over {{ spell.jaycestaticfield:duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Thundering Blow (Hammer Stance):** A short-range, linear skillshot that knocks the target back and deals damage. It's primarily used offensively to create space or interrupt channels, but can also be used defensively to peel for oneself or allies.

**Acceleration Gate (To Hammer Stance):** Creates a linear gate on the ground that buffs Jayce's next basic attack or Shock Blast (Q) if he passes through it. This ability is purely offensive, significantly increasing the damage and range of his next projectile attack.
abilities.original_description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Move Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase. Hammer Form: Jayce swings his hammer, Knocking Back his target and dealing {{ spell.jaycethunderingblow:flatdamage }} plus {{ spell.jaycethunderingblow:perchpdamage*100 }}% max Health magic damage.

abilities.name: Bellows Breath
abilities.mechanics_description: Ornn unleashes a horizontal cone of fire in front of him. This ability is a **cone skillshot** used **offensively** to deal damage and apply a debuff to enemies, setting them up for his other abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle. Ornn stomps forward Unstoppably while breathing fire, dealing {{ maxpercenthpperticktooltip }}% max Health magic damage over {{ breathduration }} seconds. Enemies hit by the final bout of flame become Brittle for {{ brittleduration }} seconds.

Immobilizing effects on Brittle targets have their duration increased by 30% and deal an additional {{ brittlepercentmaxhpcalc }} max Health magic damage. Ornn's Attacks against Brittle targets Knock them Back, dealing the additional damage.

abilities.name: Living Forge
abilities.mechanics_description: Ornn's Living Forge is a passive ability. He can **craft items** (including components) at any location on the map, and these items are **automatically added to his inventory** when he is near them. This passive provides him with a strong **utility** and **offensive** advantage by allowing him to upgrade his own items and buy new ones without returning to base.
abilities.original_description:
Ornn gains an additional bonus Armor and Magic Resist from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, he can create masterwork items for himself and for his allies.

abilities.name: Volcanic Rupture
abilities.mechanics_description: Volcanic Rupture is a linear skillshot that damages and **slows** enemies hit, creating a hazard area that deals damage upon detonation. Ornn can also **recast** the ability to dash towards the hazard, **knocking up** enemies in his path and dealing damage. This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and crowd control in lane or during engages.
abilities.original_description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location. Ornn slams the ground, creating a fissure dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. A pillar of rock forms at the fissure's end for {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Searing Charge
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Searing Charge (E) - Ornn**

Searing Charge is a linear skillshot that Ornn fires forward, dealing damage to enemies hit. If Searing Charge hits terrain, Ornn will instead perform a short dash forward, breaking the terrain and knocking up enemies in a small radius around him. This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and crowd control, but the dash can also be used defensively for repositioning or engaging.
abilities.original_description:
Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies. Ornn charges, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage. If Ornn rams into terrain, he creates a shockwave that Knocks Up enemies for {{ knockupduration }} seconds and applies the same damage to those not hit by the charge.

Ornn's charge destroys magma pillars and terrain created by enemies.

abilities.name: Call of the Forge God
abilities.mechanics_description: Ornn slams the ground, sending a linear skillshot magma ram forward that knocks back enemies it passes through and damages them. He can then recast the ability to dash forward, stopping at the first champion or large monster hit, dealing damage and grounding all enemies in an area around him. This ability is used offensively for damage and crowd control, and defensively to ground enemies and create space.
abilities.original_description:
Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle. Ornn summons a massive lava elemental, which stampedes towards him, dealing {{ rdamagecalc }} magic damage, applying Brittle to, and Slowing enemies hit by {{ rslowpercentbasepremath }}% for {{ brittledurationtooltiponly }} seconds.

Ornn can Recast to dash with a headbutt. If he dashes into the elemental, he redirects and empowers it, causing it to Knock Up the first champion for {{ rstunduration }} second and subsequent champions for {{ minstun }} seconds. The elemental also deals {{ rdamagecalc }} magic damage and reapplies Brittle.

abilities.name: Thundering Shuriken
abilities.mechanics_description: Kennen's Thundering Shuriken is a linear skillshot that damages the first enemy hit and applies a mark. This mark is crucial for Kennen's trading patterns, as hitting an enemy with three of his abilities or auto-attacks will stun them.
abilities.original_description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits. Kennen throws a shuriken, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Mark of the Storm
abilities.mechanics_description: Mark of the Storm is an auto-target passive that applies a mark to enemies hit by Kennen's abilities or basic attacks. After accumulating three marks on a single target, the enemy is stunned and takes bonus magic damage.
abilities.original_description: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.

abilities.name: Electrical Surge
abilities.mechanics_description: Kennen's Electrical Surge (W) is a passive ability that, after activating, causes his next basic attack or ability to deal bonus magic damage and mark the target with a stack of **Lightning Rush**. This mark empowers his subsequent basic attacks and abilities to strike up to 3 nearby enemies for the same bonus damage and apply another mark, spreading the damage and mark application rapidly.
abilities.original_description:
Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked. Passive: Every 5th Attack deals an additional {{ totaldamagepassive }} magic damage.

Active: Kennen sends out a blast of electricity, dealing {{ totaldamageactive }} magic damage to nearby enemies affected by Mark of the Storm.

abilities.name: Slicing Maelstrom
abilities.mechanics_description: Slicing Maelstrom is a circular skillshot that Kennen channels, creating a storm that grows in radius around him over its duration. It is primarily used offensively for area-of-effect (AoE) damage and crowd control (CC) in the form of stuns if enemies are hit by multiple marks.
abilities.original_description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage. Kennen unleashes a magical storm, dealing <magicDamage>{{ pertickdamagecalculated }} magic damage</magicDamage> to all nearby enemies every {{ kennenrtickrate }} seconds, and gaining <scaleArmor>{{ kennenrdefenses }} Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>{{ kennenrdefenses }} Magic Resist</scaleMR> for {{ kennenrduration }} seconds. Successive hits deal {{ damageamp*100 }}% increased damage for each hit the enemy has already suffered.

abilities.name: Lightning Rush
abilities.mechanics_description:
## Kennen - Lightning Rush (E)

Lightning Rush is a **dash** that Kennen uses offensively to close gaps and deal damage, and defensively to reposition or escape. Upon activation, Kennen transforms into lightning, becoming **untargetable** and gaining **movement speed** as he rushes forward, dealing magic damage to all enemies passed through. This ability can also **mark enemies with a stack of Kennen's passive, Mark of the Storm**, if they are hit by the rush.
abilities.original_description:
Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains Move Speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it. Kennen turns into a ball of lightning, gaining {{ movementspeed*100 }}% Move Speed, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemies he passes through, and becoming Ghosted for {{ durationasball }} seconds. If Kennen damages at least one enemy, he gains {{ energyrefund }} Energy.

After this ability ends, Kennen gains {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ durationafterball }} seconds. Kennen can Recast to end this Ability early.

abilities.name: Living Vengeance
abilities.mechanics_description: Living Vengeance is a **passive** ability that does not require direct player input to activate. Instead, it **automatically triggers** upon killing an enemy unit, granting Varus a temporary boost to his attack speed. This passive is primarily used **offensively** by increasing Varus's damage output and allowing for faster wave clear or sustained damage in fights.
abilities.original_description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Damage and Ability Power. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

abilities.name: Piercing Arrow
abilities.mechanics_description: **Piercing Arrow (Q)** is a linear skillshot that Varus charges up to increase its range and damage. It can be used offensively to deal significant damage from a distance or to apply his passive stacks, and it can pierce through targets, hitting multiple enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire. Begin Charging: Varus draws back his next shot, Slowing himself by {{ e7 }}%. After {{ e5 }} seconds, if not fired, Varus will cancel the Ability and refund {{ e4 }}% of its Mana cost.

Release: Varus releases the arrow, dealing {{ totaldamagemintooltip }} physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum {{ e9 }}%). Damage and Blight detonation effects are increased by up to {{ maxchargeamp*100 }}% based on charge time (maximum {{ totaldamagemax }}) .

abilities.name: Chain of Corruption
abilities.mechanics_description: Varus fires a piercing bolt as a **linear skillshot**. If it hits an enemy champion, it deals damage and roots them, then chains to two additional nearby enemy champions, dealing damage and slowing them.
abilities.original_description:
Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact. Varus flings out a tendril of corruption, Rooting the first champion hit for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. Rooted enemies gain {{ e4 }} Blight stacks over the duration.

The corruption spreads from its target to uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and Root.

abilities.name: Hail of Arrows
abilities.mechanics_description: Hail of Arrows is a linear skillshot that detonates on impact with an enemy or at its maximum range, dealing magic damage and slowing all enemies hit. It is primarily used offensively to damage and zone enemies, or defensively to create space and disengage.
abilities.original_description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Move Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration. Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds, <status>Slowing</status> enemies by {{ slowpercent*-100 }}% and applying {{ grievousamount*100 }}% Grievous Wounds.

abilities.name: Blighted Quiver
abilities.mechanics_description: Blighted Quiver is a passive ability that imbues Varus's basic attacks and other abilities with bonus magic damage and applies Blight stacks. When Varus lands abilities on an enemy with Blight stacks, he consumes them to deal additional magic damage based on the number of stacks.
abilities.original_description:
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow. Passive: Varus' Attacks deal an additional {{ onhitdamage }} magic damage and apply a Blight stack for {{ e3 }} seconds (max {{ e4 }} stacks).

Varus' other Abilities detonate Blight stacks dealing {{ percenthpperstack }} max Health magic damage per stack (max {{ maxpercenthpperstack }} max Health damage). Detonating Blight on champions and epic monsters also reduces his basic Abilities' Cooldowns by {{ cdrperblightstack*100 }}% of their Maximum per stack.

Active: Varus' next Piercing Arrow deals an additional {{ qempowerpercenthp }} missing Health magic damage, increased up to {{ maxqempowerpercenthp }} missing Health damage based on charge time.

abilities.name: Staggering Blow
abilities.mechanics_description: Nautilus's passive, **Staggering Blow**, is a *self-applied debuff* that activates after he casts an ability. His *next basic attack* against an enemy champion will mark them, dealing bonus magic damage and *stunning them* briefly. This passive is used *offensively* to initiate combat and *apply crowd control*.
abilities.original_description: Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.

abilities.name: Titan's Wrath
abilities.mechanics_description: Titan's Wrath grants Nautilus a shield and empowers his next basic attack to deal bonus magic damage and slow the target. This ability is an auto-target, making it a reliable tool for both offensive pressure and defensive survivability.
abilities.original_description: Nautilus gains a temporary Shield.  While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies. Nautilus gains a <shield>{{ shieldcalc }} Shield</shield> for {{ shieldduration }} seconds. While the <shield>Shield</shield> persists, Nautilus' Attacks deal an additional <magicDamage>{{ dotdamagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage> over 2 seconds to his target and all surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Dredge Line
abilities.mechanics_description: Dredge Line is a linear skillshot that Nautilus throws in a direction, tethering him to the first enemy champion or large monster hit. This tether deals magic damage and roots the target, allowing Nautilus to then reactivate the ability to pull himself towards them.
abilities.original_description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and Nautilus together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls Nautilus towards it. Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy, Nautilus drags himself and the target together, dealing <magicDamage>{{ qdamagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Stunning</status> them briefly. If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself towards it.

abilities.name: Depth Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Nautilus' Depth Charge is a linear skillshot that detonates on the first enemy champion hit, dealing damage and knocking them up. The detonation sends out shockwaves that damage and slow all enemies in a small radius around the target.
abilities.original_description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them. Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing <magicDamage>{{ primarytargetdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Up</status> and <status>Stunning</status> them for {{ stunduration }} seconds. Other enemies hit by the shockwave are also <status>Knocked Up</status> and <status>Stunned</status> and take <magicDamage>{{ secondarytargetdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.mechanics_description: Riptide is a **skillshot** that Nautilus throws, creating a damaging and slowing wave that travels outwards in a **cone** from his anchored position. It's primarily used **offensively** to deal damage and apply a slow to multiple enemies, and can also be used **defensively** to disengage by slowing pursuing enemies.
abilities.original_description: Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself. Each explosion damages and slows enemies. Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself, each dealing <magicDamage>{{ damagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage> to enemies in the area and <status>Slows</status> them by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% decaying over {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Junkyard Titan
abilities.mechanics_description: Rumble's passive, "Junkyard Titan," is a constant effect that builds Heat as he uses his other abilities. Managing this Heat is crucial, as entering the "Danger Zone" (above 50 Heat) empowers his next basic attack to deal bonus magic damage and slow enemies.
abilities.original_description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, gaining bonus Attack Speed and granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Scrap Shield
abilities.mechanics_description: Rumble's Scrap Shield is a self-cast ability that instantly grants him a shield. It is used defensively to mitigate incoming damage and survive burst engagements.
abilities.original_description:
Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased. Rumble tosses up a barrier, gaining {{ totalshield }} Shield for {{ shieldduration.1 }} seconds and {{ movespeed*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ movespeedduration }} second.

Danger Zone: The barrier grants {{ empoweredshield }} Shield and {{ empoweredms }} Move Speed instead.

abilities.name: Flamespitter
abilities.mechanics_description: Flamespitter is a **cone-shaped skillshot** that Rumble projects in front of him, dealing sustained magic damage to enemies hit. It's primarily used **offensively** to apply pressure, zone enemies in teamfights, and deal consistent damage, especially when Rumble is in his Danger Zone.
abilities.original_description:
Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased. Rumble ignites his flamethrower, dealing {{ flatdamage }} plus {{ healthdamage*100 }}% max Health magic damage over {{ flamespitterduration }} seconds, reduced to {{ minionmod*100 }}% against minions.

Danger Zone: Damage is increased to {{ empowereddamage }} plus {{ empoweredhealth }} max Health.

Percent damage is limited to {{ monstercap }} damage on Monsters.

abilities.name: The Equalizer
abilities.mechanics_description: The Equalizer is a targeted skillshot that Rumble launches himself into the air from, crashing down at a target location to create a zone of flame. This ability is primarily used offensively for massive AoE damage and area denial, but can also provide a defensive repositioning tool.
abilities.original_description:
Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies. Rumble launches a line of rockets, creating a burning trail that lasts {{ trailduration }} seconds, Slowing by {{ slowamount }}% and dealing {{ damagepersecond }} magic damage per second.

Rumble can control the direction of the trail by clicking and dragging while casting this Ability.

abilities.name: Electro Harpoon
abilities.mechanics_description: Electro Harpoon is a linear skillshot that Rumble fires forward, dealing magic damage and applying a mark to enemies hit. Enemies marked by the harpoon are slowed, and Rumbles next basic attack against them will consume the mark to deal bonus magic damage.
abilities.original_description:
Rumble launches a harpoon, electrocuting his target with magic damage, slowing their Move Speed, and reducing their Magic Resist. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased. Rumble launches an electrified harpoon, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage, Slowing by {{ baseslowamount }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds, and reducing the enemy's Magic Resist by {{ percmagicpen*100 }}% for {{ shredduration }} seconds.

Hitting an enemy who's already Slowed by this Ability increases the Slow to {{ empoweredslowamount }}% and reduces the enemy's Magic Resist by {{ enhancedmagicpen*100 }}%

Danger Zone: The harpoon deals {{ empdamage }} magic damage instead and the Slow and reduced Magic Resist are increased by 50%.

abilities.name: Darkness Rise
abilities.mechanics_description: Mordekaiser's **Darkness Rise** is a toggled passive AoE ability. While active, it deals damage over time to nearby enemies and empowers Mordekaiser's basic attacks to deal additional magic damage, functioning offensively to increase his sustained damage output in combat.
abilities.original_description: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.
