He can collect these spirits to empower his auto-attacks with bonus magic damage and movement speed, providing a mix of offensive potential and enhanced mobility.
abilities.original_description:
Meeps: Bard attracts lesser spirits that assist with his basic attacks to deal extra magic damage. When Bard has collected enough Chimes, his meeps will also deal damage in an area and slow enemies hit.

Chimes: Ancient chimes randomly appear for Bard to collect. These grant experience, restore mana, and provide out of combat Move Speed.

abilities.name: Cosmic Binding
abilities.mechanics_description: Cosmic Binding is a skillshot that travels in a straight line, dealing magic damage and stunning the first enemy champion hit. If the projectile hits a wall or another enemy champion after the first, it will bind both the initial target and the second target (or the intersection point with the wall) together with a stun that lasts longer if they are kept apart. This ability is primarily used for offensive crowd control and setting up plays.
abilities.original_description:
Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both. Bard fires an energy bolt, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first two enemies hit. The first target hit is Slowed by {{ slowamountpercentage }}% for {{ slowduration }}s.

If the bolt hits a second enemy or a wall, any enemies hit are Stunned for {{ stunduration }}s.

abilities.name: Magical Journey
abilities.mechanics_description: Magical Journey is a **skillshot** that allows Bard to create a portal between two walls. After casting, allies and enemies can **travel through the portal at increased speed** once it's created, offering both **offensive engage/escape** and **defensive repositioning**.
abilities.original_description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal. Bard opens a one-way portal through Terrain for {{ e1 }} seconds. Any champion can enter the portal by moving onto it while near the entrance.

abilities.name: Tempered Fate
abilities.mechanics_description: Tempered Fate is a circular skillshot that, upon landing, stuns all champions and neutral monsters within its area of effect for a short duration. Enemies caught inside are invulnerable during the stun, making it a powerful tool for engaging, disengaging, or setting up plays but requiring careful timing to avoid accidentally making enemies invulnerable.
abilities.original_description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time. Bard hurls magical protective energy to an area, placing all units and structures hit into Stasis for {{ rstasisduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Concussive Blows
abilities.mechanics_description: Braum's Concussive Blows is an auto-target passive that applies a stack of Concussive Blows to enemies with his attacks and abilities. After three stacks, the enemy is stunned for a duration.
abilities.original_description:
Braum's basic attacks apply Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, ally basic attacks also stack Concussive Blows.

Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is stunned and takes magic damage. For the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks, but take bonus magic damage from Braum's attacks.

abilities.name: Stand Behind Me
abilities.mechanics_description: **Stand Behind Me (W):** Braum dashes a moderate distance to a targeted allied champion. This ability is primarily defensive, allowing Braum to reposition and protect allies by intercepting incoming projectiles with his ultimate passive.
abilities.original_description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds. Braum leaps to an allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum grants the target <scaleArmor>{{ grantedallyarmor }} Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>{{ grantedallymr }} Magic Resist</scaleMR> for {{ e1 }} seconds. Braum grants himself <scaleArmor>{{ grantedbraumarmor }} Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>{{ grantedbraummr }} Magic Resist</scaleMR> for the same duration.

abilities.name: Winter's Bite
abilities.mechanics_description: Winter's Bite is a linear skillshot that Braum throws, dealing magic damage and applying a slow to the first enemy hit. If Braum hits an enemy with Winter's Bite, his allies can perform a shield-damaging attack on that target, which also provides Braum with increased movement speed towards them.
abilities.original_description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows. Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit and Slowing them by {{ e2 }}% decaying over {{ e5 }} seconds.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

abilities.name: Unbreakable
abilities.mechanics_description: Braum casts "Unbreakable" as a **point-and-click, defensive shield** that is projected in front of him. It blocks the first projectile that hits it, granting him and any allies behind him **damage reduction** from that and subsequent projectiles.
abilities.original_description:
Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction. Braum raises his shield for {{ e2 }} seconds, intercepting enemy missiles from the chosen direction, causing them to hit Braum and then be destroyed. The first missile Braum blocks deals no damage, and subsequent projectiles deal {{ e3 }}% reduced damage.

Braum gains {{ e4 }}% Move Speed while his shield is raised.

abilities.name: Glacial Fissure
abilities.mechanics_description: Glacial Fissure is a linear skillshot that Braum targets and sends out in a straight line, knocking up and damaging enemies hit. It also leaves behind a slowing field of ice, making it a powerful tool for initiating fights, isolating targets, or peeling for allies.
abilities.original_description:
Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies. Braum slams the ground sending forth a fissure that Knocks Up enemies in its path and nearby Braum, and deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. The first target hit is Knocked Up for between {{ minknockup }} and {{ maxknockup }} seconds, increasing with distance from Braum. All others hit are Knocked Up for {{ minknockup }} seconds.

The fissure also creates a zone for {{ slowzoneduration }} seconds, that Slows by {{ movespeedmod }}%.

abilities.name: Call of the Freljord
abilities.mechanics_description: **Call of the Freljord (Passive):** Nunu & Willump's auto-attacks and abilities apply a "Marked for the Hunt" debuff to enemy champions and large monsters. If Nunu's basic attack hits a marked target, Willump deals bonus magic damage. This passive enhances Nunu & Willump's sustained damage and trading potential in lane.
abilities.original_description: Nunu increases the attack speed and Move Speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.mechanics_description: Nunu & Willump's Q, Consume, is a point-and-click ability that damages and applies a brief slow to a target monster or minion, dealing significantly more damage to monsters, executing them if their health is below a certain threshold. It provides Nunu & Willump with a heal based on the damage dealt, making it a primary tool for sustain in the jungle.
abilities.original_description:
Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself. Nunu asks Willump to take a bite of an enemy, dealing {{ monsterminiondamage }} true damage and restoring {{ monsterhealing }} Health when used against a minion or jungle monster. Against a champion, it instead deals {{ totalchampiondamage }} magic damage and restores {{ championhealing }} Health.

The healing is increased by {{ lowhealthhealingscalar*100 }}% when Nunu and Willump are below {{ lowhealththreshhold*100 }}% Health.

abilities.name: Absolute Zero
abilities.mechanics_description: Absolute Zero is a channeled, circular AoE skillshot that Nunu & Willump begins channeling on themselves. The longer they channel, the larger the area becomes and the more damage it deals, slowing enemies within its radius and culminating in a large burst of damage and a stun if the channel completes or is recast.
abilities.original_description:
Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end. Nunu and Willump channel a powerful blizzard for up to {{ channelduration }} seconds. Enemies inside are Slowed by {{ slowstartamount*-100 }}%, increasing to {{ maxslowamount*-100 }}% over the duration. Nunu and Willump also gain {{ totalshieldamount }} Shield for the duration before decaying over {{ shielddecayduration }} seconds afterwards.

When the blizzard ends, it detonates, dealing up to {{ maximumdamage }} magic damage based on channel time. Nunu and Willump can Recast to end the blizzard early.

abilities.name: Snowball Barrage
abilities.mechanics_description: Snowball Barrage is a skillshot that Nunu & Willump roll a snowball forward, slowing and damaging enemies hit. The snowball grows in size and power as it travels, consuming minions and monsters, and can be steered slightly. It's primarily used **offensively** for damage and crowd control, and **utility** to zone enemies or secure objectives with its increasing size and knockback potential on collision.
abilities.original_description:
Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies. When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball. Nunu throws three snowballs, dealing {{ totalsnowballdamage }} magic damage per snowball and Slowing enemies hit by all three by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} second. Nunu can Recast this up to twice more.

After {{ totalspellduration }} seconds, Nunu Roots all nearby enemies that had been Slowed by the snowballs for {{ rootduration }} seconds and deals an additional {{ totalrootdamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
abilities.mechanics_description: "Biggest Snowball Ever!" is a linear skillshot that Nunu & Willump steerable for a short duration. The snowball grows in size and speed as it travels, damaging and knocking aside enemies it hits.
abilities.original_description:
Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it. The snowball damages and knocks up enemies. Nunu and Willump create a snowball that grows in size and speed as they roll it. They turn slower while rolling it, but can increase turning speed by holding the turn.

The snowball does between {{ noimpactsnowballdamage }} and {{ maximumsnowballdamage }} magic damage, and Knocks Up for between {{ baseknockupduration }} and {{ maximumstunduration }} seconds when it collides with a champion, large monster or wall. These values scale up with distance rolled.

Nunu and Willump can Recast to let the snowball go early.

abilities.name: Trial by Fire
abilities.mechanics_description: **Trial by Fire (Passive):** Gangplank's passive is an auto-target ability that triggers after he casts a spell. It causes his next few basic attacks to ignite the target, dealing bonus magic damage over time and slowing them.
abilities.original_description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

abilities.name: Remove Scurvy
abilities.mechanics_description: Remove Scurvy is a point-and-click ability that Gangplank uses on himself, removing crowd control effects and healing him over time. It also grants a temporary movement speed buff, making it a versatile tool for escaping danger or chasing down opponents.
abilities.original_description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health. Gangplank consumes a large amount of citrus fruit, removing all <status>Disabling</status> effects and restoring <healing>{{ basehealth }} plus {{ e2 }}% missing Health</healing>.

abilities.name: Parrrley
abilities.mechanics_description: **Parrrley (Q)** is a point-and-click skillshot that Gangplank fires at a target. It deals physical damage and applies on-hit effects, making it a core tool for his offensive damage and farm sustain in lane.
abilities.original_description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed. {{Spell_GangplankQWrapper_Tooltip_{{ gamemodeinteger }}}}

abilities.name: Powder Keg
abilities.mechanics_description: Powder Keg is a deployable trap that Gangplank places on the ground. Enemies who walk near it detonate it, taking damage and being slowed; Gangplank can also auto-attack it to detonate it himself, triggering the same effects. It's primarily used offensively for area denial and burst damage, especially when chained with other kegs or his ultimate.
abilities.original_description:
Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them. Gangplank places a powder keg that can be attacked by Gangplank and enemy champions for {{ e5 }} seconds. When an enemy destroys it, the keg is defused. When Gangplank destroys it, it explodes, Slowing by {{ finalslowamount }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing the Attack's damage, ignoring {{ e0 }}% Armor. Champions take an additional {{ e3 }} physical damage.

Keg health decays every {{ f5 }} seconds. Keg explosions detonate other kegs with overlapping blast zones, but don't deal damage to the same target more than once. Keg explosions triggered by Parrrley will grant the bonus gold for targets killed.

abilities.name: Cannon Barrage
abilities.mechanics_description: Cannon Barrage is a circular skillshot that gangs up on a large area over time, dropping waves of cannonballs that deal damage and slow enemies. It's primarily used offensively to zone enemies in teamfights, secure objectives, or finish off fleeing opponents.
abilities.original_description:
Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies. Gangplank signals his ship to fire {{ totalwavestooltip }} waves of cannonballs anywhere on the map over {{ zoneduration }} seconds. Each wave Slows by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds and deals {{ onewavedamage }} magic damage. Maximum damage: {{ totaldamagetooltip }}

This Ability can be upgraded in the shop via Parrrley.

Fire at Will: Fires 6 additional waves of cannonballs.
Death's Daughter: Fires a Mega-Cannonball that deals {{ deathsdaughterdamage }} true damage and Slows by {{ deathsdaughterslow }}% for {{ deathsdaughterslowduration }} second.
Raise Morale: Allies inside Cannon Barrage gain {{ raisemoralehaste }}% Move Speed for {{ raisemoralehasteduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Draw a Bead
abilities.mechanics_description: "Draw a Bead" is Tristana's passive ability. It functions as an auto-target buff that enhances her auto-attacks, increasing their range as she levels up and accumulates **E - Explosive Charge** stacks on an enemy champion. This is used offensively to gain extended threat range and deal increased damage.
abilities.original_description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

abilities.name: Rapid Fire
abilities.mechanics_description: Tristana's Rapid Fire (Q) is an auto-target ability that, when cast, makes her next few auto-attacks significantly faster for a short duration. It is used offensively to increase her sustained damage output and burst potential.
abilities.original_description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time. Tristana goes full-auto, gaining <attackSpeed>{{ attackspeedmod*100 }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for {{ buffduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Rocket Jump
abilities.mechanics_description: **Rocket Jump (W)** is a targeted dash that allows Tristana to leap to a target location, dealing area damage upon landing. It's primarily used offensively for engagement and repositioning to secure kills or escape dangerous situations.
abilities.original_description:
Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands. Tristana launches herself, dealing {{ landingdamage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ slowmod*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds upon landing.

Champion takedowns and max stack Explosive Charge detonations on champions refresh this Ability's Cooldown.

abilities.name: Explosive Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: **Explosive Charge (E)** is a point-and-click ability Tristana attaches to a target enemy. After a short delay, it detonates, dealing damage and applying a debuff that amplifies Tristana's basic attack damage against the target. This makes it primarily an offensive tool for increasing burst damage and single-target threat.
abilities.original_description:
When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units. Passive: Tristana's Attacks that kill enemies deal {{ passivedamage }} magic damage to surrounding enemies.

Active: Tristana attaches a bomb to an enemy or turret that deals {{ activedamage }} physical damage to surrounding enemies after {{ activeduration }} seconds. The damage is increased by {{ critchanceamp*100 }}% Critical Strike Chance and by {{ activeperstackamp*100 }}% each time Tristana hits an Attack or Ability (max 4 stacks).

At {{ activemaxstacks }} stacks, the bomb explodes immediately (max {{ activemaxdamage }} physical damage).

abilities.name: Buster Shot
abilities.mechanics_description: Tristana's Buster Shot is a linear skillshot that fires a cannonball in a target direction, detonating on the first enemy champion hit. This detonation deals damage and knocks the target back, while also damaging and knocking back any other enemy champions caught in the explosion's radius.
abilities.original_description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled. Tristana fires a massive cannonball, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage> to the target, <status>Knocking Back</status> and <status>Stunning</status> them and surrounding enemies for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Hextech Munitions
abilities.mechanics_description: Hextech Munitions is a passive ability that enhances Corki's basic attacks. When activated, it marks targets struck by Corki's auto-attacks, causing subsequent basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage and also adding a small area of effect splash damage around the target.
abilities.original_description: A percentage of Corki's basic attack damage is dealt as bonus <trueDamage>true damage</trueDamage>.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.mechanics_description: Corki's **Valkyrie (W)** is a linear skillshot that Corki targets a location to dash towards, gaining a temporary speed boost upon arrival. It is primarily used for repositioning and mobility, allowing Corki to engage or escape combat.
abilities.original_description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it. Corki flies over and scorches a path, burning it for {{ trailduration }} seconds. Enemies in the fire take up to <magicDamage>{{ maximumdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> over the duration.

abilities.name: Gatling Gun
abilities.mechanics_description: Gatling Gun is a linear skillshot that Corki projects forward, dealing continuous magic damage to all enemies hit. It's best used offensively to melt low-health targets or to pressure enemies during trades and sieges.
abilities.original_description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist. Corki fires a gatling gun in front of him, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> over {{ sprayduration }} seconds and shredding up to <scaleArmor>{{ shredmax*-1 }} Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR>.

abilities.name: Missile Barrage
abilities.mechanics_description: Missile Barrage is a **linear skillshot** that:</br> 1. Corki fires a barrage of missiles in a straight line, hitting the first enemy they encounter.</br> 2. It is used **offensively** for **damage** and can be used repeatedly for sustained pressure.
abilities.original_description:
Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage. Corki fires a missile that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing {{ rsmallmissiledamage }} physical damage to surrounding enemies. Every third missile instead deals {{ rbigmissiledamage }} physical damage.

This Ability has up to {{ maxammotooltip }} charges. Basic attacks against champions reduce the time between charges by {{ attackrefund }} seconds on hit.

abilities.name: Phosphorus Bomb
abilities.mechanics_description: Corki's Phosphorus Bomb (Q) is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage and applies a debuff that reduces the magic resistance of affected enemies. It is primarily used offensively to deal damage and amplify the effectiveness of subsequent magic damage.
abilities.original_description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration. Corki lobs a bomb, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. The area and champions hit are revealed for {{ revealduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Void Shift
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Shift is a passive ability that **automatically** grants Malzahar a **spell shield** after not taking damage from enemy champions for a short duration. This defensive shield **blocks the next enemy ability** and can be used to **mitigate incoming crowd control or damage**.
abilities.original_description: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.

abilities.name: Call of the Void
abilities.mechanics_description: Call of the Void is a linear skillshot that damages and silences the first enemy hit. Malzahar uses this offensively to deal damage and disrupt enemy spellcasting, setting up further damage or escapes.
abilities.original_description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions. Malzahar opens two portals to the Void that fire projectiles inward, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Silencing</status> for {{ e2 }} second(s).

abilities.name: Void Swarm
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Swarm is an auto-targeting ability that Malzahar uses offensively to rapidly summon voidlings that attack nearby enemies. Its primary usage is for sustained damage, pushing objectives, and applying pressure through its persistent threat.
abilities.original_description:
Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies. Passive: Malzahar's other Abilities give him a stack when cast (max {{ stackcap }}).

Active: Malzahar summons a Voidling plus an additional Voidling per stack. Voidlings last {{ voidlingduration }} seconds and deal {{ voidlingbonusdamagetooltip }} magic damage each hit.

abilities.name: Malefic Visions
abilities.mechanics_description: Malzahar fires a linear skillshot that deals magic damage and applies **Malefic Visions**. If the target dies while under the **Malefic Visions** debuff, the cooldown is reset and the spell can be cast again immediately. This ability is primarily used offensively for sustained damage and to spread to multiple targets through kills.
abilities.original_description:
Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units. Malzahar inflicts terrible visions, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage over {{ duration }} seconds. Applying Call of the Void or Nether Grasp to the victim during this time refreshes the visions.

If the victim dies, Malzahar gains {{ manarestore }} Mana and the visions spread to the nearest enemy.

Malefic Visions executes minions below {{ minionexecutethreshold }} Health.

abilities.name: Nether Grasp
abilities.mechanics_description: Nether Grasp is a point-and-click suppression that silences and damages the target enemy champion over its duration. It is used offensively to lock down a high-priority target for Malzahar and his team to kill.
abilities.original_description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy. Malzahar <status>Suppresses</status> an enemy champion and deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage</magicDamage> over {{ e4 }} seconds. A zone of negative energy is created around his target dealing <magicDamage>{{ zonedamagetooltip }} max Health magic damage</magicDamage> over {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Explosive Cask
abilities.mechanics_description: Gragas hurls his cask in a target direction, exploding on impact for area damage and knocking back enemies. The cask bounces once before exploding, allowing for more dynamic line skillshots and potential plays where Gragas can follow up his target for a secondary knock-up with his bodyguard.
abilities.original_description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius. Gragas hurls his cask, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damagedone }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Knocking Away</status> enemies from the impact zone.

abilities.name: Happy Hour
abilities.mechanics_description: Happy Hour is a passive ability that does not require direct activation. When Gragas drinks a Potion (from his ultimate or consuming a Legendary item), he heals for a percentage of his maximum health. This ability is used defensively as a self-heal, providing sustain in and out of combat.
abilities.original_description: Gragas periodically heals upon using a skill.

abilities.name: Body Slam
abilities.mechanics_description: Gragas's Body Slam is a **pointed skillshot** that Gragas throws himself forward in a line, dealing damage and **knocking aside** enemies he passes through. If Gragas **collides with an enemy**, he stops immediately on them, dealing bonus damage and **stunning** them, making it a versatile engage or disengage tool that can be used offensively for damage and CC, or defensively for repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them. Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy, Knocking Up nearby enemies for {{ stunduration }} second and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to them.

This Ability's Cooldown is reduced by {{ cooldownrefund*100 }}% if Gragas collides with an enemy.

abilities.name: Barrel Roll
abilities.mechanics_description: Barrel Roll is a **linear skillshot** that Gragas throws a barrel forward, exploding to deal damage and slow enemies in an area upon hitting an enemy or reaching its maximum range. It's primarily used **offensively** for poke and damage, with the slow offering some utility for engaging or disengaging.
abilities.original_description:
Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. The potency of the explosion increases over time. Enemies struck by the blast have their Move Speed slowed. Gragas rolls a cask that explodes after {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing between {{ mindamage }} magic damage and {{ maxdamage }} magic damage and Slowing for between {{ e2 }} and {{ effect2amount*1.5 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. The damage and Slow increase with time the cask spent before exploding.

Gragas can Recast to detonate the cask early.

abilities.name: Drunken Rage
abilities.mechanics_description: Drunken Rage is a self-cast ability that Gragas drinks from his barrel, granting him damage reduction and empowering his next damaging ability to deal bonus magic damage. It is a self-cast **toggle** used defensively to mitigate incoming damage and offensively for a burst damage advantage on his next **skillshot** or **AoE** ability.
abilities.original_description: Gragas samples his latest brew for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes boisterous and belligerent, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received. Gragas samples his brew, reducing incoming damage by {{ damagereduction }} for {{ defenseduration }} seconds and empowering his next Attack to deal an additional <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }}</magicDamage> plus <magicDamage>{{ maxhppercentdamage }}% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> to the target and surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Blinding Dart
abilities.mechanics_description: Blinding Dart is a **skillshot** that Teemo throws in a straight line. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it deals a small amount of magic damage and applies a **debuff** that causes them to miss their auto-attacks for a duration, making it primarily used **offensively** to disrupt enemy damage output.
abilities.original_description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration. Teemo fires a dart, <status>Blinding</status> the target for {{ blindduration }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ calculateddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Guerrilla Warfare
abilities.mechanics_description: **Guerrilla Warfare (Passive):** When Teemo stays out of combat for a few seconds while in a bush, he becomes **stealthed**. While stealthed, his next basic attack after breaking stealth deals bonus magic damage. This ability is auto-targeted as stealth is passively applied, and its usage is primarily offensive to initiate with bonus damage or defensively to escape.
abilities.original_description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Move Quick
abilities.mechanics_description: Move Quick is a **toggle** ability that, when activated, grants Teemo **bonus movement speed** and allows him to **pass through units**. It is primarily used for **utility**, enabling him to reposition, chase enemies, or escape danger more effectively.
abilities.original_description:
Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Move Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Move Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time. Passive: Teemo gains {{ passivemovespeedbonus*100 }}% Move Speed while he hasn't been damaged by a champion or turret in the last {{ passivecooldownondamagetaken }} seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining {{ activemovespeedbonus*100 }}% Move Speed that is not lost when struck for {{ activemovespeedbuffduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Noxious Trap
abilities.mechanics_description: Noxious Trap is a **ground-targeted deployable ability** that Teemo places at a target location. When an enemy champion **walks over the mushroom**, it triggers an **Area of Effect poison** that deals damage over time and slows.
abilities.original_description:
Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range. Teemo tosses a mushroom trap that detonates when stepped on. The traps Slow by {{ slowamount }}% and deal {{ totaldamage }} magic damage over {{ debuffduration }} seconds. Enemies are revealed for the same duration.

Traps last {{ mushroomduration }} minutes and are stealthed. A mushroom tossed onto another mushroom bounces before landing at its position. This Ability has {{ maxammo }} charges ({{ ammorechargetime }} second refresh).

abilities.name: Toxic Shot
abilities.mechanics_description: Toxic Shot is a passive ability that applies a poison DoT (damage over time) to Teemo's basic attacks after he casts his other abilities. This makes his auto-attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply a stacking poison debuff to enemies.
abilities.original_description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds. <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Teemo's Attacks apply poison, dealing an additional <magicDamage>{{ impactcalculateddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> plus <magicDamage>{{ totaldotdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> over {{ poisonduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Iceborn Subjugation
abilities.mechanics_description: Lissandra's "Iceborn Subjugation" passive is an auto-target ability that activates after she casts three abilities. It triggers when Lissandra attacks an enemy, dealing bonus magic damage and slowing the target, making it a tool for both offensive pressure and defensive utility.
abilities.original_description: When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after a delay, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Glacial Path
abilities.mechanics_description: Glacial Path is a **skillshot** that Lissandra fires in a line. Upon activation, Lissandra **dashes forward** to its end point, dealing damage and applying a slow to enemies in her path.
abilities.original_description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location. Lissandra casts forth an ice claw that deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Lissandra can <recast>Recast</recast> while the claw travels to teleport to its location.

abilities.name: Ice Shard
abilities.mechanics_description: Ice Shard is a linear skillshot that damages enemies in a line and slows them. It is primarily used offensively for poke damage and to apply a slow for engages or disengages, and secondarily for utility as it can also trigger Lissandra's passive.
abilities.original_description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Move Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit. Lissandra throws a spear of ice that shatters on the first enemy hit, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds, and also damaging and slowing the enemies behind them.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.mechanics_description: Lissandra's **Ring of Frost (W)** is a circular skillshot that deals damage and roots all enemies hit in an area around her after a short delay. It is primarily used offensively to lock down targets for damage or defensively to create space by rooting approaching threats.
abilities.original_description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them. Lissandra creates an ice field, <status>Rooting</status> nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Frozen Tomb
abilities.mechanics_description: Lissandra's ultimate, "Frozen Tomb," is an **auto-targeting ability** that can be self-cast or cast on an enemy. When cast on an enemy, it deals magic damage and **roots** them. When self-cast, Lissandra becomes **untargetable**, heals herself, and creates a slowing field around her, effectively acting as both a defensive tool and an area-of-effect crowd control ability.
abilities.original_description:
If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Move Speed. Lissandra encases herself or an enemy champion in ice. Enemies are Stunned for {{ enemycastduration }} seconds. When self cast, Lissandra enters Stasis for {{ selfcastduration }} seconds and restores {{ healamount }} Health, increased by {{ selfcastmissinghpratio }}% for each {{ selfcastmissinghpperabove }}% missing Health.

In either case, dark ice eminates from the target, dealing {{ calculateddamage }} magic damage. The ice persists for {{ slowduration }} seconds, Slowing enemies by {{ slowamount*-100 }}%.

abilities.name: Nimble Fighter
abilities.mechanics_description: Nimble Fighter is a passive ability that **reduces incoming physical damage** while Fizz is **near enemy champions**. This passive encourages aggressive positioning and trading in lane by providing a defensive buff against auto-attacks and physical damage abilities.
abilities.original_description: Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources

abilities.name: Seastone Trident
abilities.mechanics_description: Seastone Trident is an auto-attack modifier. When activated, Fizz's next three auto-attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply a debuff that causes enemies to bleed, dealing damage over time.
abilities.original_description:
Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time. Passive: Fizz's Attacks cause his enemies to bleed, dealing {{ dotdamage }} magic damage over {{ bleedduration }} seconds.

Active: Fizz's next Attack deals an additional {{ activedamage }} magic damage. If this Attack kills its target, Fizz refunds {{ onkillmanarefund }} Mana and reduces the cooldown of this Ability to {{ onkillnewcooldown }} second. If it does not kill, Fizz's Attacks deal an additional {{ onhitbuffdamage }} magic damage for {{ onhitbuffduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Urchin Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Urchin Strike is a **point-and-click dash** that allows Fizz to **teleport to a target enemy** and deal magic damage, applying a debuff that increases incoming damage from Fizz; it is primarily used **offensively for damage and engagement**.
abilities.original_description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects. Fizz dashes through an enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> plus <magicDamage>{{ qdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Playful / Trickster
abilities.mechanics_description: Fizz's E, Playful / Trickster, is a **dash** that allows him to **leap over his target** in a line. He becomes **untargetable** during this leap, making it a versatile tool for both **offensive repositioning** to deal damage and **defensively dodging** enemy abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down. Fizz hops onto his trident, becoming Untargetable for 0.75 seconds, after which he deals {{ edamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies and Slows them by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Fizz can Recast this Ability while Untargetable to dash again, which ends the effect early, deals damage in a smaller area, and doesn't Slow.

abilities.name: Chum the Waters
abilities.mechanics_description: Chum the Waters is a linear skillshot that allows Fizz to launch a fish at an enemy champion. If it hits, it attaches a *Seastone Trident* to the target, slowing them and marking them for a short duration. Fizz can then dash to the marked target, dealing magic damage and knocking them up if they are still within range when he arrives.
abilities.original_description:
Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed. Fizz launches a fish that attaches to the first champion hit. The victim is afflicted with True Sight and Slowed by between 40% to 80% based on how far the fish travelled before attaching.

After {{ detonationtime }} seconds a shark erupts on the target, Knocking Up the target with the fish for 1 second, Knocking Back everything else, and dealing between {{ smallsharkdamage }} to {{ bigsharkdamage }} magic damage based on how far the fish travelled before attaching.

abilities.name: Soul Siphon
abilities.mechanics_description: **Soul Siphon (Passive):** This is an auto-target passive that offensively applies a stacking debuff on enemies hit by Morgana's abilities. Casting abilities will consume these stacks, dealing bonus magic damage for each stack consumed.
abilities.original_description: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and medium and larger jungler monsters.

abilities.name: Dark Binding
abilities.mechanics_description: Dark Binding is a linear skillshot that Morgana fires out in a target direction. If it hits an enemy champion, it deals magic damage and stuns them for a significant duration, providing strong offensive utility and crowd control.
abilities.original_description: Morgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage.  Morgana hurls a blast of starfire that <status>Roots</status> the first enemy hit for {{ rootduration }} seconds and deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Tormented Shadow
abilities.mechanics_description: Tormented Shadow is a circular skillshot that Morgana throws at a target location. Upon impact, it deals magic damage and applies a debuff to enemies hit, making them take increased magic damage for a short duration, primarily used for offensive pressure and amplifying damage.
abilities.original_description:
Morgana casts a cursed shadow on an area, damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle. They receive magic damage over time, which increases the lower health they are. Morgana ignites the ground for {{ wduration }} seconds, dealing {{ totalmindamage }} magic damage per second, increased by up to {{ totalmaxdamage }} based on the targets' missing Health.

This Ability's Cooldown is reduced by {{ cdrefundpercent*100 }}% every time Morgana is healed by Soul Siphon.

abilities.name: Black Shield
abilities.mechanics_description: Morgana targets an allied champion with a skillshot, granting them a shield that **absorbs incoming magic damage and makes them immune to crowd control effects for its duration.** It is used defensively to protect allies from magical damage and/or lockdown.
abilities.original_description: Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken. Morgana grants an ally champion <shield>{{ totalshieldstrength }} Magic Shield</shield> for {{ shieldduration }} seconds. The shield prevents <status>Disabling</status> and <status>Immobilizing</status> effects until it breaks.

abilities.name: Soul Shackles
abilities.mechanics_description: Soul Shackles is a target-based skillshot requiring careful aiming due to its projectile speed and the need to hit it relatively close to Morgana. It deals initial magic damage and snares enemies, and then deals subsequent damage over time while tethered, further rooting them if they remain within range after the initial duration.
abilities.original_description:
Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining Move Speed. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them. Morgana chains herself to nearby enemy Champions, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slowing them by {{ slowpercent }}%. After {{ chainduration }} seconds, enemies unable to break the chains take an additional {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and are Stunned for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

While casting this Ability, Morgana gains {{ hastepercent }}% Move Speed.

abilities.name: Demon Shade
abilities.mechanics_description: Demon Shade is a passive ability. Evelynn enters **Demon Shade** if she hasn't taken damage from champions or epic monsters within a certain radius from enemies for a few seconds, gaining invisibility and movement speed. This invisibility breaks if she attacks or uses an ability, or if she takes damage from champions or epic monsters.
abilities.original_description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

abilities.name: Allure
abilities.mechanics_description: Evelynn casts a demon shade that charms her target if it connects. This ability is a skillshot that travels in a line and is primarily used for offensive utility, initiating combat by slowing and charming enemies, allowing for follow-up crowd control and damage.
abilities.original_description:
Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist. Evelynn marks a champion or monster for 5 seconds. If Evelynn hits the target with an Attack or Ability, she will expunge the mark, refund its cost, and Slow the target by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If the mark lasts at least 2.5 seconds, expunging it has extra effects:
  • Against champions: Charms them for {{ charmduration }} second(s) and removes {{ mrshred*100 }}% Magic Resist for {{ shredduration }} seconds.
  • Against monsters: Charms them for {{ monstercharm }} seconds and deals {{ monsterdamagetotaltooltip }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Whiplash
abilities.mechanics_description: Evelynn's Whiplash (E) is a **point-and-click** ability that allows her to **dash through her target**, dealing magic damage and applying on-hit effects. It is primarily used **offensively** for consistent damage during fights and to proc her Demonic Embrace passive.
abilities.original_description:
Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains Move Speed for a short duration. Evelynn whips an enemy, dealing {{ basedamage }} plus {{ percenthealthbasetooltip }} max Health magic damage. Evelynn gains {{ speedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ speedduration }} seconds.

Entering Demon Shade refreshes this Ability's cooldown and empowers it. When this Ability is empowered, Evelynn dashes to the target and deals {{ empowereddamage }} plus {{ percenthealthempoweredtooltip }} max Health magic damage to her target and everyone she passes through instead.

abilities.name: Hate Spike
abilities.mechanics_description: Evelynn fires a spike in a target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit. If Hate Spike hits a **demonized** target (from her passive), it deals significantly more damage and refunds a portion of its cooldown.
abilities.original_description:
Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes a few times. Evelynn strikes with her Lasher, dealing {{ missiledamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit and causing Evelynn's next 3 Attacks or Abilities on that unit to deal an additional {{ totalbonusdamage }} magic damage. Evelynn can Recast this Ability up to {{ qstackcount }} times.

Recast: Evelynn fires spikes through the nearest enemy, dealing {{ missiledamage }} magic damage to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Last Caress
abilities.mechanics_description: Evelynn's ultimate, Last Caress, is a targeted area-of-effect ability that Evelynn can cast. She teleports a short distance and deals magic damage to all enemies in a large circle around her final position, executing low-health targets.
abilities.original_description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance. Evelynn unleashes her demonic energy, dealing heavy damage, becoming Untargetable and teleporting backwards. She deals <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, increased to <magicDamage>{{ critdamage }}</magicDamage> against enemies below <healing>30% Health</healing>. Upon cast, set Demon Shade to a 1.25 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Weapon Abilites
abilities.mechanics_description: Aphelios's Q ability, "Weapon Abilities," is unique as its specific function and usage depend entirely on which of his five Lunar Weapons he currently has equipped.  Each weapon transforms his Q into a distinct skillshot or auto-targeting attack that fires unique projectiles for damage, often with added utility like slowing or AoE effects.
abilities.original_description:
Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon:

Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack.
Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons.
Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon.
Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon.
Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

abilities.name: The Hitman and the Seer
abilities.mechanics_description: Aphelios's Passive, **The Hitman and the Seer**, is not actively castable or targetable; it passively grants him increased weapon damage and allows him to swap between his five unique weapons. This passive utility is core to his gameplay, dictating his offensive capabilities and flexibility through weapon combinations.
abilities.original_description: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.

abilities.name: Phase
abilities.mechanics_description: Aphelios's **Phase** is a **point-and-click** ability that **heals** him and provides a **movement speed buff**. It is primarily used **defensively** to sustain through trades or escape dangerous situations.
abilities.original_description: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability. Swap main-hand and off-hand weapons, equipping Gravitum.

abilities.name: Moonlight Vigil
abilities.mechanics_description: Moonlight Vigil is a long-range, linear skillshot that Aphelios fires, dealing damage to the first enemy hit and a lower amount of damage to enemies behind them. It is primarily used offensively to deal significant damage, execute low-health targets, or secure kills from a safe distance.
abilities.original_description:
Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-hand gun. Aphelios fires a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes when it hits a champion, dealing {{ maxdamage }} physical damage to surrounding enemies.

Then, Aphelios attacks all champions hit with his main-hand weapon. {{ Spell_ApheliosR_WeaponMod_{{ f1 }} }}

abilities.name: Weapon Queue System
abilities.mechanics_description: Aphelios' Weapon Queue System (E) is a **passive system** that automatically queues an ability from his off-hand weapon, allowing him to **immediately follow up** his current weapon's attack or ability with the queued ability for **offensive combo potential**. This system is primarily used **offensively** to chain together weapon effects and deal sustained damage or apply multiple debuffs.
abilities.original_description: Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order.

abilities.name: Rage Gene
abilities.mechanics_description: Gnar's Rage Gene is a passive ability that builds Rage over time and when taking damage. When Rage is full, Gnar's next ability costs significantly less Rage, allows him to transform into Mega Gnar, granting him bonus HP, resistances, and enhanced abilities.
abilities.original_description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

abilities.name: Hop / Crunch
abilities.mechanics_description: Hop is a **targeted dash** where Gnar leaps to a target location, dealing damage to enemies he lands near. Crunch is a **point-and-click AoE debuff** that deals damage to enemies in a circle around Gnar, slowing them afterward. Gnar can use Hop offensively to engage or reposition, and Crunch defensively to kite or zone enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him. Mini Gnar: Gnar leaps, gaining {{ spell.gnare:minibas*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ spell.gnare:miniasduration }} seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Bouncing off an enemy deals {{ spell.gnare:minitotaldamage }} physical damage and briefly Slows by {{ spell.gnare:movespeedmod*-100 }}%.

abilities.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Boomerang Throw (Mini Gnar):** This is a linear skillshot that Gnar throws, dealing damage and applying a slow to the first enemy hit. He can then auto-attack or cast another ability to have the boomerang return to him, dealing damage again to enemies it passes through on its way back.

**Boulder Toss (Mega Gnar):** This is a linear skillshot where Mega Gnar tosses a boulder, dealing damage in a line and slowing enemies hit. It then drops, creating a damaging area for a short duration, which Mega Gnar can then optionally auto-attack or cast another ability on to pick up and toss again, extending its range and dealing further damage.
abilities.original_description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown. Mini Gnar: Gnar throws a boomerang that deals {{ spell.gnarq:minitotaldamage }} physical damage and Slows by {{ spell.gnarq:slowamount*100 }}% for {{ spell.gnarq:slowduration }} seconds. The boomerang returns after hitting an enemy, dealing reduced damage to subsequent targets. Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang reduces its Cooldown by {{ spell.gnarq:minicdrefund*100 }}%.

abilities.name: GNAR!
abilities.mechanics_description: **GNAR! (R)** is a circular skillshot from Gnar that deals damage and applies crowd control in an area. When Gnar transforms into Mega Gnar, he can cast this ability to slam the ground, dealing damage and slowing enemies caught in the radius; enemies hit by the edge of the slam also take reduced damage and are briefly knocked back.
abilities.original_description:
Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage. Mini Gnar Passive: Increase Hyper's Move Speed.

Mega Gnar: Gnar tosses nearby enemies, dealing {{ damage }} physical damage, Knocking Back, and Slowing them by {{ rslowpercent }}% for {{ rccduration }} seconds. Enemies that hit a wall instead take {{ walldamage }} physical damage and are Stunned.

abilities.name: Hyper / Wallop
abilities.mechanics_description:
Gnar's **W - Hyper / Wallop** has two forms:

**Mini Gnar (Hyper):** This is a passive ability that stacks on successful attacks and abilities. Once three stacks are achieved, his next basic attack deals bonus magic damage and briefly slows the target.

**Mega Gnar (Wallop):** This is an active, linear skillshot that Gnar slams down. It deals damage in a cone ahead of him and briefly stuns all enemies hit.
abilities.original_description:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Move Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area. Mini Gnar Passive: Every third Attack or Ability on the same enemy deals an additional {{ spell.gnarw:minitotaldamage }} plus {{ spell.gnarw:minipercenthpdamage*100 }}% max Health magic damage and grants {{ spell.gnarr:rhypermovementspeedpercent }}% Move Speed decaying over {{ spell.gnarw:minihasteduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Short Fuse
abilities.mechanics_description: Short Fuse is a passive ability for Ziggs that empowers his next basic attack after casting an ability. It is a point-and-click auto-attack enhancement used offensively to add bonus magic damage and a short knock-back.
abilities.original_description: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

abilities.name: Satchel Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Satchel Charge is a ground-targeted **skillshot** that Ziggs throws a short distance in front of him. Upon landing, it deals magic damage in a small radius, knocking enemies away from the center, which Ziggs can use offensively to push enemies into his other abilities or defensively to create space.
abilities.original_description:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after a delay, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets. Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ bombduration }} seconds, or when this ability is Recast. It deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemies and Knocks them Back. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Satchel Charge will automatically destroy towers below {{ turretdestroypercent*100 }}% of their Health.

abilities.name: Bouncing Bomb
abilities.mechanics_description: Bouncing Bomb is a skillshot that bounces up to five times, dealing magic damage to enemies hit; it's primarily used offensively for poke and burst damage, and can be used defensively to deter enemies from engaging once it has bounced multiple times.
abilities.original_description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage. Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Hexplosive Minefield
abilities.mechanics_description: Hexplosive Minefield is a circular skillshot that Ziggs throws a cluster of mines onto the ground at a target location. Enemies stepping on a mine take magic damage and are knocked up, making it a versatile tool for both setting up offensive engages or peeling for defense.
abilities.original_description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage. Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> by {{ slow*-100 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Mines last {{ mineduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
abilities.mechanics_description: Mega Inferno Bomb is a long-range, circular skillshot that Ziggs hurls towards a target location, dealing massive damage in a large area upon impact and slowing enemies caught in the blast. It is primarily used offensively for wave clear, siege breaking, and finishing off opponents from a safe distance.
abilities.original_description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away. Ziggs hurls his ultimate creation, dealing <magicDamage>{{ empowereddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> in the center of the blast radius, or <magicDamage>{{ blastdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> at the edge.

abilities.name: Blast Shield
abilities.mechanics_description: Blast Shield is a passive ability that automatically applies a shield to Vi after she has recently hit an enemy champion with three basic attacks or abilities. This shield is purely defensive, absorbing incoming damage and allowing Vi to engage more aggressively or survive burst damage during fights.
abilities.original_description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

abilities.name: Vault Breaker
abilities.mechanics_description: Vault Breaker is a linear skillshot that Vi charges up before dashing forward, dealing damage and knocking an enemy to the side upon impact. It's primarily used offensively to initiate fights, secure kills, and apply crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows. Begin Charging: Vi begins charging a powerful punch, Slowing herself by {{ e4 }}%.

Release: Vi dashes forward dealing between {{ totaldamage }} and {{ maxdamagetooltip }} physical damage based on charge time and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit. Vi stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, and Knocks them Back.

abilities.name: Relentless Force
abilities.mechanics_description: Relentless Force is a point-and-click auto-attack reset that deals physical damage and knocks the target back **on impact**. It's primarily used offensively to deal burst damage and disrupt enemy positioning.
abilities.original_description:
Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it. Vi's next Attack deals {{ totaldamagetooltip }} physical damage to the target and enemies behind them.

This Ability has 2 charges ({{ ammorechargetime }} second refresh).

abilities.name: Denting Blows
abilities.mechanics_description: **Denting Blows (W)** is an auto-attack modifier. Upon hitting an enemy champion three times with basic attacks or abilities, Vi applies a debuff that reduces their armor and deals a percentage of their maximum health as damage over time. This buff is primarily initiated through **auto-attack weaving/combos** and is used offensively to **amplify damage** and **shred resistances** for herself and allies.
abilities.original_description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed. <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Every 3rd Attack on the same target deals an additional <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} max Health physical damage</physicalDamage>, removes <scaleArmor>{{ shredamount }}% Armor</scaleArmor> and grants Vi <attackSpeed>{{ attackspeed }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for {{ sharedbuffsduration }} seconds. It also reduces the remaining Cooldown of <spellName>Blast Shield</spellName> by {{ spell.vipassive:cdreductionon3hit }} seconds.

abilities.name: Cease and Desist
abilities.mechanics_description: Vi's ultimate, "Cease and Desist," is a **targeted dash** that locks onto an enemy champion, knocking aside any others in her path and dealing significant damage upon arrival. It's a potent **offensive engage tool** with built-in crowd control that guarantees application on its target.
abilities.original_description:
Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground. Vi singles out an enemy champion, revealing them and dashing unstoppably towards them. Upon reaching them, Vi Knocks them Up for {{ rstunduration }} seconds and deals {{ damage }} physical damage.

Any other enemies Vi collides with are dealt damage, knocked aside, and Stunned for {{ secondarytargetstunduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Ionian Fervor
abilities.mechanics_description: Ionian Fervor is a passive ability. When Irelia hits enemies with her abilities or basic attacks, she gains static stacks of **Ionian Fervor**. At four stacks, she will gain bonus magic damage on all her attacks and abilities until she loses all stacks.
abilities.original_description: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.

abilities.name: Defiant Dance
abilities.mechanics_description: Defiant Dance is a self-cast ability that Irelia channels, becoming untargetable while rapidly attacking a target. She uses it offensively to deal damage and can recast it during the channel to dash through the target's current location, dealing damage again.
abilities.original_description:
Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge. Begin Charging: Irelia enters a defensive stance for up to {{ maxduration }} seconds, becoming unable to act but reducing physical damage taken by {{ finalphysicaldr }}% and magic damage taken by {{ finalmagicdr }}%.

Release: Irelia lashes out with her blades, dealing {{ mindamagecalc }} physical damage increased up to {{ maxdamagecalc }} based on charge time.

abilities.name: Vanguard's Edge
abilities.mechanics_description: Irelia's ultimate, Vanguard's Edge, is a large circular **skillshot** that deals initial damage and applies a debuff to enemies hit. It then leaves behind a zone that slows enemies and empowers Irelia's subsequent dashes, allowing her to dash through marked targets for additional damage and rapid repositioning.
abilities.original_description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it. Irelia launches a barrage of blades, dealing <magicDamage>{{ missiledamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and making champions and large jungle monsters <keywordMajor>Unsteady</keywordMajor> for {{ markduration }} seconds. The barrage explodes into a cage around the first champion hit for {{ zoneduration }} seconds. The cage deals <magicDamage>{{ zonedamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> by {{ slowamount }}% for {{ ccduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Bladesurge
abilities.mechanics_description: **Mechanics & Usage:** Bladesurge is a **skillshot dash** that Irelia launches in a target direction. If it hits an enemy, it deals damage, refunds a portion of its cooldown, and allows Irelia to cast it again within a short window, consuming the target's mark. It's primarily used **offensively** for engaging, chaining attacks, and gap-closing due to its damage and mobility, but can also be used defensively for evasion by targeting minions or neutral monsters.
abilities.original_description:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes. Irelia dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ championdamage }} physical damage and restoring {{ healamount }} Health to herself. If the enemy dies or was Unsteady, the Cooldown is refreshed.

Deals {{ miniondamage }} damage to minions.

abilities.name: Flawless Duet
abilities.mechanics_description: **Flawless Duet (E)** is a linear skillshot that throws two blades, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies hit. If only one blade hits, it slows instead of stunning, making it useful for engaging, disengaging, or setting up further combos.
abilities.original_description:
Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked. Irelia throws a blade into the ground and can Recast for up to {{ buffduration }} seconds.

Recast: Irelia throws a second blade, then they fly towards each other Stunning for {{ stunduration }} seconds and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. Champions and large jungle monsters become Unsteady for {{ markduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Fired Up!
abilities.mechanics_description: Milio's passive, "Fired Up!", is an auto-target ability that enhances his attacks. Once activated, Milio's next empowered attack deals bonus damage and applies a buff to allies hit, increasing their movement speed.
abilities.original_description: Milio's abilities enchant allies on touch, making their next damage deal a burst of extra damage and burn the target.

abilities.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick
abilities.mechanics_description: Milio's Q, Ultra Mega Fire Kick, is a linear skillshot that travels a moderate distance, dealing damage and knocking back enemies hit. It's primarily used offensively to poke, create space, or interrupt enemy actions.
abilities.original_description:
Kick a ball that knocks back an enemy. The ball launches upward on hit and falls toward the enemy, damaging and slowing enemies in the area upon impact. Milio kicks a fireball, Knocking Back the first enemy hit. If it hits, the ball bounces past them and explodes, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage to surrounding enemies and Slowing them by {{ slowamountpercent }} for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Hitting at least one enemy champion with Ultra Mega Fire Kick refunds {{ refundratio*100 }}% of it's Mana cost.

abilities.name: Warm Hugs
abilities.mechanics_description: Milio's "Warm Hugs" (E) is a point-and-click ability targeted on an ally or himself, granting them a burst of movement speed and a shield. This ability is primarily used defensively to help allies reposition safely or escape danger by providing an immediate speed boost and damage mitigation.
abilities.original_description:
Milio tosses a shield to an ally, temporarily increasing their movement speed. This ability has 2 charges. Milio wraps an ally champion in protective flames, granting {{ shieldcalc }} Shield and {{ movespeedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ movespeedduration }} seconds.

This ability has 2 charges and the effects stack on repeat targets.

abilities.name: Cozy Campfire
abilities.mechanics_description: Milio's Cozy Campfire (W) is a deployable, point-and-click ability that creates a circular zone on the ground. Allies within the zone receive enhanced auto-attacks and can attack from outside the zone's range and still receive its benefits, offering a consistent, team-wide buff.
abilities.original_description:
Create an empowering zone that heals allies and increases attack range to those inside. The zone follows the ally nearest to the cast point. Milio creates a hearth that follows ally champions for {{ zoneduration }} seconds. Ally champions nearby gain {{ rangepercent }} Attack Range and restore {{ healingovertime }} Health over the duration. The hearth also applies Fired Up! every {{ healfrequencyseconds }} seconds.

Recast: Change the hearth's follow ally.

abilities.name: Breath of Life
abilities.mechanics_description: Milio's ultimate, Breath of Life, is a circular AoE skillshot that he casts at a target location. It provides an instant heal and a subsequent buff that makes allies shielded by it immune to crowd control for a short duration, making it primarily a defensive and utility tool.
abilities.original_description: Milio unleashes a wave of soothing flames that heal and remove crowd control effects from allies in range. Milio unleashes a wave of soothing flames on nearby ally champions, cleansing <status>Disabling</status> and <status>Immobilizing</status> effects, restoring <healing>{{ healcalc }} Health</healing>, and granting {{ tenacityamount*100 }}% Tenacity for {{ tenacityduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Frost Shot
abilities.mechanics_description: Frost Shot is Ashe's passive ability. It is an **auto-target** effect that **automatically applies** on-hit with her basic attacks and certain abilities. It is used **offensively** and for **utility**, applying a slow to enemies and marking them, which can increase the damage of other abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

abilities.name: Volley
abilities.mechanics_description: Volley is a linear skillshot that Ashe fires out a volley of arrows in a cone, damaging and slowing all enemies hit. It's primarily used offensively to zone enemies, apply damage over time with Frost Shot, and engage or disengage fights.
abilities.original_description: Ashe fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot. Ashe fires a volley of {{ numberofarrowstooltip }} arrows, each dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>. Enemies can be hit by multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.

abilities.name: Ranger's Focus
abilities.mechanics_description: Ranger's Focus is an auto-attack reset that, when activated, allows Ashe to fire a volley of five arrows for a short duration, dealing a percentage of her attack damage per arrow. This ability is primarily used offensively to increase her damage output during trades and all-ins, rewarding players who can land multiple auto-attacks quickly before activating it.
abilities.original_description:
Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration. Passive: Ashe's Attacks grant a stack for {{ e1 }} seconds. At {{ e2 }} stacks, she may activate this Ability.

Active: Ashe gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed and her Attacks deal {{ empowereddamage }} damage instead for {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Hawkshot
abilities.mechanics_description: Hawkshot is a linear skillshot that Ashe sends out, traveling a global distance. It grants vision along its path and damages and slows the first enemy champion it hits, dealing bonus damage based on missing health.
abilities.original_description:
Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map. Ashe sends forth a hawk to grant vision for 5 seconds anywhere on the map. It also reveals the area around it as it flies.

This Ability has 2 charges ({{ chargecooldown }} second recharge).

abilities.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
abilities.mechanics_description: Ashe's Enchanted Crystal Arrow (R) is a global, linear skillshot that travels at increasing speed over distance. It damages the first enemy champion hit, stunning them for an extended duration that increases with distance traveled, and applies a slow to any other enemies passed through.
abilities.original_description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed. Ashe launches a crystal arrow of ice that <status>Stuns</status> the first champion hit and deals <magicDamage>{{ rmaindamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. The <status>Stun</status> duration increases with distance travelled, up to {{ maxstunduration }} seconds. Surrounding enemies are <status>Slowed</status> by <spellName>Frost Shot</spellName>.

abilities.name: Prowl
abilities.mechanics_description: Nidalee's Prowl (Passive) is a granted buff that activates when she is out of combat for a short duration. It enhances her movement speed, allowing her to reposition more effectively for offensive pounces or defensive retreats.
abilities.original_description:
Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Move Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Move Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

abilities.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
abilities.mechanics_description: Javelin Toss is a linear skillshot that deals damage and applies a healmark to enemies hit. Takedown is a melee strike that deals increased damage to marked enemies, consuming the mark. This ability combo is primarily used offensively for damage and picking off fleeing enemies.
abilities.original_description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have. <keywordMajor>Human Form:</keywordMajor> Nidalee throws her javelin, dealing <magicDamage>{{ humanminimumdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, increased up to <magicDamage>{{ humanmaximumdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> based on distance flown.

abilities.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
abilities.mechanics_description: Nidalee's **Bushwhack** is a targeted trap placed on the ground that becomes invisible and triggers when an enemy steps on it, dealing magic damage and applying a debuff that increases all incoming damage. Her **Pounce** is a short-range, linear dash that deals magic damage to enemies in the landing zone. Bushwhack is primarily used for utility and area control, while Pounce is an offensive engagement or escape tool.
abilities.original_description:
In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands. Human Form: Nidalee places an invisible trap for 2 minutes. When an enemy walks over it, they are dealt {{ damagepersecond }} magic damage per second for {{ e3 }} seconds.

{{ maxtraps }} traps may be active at once.

abilities.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
abilities.mechanics_description: Aspect of the Cougar is an **auto-targeting** ultimate ability that **transforms** Nidalee into a cougar form.
