This transformation is primarily used **offensively** to gain access to her powerful melee abilities and enhanced mobility for engaging, chasing, or burst damage.
abilities.original_description:
Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities. Passive: While in Human Form, applying Hunted refreshes this Ability's Cooldown.

Human Form: Nidalee transforms into Cougar Form, gaining melee Attacks and replacing her Active Abilities.

Cougar Form: Nidalee transforms into Human Form, gaining ranged Attacks and replacing her Active Abilities.

abilities.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Primal Surge (Human Form):** This is a targeted ability that heals an allied champion and grants them bonus movement speed. It is primarily used defensively to sustain allies or escape danger.

**Swipe (Cougar Form):** This is an auto-attack reset ability that causes Nidalee's next basic attack to strike in a short, forward cone in front of her, dealing damage. It is used offensively to enhance her melee damage output and clear waves quickly.
abilities.original_description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her. <keywordMajor>Human Form:</keywordMajor> Nidalee restores <healing>{{ totalhealing }} Health</healing> increased up to <healing>{{ maxhealing }}</healing> based on missing Health and grants them <attackSpeed>{{ bonusas*100 }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for {{ asduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Goes Where He Pleases
abilities.mechanics_description: Dr. Mundo's passive, "Goes Where He Pleases," stores a portion of damage taken as **Resistances** over time, which he can then **activate** to heal himself. The activation is an **auto-target** ability, consuming stored health regeneration to heal a percentage of his maximum health.
abilities.original_description:
Dr. Mundo resists the first Immobilizing effect that hits him, instead losing Health and dropping a chemical cannister nearby. Dr. Mundo can pick it up by walking over it, restoring Health and reducing this Ability's Cooldown.

Dr. Mundo also has significantly increased Health regeneration.

abilities.name: Infected Bonesaw
abilities.mechanics_description: Infected Bonesaw is a linear skillshot that Dr. Mundo hurls forward, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them. If it hits an enemy or reaches its maximum range, the Bonesaw will remain lodged in the ground for a few seconds, creating a small lingering hazard that will damage and slow any enemy that walks through it.
abilities.original_description:
Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw, dealing damage to the first enemy hit based on their current health and slowing them. Dr. Mundo hurls his bonesaw, dealing {{ currenthealthdamage*100 }}% current Health magic damage to the first enemy hit and Slowing them by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If the bonesaw hits a champion or monster, Dr. Mundo restores {{ healthrestoreonhitchampionmonster }} Health. If it hits a non-champion or non-monster, Dr. Mundo instead restores {{ healthrestoreonhitminion }} Health.

abilities.name: Heart Zapper
abilities.mechanics_description: Heart Zapper is a skillshot ability that Dr. Mundo hurls in a straight line. Upon hitting an enemy or reaching its maximum range, it explodes, dealing damage and applying a debuff that returns a percentage of damage dealt back to Dr. Mundo for a short duration, primarily used for offensive poke and trading.
abilities.original_description:
Dr. Mundo electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, Dr. Mundo deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage. Dr. Mundo charges up a defibrilator, dealing {{ damagepertick*4 }} magic damage each second for up to {{ duration }} seconds to nearby enemies. Additionally he stores {{ grayhealthstorageinitial }} of damage taken for the first {{ grayhealthinitialduration }} seconds and {{ grayhealthstorage*100 }}% for the remaining duration as gray health and can Recast.

Recast: Detonate the defibrilator, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies. If this hits at least one champion, Dr. Mundo restores {{ grayhealthbigmod*100 }}% of gray health, otherwise he instead restores {{ grayhealthsmallmod*100 }}% of gray health.

abilities.name: Blunt Force Trauma
abilities.mechanics_description: Blunt Force Trauma is a skillshot that Dr. Mundo hurls a cleaver in a straight line, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit. It's primarily used offensively to poke enemies from a distance and apply pressure, with a passive component that grants Dr. Mundo attack damage based on his maximum health.
abilities.original_description:
Passive - Dr. Mundo gains bonus Attack Damage, increasing based on his max Health.

Active - Dr. Mundo slams his medical bag into an enemy, dealing additional damage based on his missing Health. If the enemy dies they are swatted away, dealing damage to enemies they pass through. Passive: Dr Mundo gains {{ passivebonusad }} Attack Damage.

Active: Dr Mundo violently swings his "medical" bag, causing his next Attack to deal an additional {{ additionaldamage }} physical damage, increased by up to {{ maxdamageamptooltip }} based on his missing Health. If the enemy is killed, Mundo swats them away, dealing {{ additionaldamage }} physical damage to enemies they pass through.

abilities.name: Maximum Dosage
abilities.mechanics_description: **Dr. Mundo's R - Maximum Dosage** is an **auto-target, self-cast ability** that heals Dr. Mundo over time and provides a significant burst of movement speed. It is primarily used defensively to sustain through fights and chase down or escape enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing Health. He then gains Move Speed and regenerates a portion of his maximum Health over a long duration. Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, gaining {{ missinghealthheal*100 }}% of his missing Health as max Health, {{ speedboostamount*100 }}% Move Speed, and regenerating {{ maxhealthhot*100 }}% max Health over {{ duration }} seconds.

At Rank 3, both healing effects are increased by an additional {{ bonuspernearbychampion*100 }}% per nearby enemy champion.

abilities.name: Time Bomb
abilities.mechanics_description: Zilean throws a Time Bomb that attaches to an enemy champion or minion. After a short delay, the bomb explodes, dealing magic damage and slowing affected enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies. Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb that sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it. After {{ e2 }} seconds it detonates, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Placing a second bomb on a unit that already has one detonates the first bomb immediately and Stuns enemies in the blast for {{ e4 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Time In A Bottle
abilities.mechanics_description: Time in a Bottle is a passive ability that automatically targets Zilean with a small shield 7 seconds after he takes damage. This provides a brief defensive buff to mitigate incoming damage.
abilities.original_description: Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.

abilities.name: Rewind
abilities.mechanics_description: Zilean's Rewind is a self-cast ability that does not require targeting. It instantly resets the cooldowns of Zilean's other basic abilities, making it primarily a utility tool to quickly redeploy his Time Bombs or Time Warp.
abilities.original_description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities. Zilean turns time, reducing his other basic Ability Cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Time Warp
abilities.mechanics_description: Time Warp is a skillshot that Zilean throws to a targeted location. Enemies hit are slowed, while allies are greatly sped up, making it a versatile tool for engaging, escaping, or repositioning.
abilities.original_description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Move Speed or increasing an ally's Move Speed for a short time. Zilean <status>Slows</status> an enemy champion by {{ e2 }}% or grants an allied champion <speed>{{ e2 }}% Move Speed</speed> for {{ e1 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Chronoshift
abilities.mechanics_description: Chronoshift is an **auto-targeting, single-target ability** that **saves Zilean's life defensively** by rewinding his health and mana to what they were a few seconds prior, also granting him bonus movement speed.
abilities.original_description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage. Zilean grants a protective time rune to an allied champion for {{ rduration }} seconds. If the target would die, the rune rewinds their timeline, putting them into Stasis for {{ revivestateduration }} seconds, then reviving them and restoring <healing>{{ rtotalheal }} Health</healing>.

abilities.name: Royal Privilege
abilities.mechanics_description: To activate Royal Privilege, Qiyana must hit an enemy with one of her other abilities, which then marks them for a short duration. While the mark is active, Qiyana's next basic attack against the marked enemy deals bonus magic damage, effectively rewarding her for successfully landing her spells with extra burst damage.
abilities.original_description: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal
abilities.mechanics_description: Elemental Wrath is a linear skillshot that deals damage and applies a debuff based on Qiyana's current element. When used with Edge of Ixtal, Qiyana dashes through the target, damaging enemies in her path and applying the debuff. It's primarily used offensively for damage and to empower her subsequent abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element. If Qiyana does not have an Enchantment, she slashes, dealing {{ vanilladamage }} physical damage to enemies in a small area. If she does, this Ability gains extra range and an additional effect based on the type of Enchantment:
  • Ice Enchantment: Briefly Roots, then Slows by {{ slowpotency*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} second.
  • Rock Enchantment: Deals an additional {{ tremordamage }} physical damage to units below {{ critthreshold*100 }}% Health.
  • Wild Enchantment: Leaves a trail that turns Qiyana Invisible and grants {{ haste*100 }}% Move Speed.

abilities.name: Terrashape
abilities.mechanics_description: Terrashape is a **skillshot** that Qiyana *dashes* a short distance in a target direction, making her briefly **untargetable** and dealing damage to **enemies in a small area** upon arrival. It is primarily used **offensively** to engage and deal burst damage, or **defensively** to dodge incoming abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Qiyana dashes to a location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted. Passive: While Qiyana's weapon is Enchanted, she gains {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed and her Attacks deal an additional {{ onhitdamage }} magic damage. She also gains {{ passivems*100 }}% Move Speed while out of combat near the corresponding terrain type.

Active: Qiyana dashes towards a nearby brush, terrain, or river and Enchants her weapon with that particular terrain type. This refreshes Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal's Cooldown.

abilities.name: Audacity
abilities.mechanics_description: Qiyana's Audacity (E) is a short-range dashable auto-target ability that deals damage to a target enemy, dealing increased damage to anything hit by the ability *after* the initial target. It's primarily used offensively for bursting down squishy targets or as part of her combo to quickly close gaps and threaten enemies.
abilities.original_description: Qiyana dashes to an enemy, damaging them. Qiyana dashes through an enemy and deals <physicalDamage>{{ damage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to them.

abilities.name: Supreme Display of Talent
abilities.mechanics_description: Qiyana's R, Supreme Display of Talent, is a **large-radius circular skillshot** that deals significant damage and **terrifies enemies** caught in its effect, forcing them to run away from the center of the blast. It is primarily used **offensively for area-of-effect damage and crowd control** to initiate fights or catch out fleeing enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Qiyana sends out a shockwave that detonates whatever elements she hits with it, stunning and damaging nearby enemies. Qiyana launches a shockwave that Knocks Back enemies and detonates when it hits terrain. The explosion follows the entire edge of the terrain, Stunning for between 0.5 and {{ stunduration }} seconds and dealing {{ damage }} plus {{ missinghealthdamagerock }} max Health physical damage. Stun duration scales down with distance the shockwave has travelled.

Any river or brush the shockwave passes through also explode after a delay for the same damage and Stun.

abilities.name: Flair
abilities.mechanics_description: Flair is a point-and-click projectile that Samira shoots in a target direction, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. It is used offensively to deal damage and can be cast multiple times in quick succession as part of her combo.
abilities.original_description:
Samira fires a shot or swings her sword, dealing damage. If cast during Wild Rush, strike all enemies in her path upon completion. Samira fires a shot, dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage to the first enemy hit.

If this Ability is cast towards an enemy in melee range, Samira will instead slash with her sword, dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Blade Whirl
abilities.mechanics_description: Blade Whirl is a **directional skillshot** that Samira throws a blade in a line, dealing damage and **deflecting all enemy projectiles** that enter its path for a short duration. It is primarily used **defensively to nullify incoming damage** and create an opening for engagement or escape.
abilities.original_description: Samira slashes around her, damaging enemies and destroying enemy missiles. Samira slashes around her for {{ slashduration }} seconds, damaging enemies twice for {{ damagecalc }} physical damage each and destroying any enemy missiles that enter the area.

abilities.name: Daredevil Impulse
abilities.mechanics_description: Daredevil Impulse is a **passive**. Samira builds **Style ranks (S-E-D-A-I-R)** by hitting enemies with **various abilities and auto-attacks**. Reaching the "R" rank unlocks her ultimate, **Inferno Trigger**, and she also gains bonus **movement speed** after dashing towards an enemy.
abilities.original_description: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by <status>Immobilizing</status> effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is <status>Knocked Up</status>, she also keeps them <status>Knocked Up</status> briefly.

abilities.name: Wild Rush
abilities.mechanics_description: Wild Rush is a **dash** Samira can use to either **damage enemies** she passes through or **heal herself** by dashing through an enemy. It is primarily an **offensive** tool but can be used defensively to reposition and gain sustain.
abilities.original_description:
Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown. Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through dealing {{ dashdamage }} magic damage and gaining {{ bonusattackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ attackspeedduration }} seconds.

If an enemy champion is killed within 3 seconds of Samira damaging them, This Ability's Cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: Inferno Trigger
abilities.mechanics_description: Samira initiates Inferno Trigger, a **circular AoE** ability that marks enemies within range. Upon activation, she unleashes a **torrent of bullets** within that area, dealing damage to all enemies hit. This ultimate is used **offensively** for significant AoE damage and can be combined with her E to reposition rapidly before unleashing.
abilities.original_description:
Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her. Samira can only use this Ability if her current Style rating is S. Using this Ability consumes all Style rating.

Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her 10 times over 2 seconds, each shot dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage and applying Life Steal at {{ lifestealmod*100 }}% effectiveness. Each shot can also critically strike.

abilities.name: A Thousand Cuts
abilities.mechanics_description: Gwen's passive, **A Thousand Cuts**, is an auto-attack enhancement. Each of her basic attacks deals bonus magic damage, and hitting an enemy champion with it heals Gwen for a percentage of the bonus damage dealt, stacking up to three times.
abilities.original_description: Gwen's attacks deal bonus magic damage based on the targets health. She heals for a portion of the damage dealt to champions by this effect.

abilities.name: Hallowed Mist
abilities.mechanics_description: Gwen throws a fan of mist that slows enemies hit, making them vulnerable to her attacks. This ability is a skillshot (linear) used offensively to set up damage and engage by slowing enemies, increasing the effectiveness of her subsequent attacks.
abilities.original_description:
Gwen summons mist that protects her from enemies outside of it. She can only be targeted by enemies who enter the mist. Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist, making her Untargetable to all enemies (except towers) outside the zone for {{ zoneduration }} seconds or until she leaves it. While in the Mist, Gwen gains {{ totalresists }} Armor and Magic Resist.

Gwen can Recast this Ability once to call the Mist to her. This will automatically Recast the first time Gwen attempts to leave the zone.

abilities.name: Skip 'n Slash
abilities.mechanics_description: Gwen's E, Skip 'n Slash, is a short-range dash that deals magic damage in a small area around her upon arrival; it can be used offensively to engage and deal damage, or defensively to reposition and dodge. The ability also grants her increased attack speed for a duration, empowering her subsequent auto-attacks.
abilities.original_description:
Gwen dashes a short distance then gains Attack Speed, attack range, and magic damage On-Hit for a few seconds. If she hits an enemy during that time, this Ability's cooldown is partially refunded. Gwen dashes and empowers her Attacks for {{ buffduration }} seconds.

Empowered Attacks gain {{ bonusattackspeed }} Attack Speed, {{ onhitdamage }} magic damage %i:OnHit% On-Hit, {{ bonusattackrange }} range, and the first one to hit an enemy refunds {{ cdrefund*100 }}% of this Ability's Cooldown.

abilities.name: Snip Snip!
abilities.mechanics_description: Gwen's "Snip Snip!" is a **point-and-click attack** that performs two quick snips, dealing magic damage and applying on-hit effects. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal sustained damage in trades and extended fights, with the second snip dealing increased damage if Gwen is healed while it's active.
abilities.original_description:
Gwen snips her scissors in a cone up to 6 times dealing magic damage. Gwen deals true damage to units in the center and applies her passive to them on each snip. Passive: Gwen gains 1 stack when she hits an enemy with an attack (max 4, lasts {{ buffduration }} seconds).

Active: Consumes stacks. Gwen snips once for {{ miniswipedamage }} magic damage, snips again for each ammo consumed, and then snips a final time for {{ finalswipedamage }} magic damage.

The center of each strikes converts {{ truedamageconversion*100 }}% of the damage into true damage instead and applies A Thousand Cuts to enemies hit.

Deals {{ minionmod*100 }}% damage to minions.
Minions below {{ executethreshold*100 }}% health take {{ executebonus }}% bonus damage instead of reduced damage.

abilities.name: Needlework
abilities.mechanics_description: Gwen's ultimate, Needlework, is a delayed area-of-effect skillshot that fires a wave of spectral scissors in a line, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies in its path. It can be cast up to three times sequentially, with each subsequent cast widening the area and increasing the damage, allowing for significant burst damage against grouped opponents.
abilities.original_description:
Gwen hurls a needle that slows enemies hit, deals magic damage, and applies A Thousand Cuts to champions hit.

This ability can be cast up to two more times, with each cast throwing additional needles and dealing more damage. First Cast: Hurl a needle that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage, Slows by {{ initialslow*-100 }}% for {{ debuffduration }} seconds, and applies A Thousand Cuts to all enemies hit. Gwen can Recast this ability up to 2 additional times within 6 seconds ({{ lockouttime }}s cooldown between casts).

Second Cast: Fire three needles to deal {{ totaldamage3 }} magic damage
Third Cast: Fire five needles to deal {{ totaldamage5 }} magic damage

abilities.name: Glitterlance
abilities.mechanics_description: Glitterlance is a linear skillshot that Lulu can cast in a target direction. It damages the first enemy hit and a second enemy beyond that if they are close enough, also slowing both.
abilities.original_description:
Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that damages and heavily slows all enemies it hits. Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ slowamount*-100 }}%, decaying over {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Enemies take {{ bonusmissiledamage }} magic damage from additional bolts.

abilities.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
abilities.mechanics_description: Pix, Faerie Companion is an auto-targeting ability that passively accompanies Lulu, meaning it follows her and automatically attacks enemies afflicted by her other abilities. It provides utility by dealing bonus magic damage on its attacks, helping to secure kills and poke down opponents.
abilities.original_description: Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.

abilities.name: Whimsy
abilities.mechanics_description: Whimsy (W) is a targeted ability that can be cast on an ally or enemy. When used on an ally, it grants them bonus movement speed and polymorphs them into a fantastical creature, disabling an enemy target. When used on an enemy, it damages them and polymorphs them into a creature, disabling them with crowd control and movement impairment.
abilities.original_description:
If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Move Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells. When used on an ally, Lulu grants {{ totalms }} Move Speed and {{ e7 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

When used on an enemy, Lulu Polymorphs them for {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Help, Pix!
abilities.mechanics_description: Lulu targets an ally or herself with a point-and-click ability, granting them a temporary shield and summoning Pix to follow them. This shield is primarily defensive, while Pix's presence enables Lulu's other abilities to be used on the shielded target.
abilities.original_description:
If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy. When used on an ally, Pix jumps to them and grants Pix, Faerie Companion for {{ e1 }} seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix also grants {{ totalshield }} Shield for {{ e7 }} seconds.

When used on an enemy champion, Pix hampers them, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and granting True Sight of them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Wild Growth
abilities.mechanics_description: Wild Growth is an **auto-targeting** ultimate that grants Lulu's targeted ally or herself a large **HP shield**, a **slow** on nearby enemies, and significantly **increases bonus size and base stats** for a short duration. It is primarily used **defensively** to protect an ally or herself, acting as a powerful anti-burst tool and disruption against immediate threats, but can also be used offensively to make an ally incredibly tanky to press an advantage.
abilities.original_description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies. Lulu enlarges an ally, <status>Knocking Up</status> surrounding enemies for {{ knockbackduration }} second. The enlarged ally gains <healing>{{ totalbonushealth }} max Health</healing> and <status>Slows</status> surrounding enemies by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ buffduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Voracity
abilities.mechanics_description: Voracity is Katarina's passive ability. When she kills an enemy unit, her basic abilities' cooldowns are greatly reduced, allowing her to chain abilities rapidly for high offensive burst damage.
abilities.original_description:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged recently, her remaining ability cooldowns are dramatically reduced.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Shunpo
abilities.mechanics_description: Shunpo is a targeted dash that allows Katarina to instantly teleport to an enemy unit (champion, minion, or monster) or dagger. It is used offensively to close distance for damage or defensively to reposition and escape.
abilities.original_description:
Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise. Katarina blinks in the wink of an eye to the target ally, enemy, or Dagger. If it is an enemy, Katarina strikes for {{ totaldamage }} magic damage - otherwise she strikes the nearest enemy in range.

Picking up a Dagger will reduce this Ability's Cooldown by {{ daggercooldownreduction }} seconds ({{ tooltipdaggerreduction }}). Katarina can blink to any location near the target.

abilities.name: Preparation
abilities.mechanics_description: Katarina's "Preparation" (W) is an **auto-target** ability that **damages** enemies in a small radius around her and **amplifies her next attack**. It's primarily used **offensively** for wave clear and to enhance her damage output during trades and all-ins.
abilities.original_description: Katarina gains a burst of Move Speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself. Katarina tosses a <keywordMajor>Dagger</keywordMajor> into the air and gains <speed>{{ e4 }}% Move Speed</speed> decaying over {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Death Lotus
abilities.mechanics_description: Death Lotus is a channeled, circular AoE ability that Katarina spins within, dealing rapid, targeted **damage** to nearby enemies. It is used **offensively** to deal significant burst damage, especially in teamfights when enemies are grouped closely.
abilities.original_description:
Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions. Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, rapidly attacking the three nearest enemy champions with a flurry of knives. Each knife deals {{ damagecalc }} magic damage and {{ addamagecalc }} physical damage, and applies {{ grievousamount*100 }}% Grievous Wounds for {{ grievousduration }} seconds.

Total over {{ duration }} seconds to each enemy: {{ totaldamagecalc }} magic damage and {{ totaladdamagecalc }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Bouncing Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Bouncing Blade is a point-and-click ability that throws a dagger at an enemy, dealing magic damage and bouncing to up to three nearby enemies, prioritizing champions. It's primarily used offensively for damage and poke, with its bounces contributing to Katarina's overall burst potential.
abilities.original_description: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground. Katarina throws a <keywordMajor>Dagger</keywordMajor>, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to the target and {{ maxbounces }} nearby enemies. The <keywordMajor>Dagger</keywordMajor> then ricochets onto the ground behind the primary target.

abilities.name: Prophet of an Elder God
abilities.mechanics_description: Illaoi's passive, **Prophet of an Elder God**, is an auto-target ability that triggers when she attacks an enemy champion or is attacked by one. It spawns a Tentacle on a nearby valid position, which then automatically attacks enemies within its range, dealing damage. This passive is used offensively to provide consistent additional damage and pressure in lane and during teamfights.
abilities.original_description: Illaoi and the <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font> she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font>, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

abilities.name: Tentacle Smash
abilities.mechanics_description: Tentacle Smash is a linear skillshot that Illaoi slams her idol in a target direction, damaging and briefly slowing any enemy champions and large monsters hit. It's primarily an offensive tool used to deal damage, apply pressure, and spawn Tentacles on the ground for her passive.
abilities.original_description:
Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage. Passive: Slam damage is increased by {{ spell.illaoiq:tentacledamageamp*100 }}% (currently {{ spell.illaoiq:tentacledamagetotal }} physical damage).

Active: Illaoi swings her idol, causing a Tentacle to Slam forward.

abilities.name: Harsh Lesson
abilities.mechanics_description: Harsh Lesson is a self-targeted dash that Illaoi uses to leap forward a short distance, dealing damage to any enemies she passes through. It is primarily an offensive tool for closing gaps and engaging, although it can also be used defensively to reposition.
abilities.original_description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target. Illaoi's next Attack causes her to leap at the target, dealing an additional <physicalDamage>{{ healthpercenttotal }} max Health physical damage</physicalDamage>. When she strikes, nearby Tentacles will <keywordMajor>Slam</keywordMajor> at the target.

abilities.name: Test of Spirit
abilities.mechanics_description: Illaoi slams her idol in a line skillshot, dealing damage and slowing enemies hit; if it hits an enemy champion, it also spawns a Tentacle at their location. This ability is primarily used offensively to damage and slow targets, and conditionally to create spectral Tentacles that can empower her other abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles. Illaoi pulls the spirit from an enemy champion for {{ spiritduration }} seconds. The spirit can be damaged like a champion, with {{ echopercent }} of that damage echoing to its owner.

If the spirit dies or the target leaves its range, the target becomes marked for {{ vesselduration }} seconds and is Slowed by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Marked enemies spawn Tentacles if possible.

Tentacles will automatically Slam at spirits and marked enemies once every {{ timebetweenvesseltentacleslams }} seconds.

abilities.name: Leap of Faith
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Leap of Faith (R):** Illaoi leaps into the air and slams her idol into the ground, dealing significant magic damage and **spirit-swapping** nearby enemy champions for 12 seconds. Spirit-swapping enemies causes them to generate **Tentacle Lies** in addition to any existing ones, which can be attacked by Illaoi's Tentacles.

**Mechanics & Usage:** This ability is an **auto-targeted Area of Effect (AoE)** spell centered on Illaoi. It is used **offensively** primarily for its massive burst damage and the strategic advantage gained from spawning additional Tentacle Lies, which empower her subsequent auto-attacks.
abilities.original_description:
Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit. Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage to nearby enemies and spawning a Tentacle for each enemy champion hit.

For the next {{ duration }} seconds, Tentacles are untargetable and Slam 50% faster, and Harsh Lesson has a {{ spell.illaoiw:cooldownduringr }} second cooldown.

abilities.name: Break the Mold
abilities.mechanics_description: Rell's passive, "Break the Mold," is an on-hit effect automatically applied to her auto-attacks. It is used offensively by dealing bonus magic damage on-hit and stealing a percentage of the target's armor and magic resistance for a short duration, stacking up to three times.
abilities.original_description: Rell's Attacks and Abilities deal additional magic damage and steal Armor and Magic Resist on hit.

abilities.name: Ferromancy: Crash Down
abilities.mechanics_description: Ferromancy: Crash Down is a targeted ability that Rell uses to command her Mount to crash down, dealing magic damage and knocking up enemies in a small area around her. This is primarily used for disrupting enemies and initiating fights by landing the knock-up.
abilities.original_description:
Mounted: Rell Dismounts, crashing down in her armor, Knocking enemies up and gaining a large Shield. While dismounted, she gains Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed, and Attack Range, but is Slowed.

Dismounted: Rell forms her Mount, gaining a burst of speed and Knocking Up the next enemy she attacks.

Passive - Mounted Alacrity: Rell gains {{ spell.rellw_dismount:mountedmovespeed }} Move Speed while mounted.

Active - Ferromancy: Crash Down: Rell leaps off her mount, Knocking Up enemies and dealing {{ spell.rellw_dismount:dismountdamage }} magic damage. Rell gains {{ spell.rellw_dismount:shield }} Shield, which lasts until she remounts.

Rell then enters her armored form, gaining {{ spell.rellw_dismount:resistanceincrease*100 }}% increased Armor and Magic Resist, {{ spell.rellw_dismount:dismountedasboost*100 }}% Attack Speed and {{ spell.rellw_dismount:dismountedrangeboost }} Attack Range. In this armored form, she can use Ferromancy: Mount Up.

abilities.name: Full Tilt
abilities.mechanics_description: Rell's **Full Tilt** (E) is a tethered skillshot that pulls enemies towards her and stuns them if they break the tether. It is primarily used offensively to initiate fights and crowd control multiple targets, but can also be used defensively to escape by pulling herself away from enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Passive: Rell gains out of combat Move Speed.

Active: Rell and an ally gain ramping Move Speed, doubled toward enemies and each other. Her next Attack explodes, dealing magic damage.
Rell and an ally charge, gaining {{ minms*100 }}% Move Speed, increased to {{ maxms*100 }}% when facing enemy champions or each other for {{ duration }} seconds. Rell's next Attack or Shattering Strike explodes in an area for {{ maxhealthdamagecalc }} max Health magic damage.

abilities.name: Shattering Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Shattering Strike is a **linear skillshot** that Rell throws forward in a straight line. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it deals magic damage, **applies a debuff that reduces their armor and magic resist** for a short duration, and heals Rell based on her bonus armor and magic resist.
abilities.original_description: Rell deals magic damage to units in a line, breaking their shields and stunning them.  Rell thrusts her lance, <status>Stunning</status> targets for {{ stunduration }} seconds, destroying all <shield>Shields</shield>, and dealing <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage.</magicDamage>

abilities.name: Magnet Storm
abilities.mechanics_description: Magnet Storm is a targeted area-of-effect ability. Rell sends out a magnetic pulse that pulls all nearby enemies towards her, dealing damage and stunning them if they are pulled into her.
abilities.original_description: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently Pulling nearby enemies toward herself. Then Rell constantly Drags nearby enemies toward herself for a short while, dealing magic damage over time. Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently <status>Pulling</status> nearby enemies towards herself. Then Rell constantly <status>Drags</status> nearby enemies towards herself and deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> over the next {{ duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Deathbringer Stance
abilities.mechanics_description: Deathbringer Stance is Aatrox's passive. After casting an ability, his next three basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus physical damage and heal him. This ability is auto-targeted and used offensively for increased damage and sustain in combat.
abilities.original_description: Periodically, Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus <magicDamage>magic damage</magicDamage> and heals him, based on the target's max health.

abilities.name: Infernal Chains
abilities.mechanics_description: Aatrox launches chains in a line skillshot. Enemies hit are dealt damage and pulled towards Aatrox, with the second cast rooting them in place.
abilities.original_description: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again. Aatrox fires a chain, <status>Slowing</status> the first enemy hit by {{ wslowpercentage*-100 }}% for {{ wslowduration }} seconds and dealing <physicalDamage>{{ wdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>. Champions and large jungle monsters have {{ wslowduration }} seconds to leave the impact area or be <status>Pulled</status> back to the center and damaged again for the same amount.

abilities.name: The Darkin Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Aatrox dashes a short distance and swings his blade, dealing physical damage in a line. This ability can be cast up to three times, with each subsequent cast having a slightly longer range and a larger area of effect, offering a multi-hit offensive tool that can also knock enemies airborne on the third cast.
abilities.original_description: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect. Aatrox slams his greatsword, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ qdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>. If they are hit on the edge, they are briefly <status>Knocked Up</status> and they take <physicalDamage>{{ qedgedamage }}</physicalDamage> instead. This Ability can be <recast>Recast</recast> twice, each one changing shape and dealing 25% more damage than the previous one.

abilities.name: Umbral Dash
abilities.mechanics_description: Umbral Dash is a linear skillshot that Aatrox dashes forward, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. This ability is primarily used offensively for wave clear and spacing, with a secondary defensive use as it can reposition Aatrox to dodge incoming threats.
abilities.original_description:
Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction. Passive: Aatrox heals for {{ totalevamp }} of the damage he deals to Champions.

Active: Aatrox dashes. He can use this Ability while winding up his other Abilities.

abilities.name: World Ender
abilities.mechanics_description: Aatrox's ultimate, World Ender, is a self-cast ability that grants him bonus movement speed and increased attack range for a duration, while also passively healing him based on recent damage dealt. Activating it transforms his existing abilities, amplifying their damage and healing effects, and crucially, revives him upon death if he is still within the World Ender's duration.
abilities.original_description:
Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and Move Speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended. Aatrox reveals his true demonic form, Fearing nearby minions for {{ rminionfearduration }} seconds and gaining {{ rmovementspeedbonus*100 }}% Move Speed decaying over {{ rduration }} seconds. He also gains {{ rtotaladamp*100 }}% Attack Damage and increases self-healing by {{ rhealingamp*100 }}% for the duration.

Champion takedowns extend the duration of this effect by {{ rextension }} seconds and refresh the Move Speed effect.

abilities.name: Dream-Laden Bough
abilities.mechanics_description: Dream-Laden Bough is Lillia's passive ability where her abilities and basic attacks apply a stack of "Dream-Dust" to enemies. Striking an enemy already afflicted with three stacks of Dream-Dust consumes them and deals bonus true damage, making it a key damage amplification tool.
abilities.original_description: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.

abilities.name: Blooming Blows
abilities.mechanics_description: Blooming Blows (Q) is a circular skillshot that Lillia swings. Her first cast deals magic damage to enemies hit, and enemies at the edge of the impact zone suffer a second, stronger burst of damage and are briefly slowed.
abilities.original_description:
Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge. Passive: Lillia's Ability hits grant {{ prancespeed }} Move Speed for {{ pranceduration }} seconds, stacking up to {{ prancemaxstacks }} times.

Active: Lillia whirls her censer, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage, plus an additional {{ bonustruedamage }} true damage at the outer edge.

abilities.name: Watch Out! Eep!
abilities.mechanics_description: "Watch Out! Eep!" is a skillshot that Lillia throws in a target direction, creating a small fairy swarm that deals damage and applies a debuff. Enemies hit by the swarm become impaired, taking increased damage from Lillia's subsequent abilities.
abilities.original_description: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center. Lillia winds up a huge strike, dealing <magicDamage>{{ flatdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Enemies in the center take <magicDamage>{{ flatdamagesweetspot }} damage</magicDamage> instead.

abilities.name: Swirlseed
abilities.mechanics_description: Swirlseed is a **skillshot** that Lillia throws in a target direction. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it stops and creates a **lingering magical bloom** that deals damage over time and **slows** enemies within its area of effect.
abilities.original_description: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target. Lillia lobs a swirlseed overhead, dealing <magicDamage>{{ impactdamagetotal }} magic damage</magicDamage> where it lands and revealing and <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. If no enemies are hit, the seed rolls until it hits an enemy or collides with terrain.

abilities.name: Lilting Lullaby
abilities.mechanics_description: Lilting Lullaby is a circular skillshot that Lillia hurls towards a target location. Enemies hit by the initial impact take magic damage, and those who remain in the area for its duration become **Drowsy**, falling asleep after a short delay if they are still within the radius and haven't attacked or taken damage.
abilities.original_description:
Lillia causes all enemies with Dream Dust on them to become Drowsy before falling asleep. Those enemies will take extra damage on being forcibly woken up. Lillia causes all enemy champions with Dream Dust to become Drowsy for {{ drowsyduration }} seconds. Afterward, they fall Asleep for {{ sleepduration }} seconds.

When awakened by damage, they take an additional {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Garden of Thorns
abilities.mechanics_description: Zyra's passive, Garden of Thorns, is a ground-targeted ability that, upon activation, creates a seed that lasts for a short duration. If Zyra casts a spell or attacks within the seed's radius, it blooms into a plant that attacks nearby enemies, dealing damage.
abilities.original_description: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level. Zyra can cast Deadly Spines or Grasping Roots near seeds to grow plants, who fight for Zyra.

abilities.name: Rampant Growth
abilities.mechanics_description: Rampant Growth is a **skillshot** that Zyra fires in a straight line. Upon hitting an enemy, it deals damage and roots them, briefly creating an area that empowers Zyra's plants.
abilities.original_description:
Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time. Zyra plants a Seed that lasts {{ e6 }} seconds. These Seeds grant True Sight of enemy champions that step on them for {{ e3 }} seconds, but are still destroyed.

This Ability has 2 charges with a {{ ammorechargetime }} second recharge time. Killing an enemy minion or monster reduces the recharge time by {{ e1 }}%. Champion takedowns reduce the recharge time by {{ e2 }}% instead.

abilities.name: Grasping Roots
abilities.mechanics_description: Grasping Roots is a **skillshot** that Zyra fires in a target direction. Enemies hit are **rooted** in place, making them unable to move, and take magic damage.
abilities.original_description:
Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Move Speed. Zyra sends vines forward, Rooting for {{ e5 }} second(s) and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

If this Ability passes near a Seed, the Seed grows into a Vine Lasher that deals {{ spell.zyrap:plantdamage }} magic damage and lasts {{ spell.zyrap:plantduration }} seconds. Vine Lashers have 400 range, and their Attacks Slow by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. The Slow from multiple Vine Lashers stacks up to {{ maxslowstacks }} times.

abilities.name: Deadly Spines
abilities.mechanics_description: Deadly Spines is a **skillshot** that Zyra fires in a line, dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through and briefly rooting them on impact. It is primarily used **offensively** to poke, set up kills with its crowd control, and follow up on other crowd control effects.
abilities.original_description:
Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar. Zyra causes thick vines to spread and explode into spines, dealing {{ initialdamage }} magic damage.

If this Ability is cast near a Seed, the Seed grows into a Thorn Spitter that deals {{ spell.zyrap:plantdamage }} magic damage and lasts {{ spell.zyrap:plantduration }} seconds. Thorn Spitters have 575 range.

abilities.name: Stranglethorns
abilities.mechanics_description: Zyra's ultimate, **Stranglethorns**, is a targeted ground-effect skillshot. Upon activation, Zyra designates an area, and after a short delay, a large patch of thorns erupts, knocking up all enemies within the zone and dealing initial magic damage. For the duration, any of Zyra's plants within the zone gain increased attack speed and range, firing bonus projectiles at nearby enemies, making it a potent offensive and zoning tool.
abilities.original_description:
Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts. Plants within the thicket are enraged. Zyra summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upwards, Knocking Up for {{ e1 }} second.

Zyra's plants within the thicket become enraged, resetting their duration, gaining {{ e2 }}% Health and Attacking for {{ plantdamagebonus }}% bonus damage.

abilities.name: Joy Unending
abilities.mechanics_description: Nilah's passive, "Joy Unending," is an auto-target ability that enhances her basic attacks and abilities after she has dodged or resisted an enemy ability. This passive converts her bonus attack speed into critical strike damage, serving both offensive (increased damage output) and defensive (faster attack speed for disengaging or weaving in abilities) purposes.
abilities.original_description: Nilah gains increased experience from last-hitting minions along with the ability to enhance and share nearby healing and shielding from her allies.

abilities.name: Formless Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Nilah's **Formless Blade** is a **linear skillshot** that she slashes through. It deals damage to enemies hit and briefly empowers her next three auto-attacks to deal bonus magic damage and gain increased range.
abilities.original_description:
With a snap of her whip-blade, Nilah damages any enemies she hits in a straight line in her chosen direction. This action extends her attack range for a short duration. Passive: Nilah gains {{ critarmorpen }} Armor Penetration, and her Attacks against champions restore {{ critlifesteal }} damage dealt as Health. Overhealing from this is converted into a Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

Active: Nilah cracks her whip-blade, dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage, increased by her Critical Strike Chance. If an enemy unit or structure is hit, Nilah gains 125 Attack Range and {{ bonusattackspeedcalc }}% Attack Speed, and her Attacks hit in a cone as {{ attacktotaldamagetooltip }} physical damage for {{ buffduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.mechanics_description: Nilah's Slipstream is a **dash** that can be used **offensively** to close distance and deal damage, or **defensively** to evade and gain invulnerability. She can recast it shortly after the initial dash to perform a second, shorter dash in any direction, making it a versatile tool for repositioning and trading.
abilities.original_description: Nilah enthusiastically dashes toward her target, dealing damage to any enemies she passes through on the way. Nilah dashes through a unit, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ dashdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to any enemies she passes through.

abilities.name: Jubilant Veil
abilities.mechanics_description: Nilah's Jubilant Veil (W) is an auto-target ability where Nilah and a targeted ally become veiled, granting them increased movement speed and bonus attack range. Additionally, all incoming enemy abilities are blocked for a short duration, making it a strong defensive and utility tool for engaging or disengaging.
abilities.original_description:
Nilah envelops herself in mist, increasing her movement speed and allowing her to gracefully dodge all incoming attacks. Any allies she touches during the mist's duration will also gain this effect. Nilah envelops herself in mist for {{ baseduration }} seconds, becoming Ghosted, gaining {{ movespeedpercent*100 }}% Move Speed, dodging Attacks, and reducing magic damage taken by {{ magicdamagereduction*100 }}%.

While active, touching allied champions envelops them in mist, granting the same benefits for {{ sharebaseduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Apotheosis
abilities.mechanics_description: Nilah's ultimate, Apotheosis, is a circular skillshot that allows her to dash to a target location, dealing damage in an area and then creating a healing-and-shielding aura around her. This ability is primarily used offensively to engage skirmishes and deal AoE damage, while also providing significant survivability for Nilah and her allies within the aura.
abilities.original_description:
Twirling her whip-blade in joyful exuberance, Nilah deals damage to enemies around her before pulling them closer with her weapon. Nilah whirls her whip-blade, dealing {{ damagepertickcalctooltip }} physical damage over 1 second, then finishes with a burst of {{ damagecalc }} physical damage that also Pulls nearby enemies toward her.

Nilah heals herself and nearby allies by {{ champhealingpercent }} (+{{ spell.nilahq:critlifesteal }} Formless Blade) of her damage dealt to enemy champions' Health ({{ otherhealingpercent*100 }}% for non-champions), converting any overhealing into a Shield for {{ duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
abilities.mechanics_description: Kled's mount, Skaarl, acts as a health bar separate from Kled's. When Skaarl's health is depleted, Kled dismounts, becoming **Untargetable** and gaining movement speed but losing access to his abilities; he regains Skaarl's health based on attacking enemy champions and structures. This allows Kled to engage aggressively, sacrificing Skaarl's health for survivability and offensive pressure, potentially remounting after being dismounted.
abilities.original_description:
Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.

While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

abilities.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
abilities.mechanics_description: Bear Trap on a Rope is a skillshot that Kled throws a hook in a straight line, attached to a chain. If it hits an enemy champion, Kled and Skaarl dash towards them, dealing magic damage and attaching a tether; if the enemy moves too far from Kled within a short duration, they take arming damage and are stunned.
abilities.original_description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage. Mounted: Kled throws a bear trap that deals {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large jungle monster hit.

If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for {{ tetherpoptime }} seconds, he yanks out the trap, dealing {{ totalyankdamage }} physical damage, Pulling them, and Slowing by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Violent Tendencies
abilities.mechanics_description: Kled's **Violent Tendencies (W)** is a passive ability that automatically triggers on his next few basic attacks after activating any other ability. It grants him bonus attack speed and causes his subsequent basic attacks to deal bonus on-hit damage to the same target.
abilities.original_description:
Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage. Passive: Kled's next Attack grants {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed for four Attacks or {{ activeduration }} seconds.

The fourth hit deals an additional {{ baseflatdamage }} plus {{ percentdamage }} max Health physical damage.

abilities.name: Jousting
abilities.mechanics_description: Jousting (E) is a two-part dash skillshot. Kled dashes forward, dealing damage and can recast the ability to dash again in the same direction if he hits an enemy champion or large monster. It is used offensively for damage and to stick to targets, or defensively to reposition.
abilities.original_description:
Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage. Kled dashes, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to enemies he passes through, pulling minions and small monsters towards him.

If this Ability hits an enemy champion or large jungle monster, Kled gains {{ movespeed*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ movespeedduration }} second(s) and can Recast within {{ recastwindow }} seconds to dash back through the same target.

abilities.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
abilities.mechanics_description: Kled's ultimate, "Chaaaaaaaarge!!!", is a targeted dash that Kled and any allied champions nearby can follow. It's used offensively to initiate fights, chase down enemies, and provide a sturdy brimstone's treasure to Kled, granting him a temporary shield as he charges.
abilities.original_description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered. Kled charges toward an area, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing <speed>Move Speed</speed>. While charging and for 2 seconds after Kled gains up to <shield>{{ maximumshield }} Shield</shield>. Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing <magicDamage>{{ minimumdamagetooltip }}</magicDamage> to <magicDamage>{{ maximumchargedamage }} max Health magic damage</magicDamage> (based on distance travelled) and briefly <status>Knocking Back</status>.

abilities.name: Reign of Anger
abilities.mechanics_description: Renekton's Fury passively builds up as he takes damage or deals damage with his abilities. This Fury is consumed by his other abilities to empower them with bonus effects.
abilities.original_description: Renekton's attacks generate Fury, increased when he is low on life. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects.

abilities.name: Ruthless Predator
abilities.mechanics_description: Ruthless Predator is a point-and-click ability that marks enemies. Upon activation, Renekton attacks a marked target, dealing damage and stunning them. If Empowered (by Fury), it executes a third, wider strike that can stun multiple enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, destroying damage shields on the target, dealing high physical damage, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Renekton's next Attack strikes twice, Stunning for {{ stunduration }} seconds and dealing a total of {{ basictotaldamage }} physical damage. Hitting a champion generates an additional {{ bonusfuryvschamps }} Fury.

Fury Bonus: Renekton Attacks 3 times instead, destroying Shields before dealing {{ emptotaldamage }} physical damage and Stunning for {{ enragedstunduration }} seconds. Does not generate any Fury.

abilities.name: Cull the Meek
abilities.mechanics_description: Renekton's Q, Cull the Meek, is an area-of-effect cleave that hits all enemies in a cone in front of him; it deals damage, heals him for a portion of the damage dealt, and gains increased healing and damage if he is at full Fury. This ability is used offensively for wave clear and trading due to its damage and sustain, and defensively to recover health.
abilities.original_description:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased. Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ basicdamage }} physical damage and restoring {{ nonchamphealing }} Health per non-champion and {{ champhealing }} per champion hit. He also generates {{ minionfurygain }} Fury per non-champion and {{ championfurygain }} Fury per champion.

Fury Bonus: Damage is increased to {{ empdamage }} physical damage and healing is increased to {{ empnonchamphealing }} Health against non-champions and {{ empchamphealing }} Health against champions. Does not generate any Fury.

abilities.name: Dominus
abilities.mechanics_description: Renekton activates Dominus as an **auto-target** ability, immediately dealing physical damage around him and gaining bonus **healing** and **empowered Fury generation**. While active, Renekton's auto-attacks and abilities also deal bonus magic damage, making it primarily an **offensive** tool for sustained combat and burst.
abilities.original_description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically. Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ buffduration }} seconds, gaining <healing>{{ healthgain }} max Health</healing> and <keywordMajor>{{ furyoncast }} Fury</keywordMajor>. While active, he deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagepersecond }} magic damage</magicDamage> and gains <keywordMajor>{{ furypersecond }} Fury</keywordMajor> per second.

abilities.name: Slice and Dice
abilities.mechanics_description: Renekton's Slice and Dice (E) is a two-part ability: a linear skillshot dash that deals damage and can be reactivated for a second horizontal dash. It's primarily used offensively for gap closing, damage, and mobility, but the second cast can be used defensively to reposition or escape.
abilities.original_description:
Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit. Renekton dashes, dealing {{ basicdamage }} physical damage. He generates {{ minionragegeneration }} Fury per non-champion and {{ championragegeneration }} Fury per champion hit. Hitting at least one enemy allows Renekton to Recast this Ability once for {{ dicetimer }} seconds.

Fury Bonus: The Recast dash deals {{ empdamage }} physical damage instead and removes {{ enragedarmorshred }}% Armor for {{ shredtimer }} seconds. Does not generate Fury.

abilities.name: Mortal Will
abilities.mechanics_description: Mortal Will is a passive ability for Pantheon. It grants him bonus critical strike damage on his next attack after casting any ability. This passive is auto-targeted and used offensively to enhance his burst damage.
abilities.original_description: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.

abilities.name: Shield Vault
abilities.mechanics_description: Shield Vault is a point-and-click dash that damages and stuns an enemy target. Pantheon leaps to his target, striking them with his shield for damage and a brief stun, serving as both an offensive engage and a defensive crowd control tool.
abilities.original_description:
Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them. Pantheon leaps on his target, Stunning for {{ stunduration }} second and dealing {{ maxhealthdamagecalc }} max Health physical damage.

Mortal Will Bonus: Pantheon's next Attack strikes {{ empowerednumhits }} times, dealing a total of {{ empowereddamagemultcalcmodified }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Comet Spear
abilities.mechanics_description: Pantheon throws his spear in a straight line skillshot. If it hits an enemy, it deals damage, slows them, and can be followed up by his empowered auto-attack, "Mortal Will," for bonus damage.
abilities.original_description:
Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction. Tap: Pantheon thrusts his spear, dealing {{ tapdamagecalc }} physical damage to enemies hit. Refunds {{ tapcooldownrefund*100 }}% of this Ability's Cooldown.

Hold: Pantheon hurls his spear, dealing {{ holddamagecalc }} physical damage to the first enemy hit and {{ damagefalloff*100 }}% less to further targets.

This Ability is enhanced against enemies below {{ crithealththreshold*100 }}% Health to deal {{ executedamagecalcmodified }} physical damage instead.

Mortal Will Bonus: Deals an additional {{ empowereddamagecalc }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Aegis Assault
abilities.mechanics_description: Aegis Assault is a linear skillshot where Pantheon thrusts his shield forward, damaging and slowing all enemies hit. This ability is primarily used offensively to deal damage and apply crowd control, but it also provides a temporary shield to absorb incoming damage.
abilities.original_description:
Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear. Pantheon braces his shield and engages enemies in a chosen direction for {{ shieldduration }} seconds, becoming immune to non-tower damage from that direction and dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage over the duration. After channeling Pantheon slams with his shield, dealing {{ shielddamagecalc }} physical damage.

Mortal Will Bonus: When Pantheon slams his shield he gains {{ resistscalc }} Armor and {{ resistscalc }} Magic Resist for {{ resistsduration }} seconds, and {{ speedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ speedduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Grand Starfall
abilities.mechanics_description: Pantheon's Grand Starfall is a targeted **point-and-click** ultimate that allows him to channel briefly before leaping into the air and crashing down at a target location, dealing damage and suppressing all enemies hit by the impact. This ability is primarily used **offensively** for aggressive engagement and burst damage, but the suppression also provides **utility** by locking down targets.
abilities.original_description:
Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet. Passive: Pantheon gains {{ armorpenetration*100 }}% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pantheon gathers his strength to leap high into the air. He throws his spear from above which in a small area deals {{ spell.pantheonq:holddamagecalc }} physical damage and Slows by {{ spearslow*100 }}% for {{ spearslowduration }} seconds.

Pantheon then crashes down as a meteor at the target area. Deals up to {{ damagecalc }} magic damage to enemies in a line (decreased by up to {{ edgedamagereduction*100 }}% at the edges of the area).

This Ability instantly readies Mortal Will.

abilities.name: Above and Below
abilities.mechanics_description: Bel'Veth's Above and Below is a targetable dash that deals damage to enemies upon activation and can be reactivated within a short window to dash back to her starting position. This ability is used offensively for chasing, executing enemies, or repositioning to safety after engaging.
abilities.original_description: Bel'Veth slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies. Bel'Veth slams her tail, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Knocking Up</status> foes for {{ duration }} seconds, and <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. If a champion is hit, this refreshes the Cooldown of <spellName>Void Surge</spellName> in that direction.

abilities.name: Void Surge
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Surge is a **dash** that Bel'Veth can use in one of four directions, dealing damage to enemies she passes through. It is primarily used **offensively** to chase targets, reposition for better attacks, or engage, and can also be used **defensively** to escape danger.
abilities.original_description:
Bel'Veth dashes in a chosen direction and damages all enemies she passes through. Bel'Veth dashes, dealing {{ basedamage }} physical damage to enemies she passes through.

Each direction has an unique Cooldown of {{ f1 }} seconds that scales down based on her Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Death in Lavender
abilities.mechanics_description: "Death in Lavender" is Bel'Veth's passive ability. It causes her basic attacks and abilities to apply "Lavender" stacks to enemies. Upon reaching three stacks, subsequent attacks consume them to deal bonus true damage and restore a small amount of health, making it an offensive tool that enhances her sustained damage and survivability in combat.
abilities.original_description: Bel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large minions and monsters and champions. She also gains temporary bonus attack speed after using an ability.

abilities.name: Royal Maelstrom
abilities.mechanics_description: Royal Maelstrom is a linear skillshot that Bel'Veth dashes towards the end of, depositing a void coral. This coral erupts after a short delay, dealing area damage and slowing enemies who stay within its radius.
abilities.original_description:
Bel'Veth roots herself in place, channeling a storm of slashes around her that targets the lowest-health enemy and grants her lifesteal and damage reduction. Bel'Veth channels and slashes around herself, gaining {{ drpercent*100 }}% Damage Reduction, {{ totallifesteal }} Life Steal, and Attacking {{ f2.0 }} times over {{ totalduration }} seconds with the number of Attacks increasing based on her Attack Speed. Each Attack strikes the lowest-health enemy, dealing {{ damageperstrike }} to {{ maxdamageperstriketooltip }} physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

Using another Ability or Recasting ends this Ability early.

abilities.name: Endless Banquet
abilities.mechanics_description: Bel'Veth's ult, Endless Banquet, is a transformative ability that is **auto-targeted** on a nearby enemy champion. Upon activation, she **dashes through the target**, dealing true damage and applying a debuff; if the target dies within a short window after being hit, Bel'Veth **gains a permanent buff** that enhances her other abilities and grants her a large health pool, making it a powerful **offensive** and **scaling** tool.
abilities.original_description:
Bel'Veth consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into her true form and increasing her max health, attack range, attack speed, and out-of-combat move speed. Consuming the Void coral remnants of a Void epic monster will grant her a longer ultimate duration, as well as the power to summon Void remora. Passive: Every second Attack against the same target deals an additional {{ finalonhitdamage }} true damage, stacking infinitely. Takedowns against champions and epic monsters leave behind a piece of Void Coral.

Active: Consuming Void Coral grants {{ passivestacksondevour }} Lavender stack and activates Bel'Veth's true form for {{ steroidduration }} seconds. Void Coral from Void epic monsters increases the duration to {{ voidduration }} seconds and causes minions that die nearby to become Void Remora. While casting, Bel'Veth Slows nearby enemies before exploding, dealing {{ totalexplosiondamage }} + {{ missinghealthdamage*100 }}% missing-Health true damage.

In her true form, Bel'Veth gains {{ maxhealthondevour }} max Health, {{ oocms }} Move Speed out of combat, {{ bonusaarange }} Attack range, {{ totalasmod*100 }}% Total Attack Speed, and Void Surge can pass through walls.

abilities.name: Terrify
abilities.mechanics_description: Fiddlesticks' Terrify is a point-and-click ability that disorients an enemy champion, causing them to walk aimlessly away from Fiddlesticks for a short duration. It is primarily used as an offensive crowd control tool to isolate targets or set up other abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Fiddlesticks damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration. Passive: While unseen and out of combat or impersonating an Effigy, damaging an enemy with an ability Fears them for {{ fearduration }} second(s).

Active: Fear an enemy for {{ fearduration }} second(s) and deal {{ totalpercenthealthdamage }} current Health magic damage. If the target has recently been Feared by Fiddlesticks, instead deal {{ totalpercenthealthdamagefeared }} current Health magic damage.

abilities.name: A Harmless Scarecrow
abilities.mechanics_description: Fiddlesticks' passive, "A Harmless Scarecrow," is an auto-targeting ability that provides a debuff to enemies hit by his ability damage. This debuff causes affected enemies to take increased damage from Fiddlesticks' abilities, promoting offensive burst damage and punishing enemies who stand in his area of effect.
abilities.original_description: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.

abilities.name: Bountiful Harvest
abilities.mechanics_description: Bountiful Harvest is a circular AoE ability Fiddlesticks places on the ground around himself. It deals damage over time and, crucially, **drains health from all enemies hit, healing Fiddlesticks based on the damage dealt**, making it both an offensive and potent defensive/sustain tool.
abilities.original_description:
Fiddlesticks drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration. Fiddlesticks channels and drains the souls of nearby enemies, dealing {{ draindamagecalc }} magic damage per second for 2 seconds, plus {{ percentfortooltip }}% missing Health magic damage at the end. Fiddlesticks restores {{ vamppercentage }}% of damage as Health.

If Fiddlesticks ends the channel without interruption, the remaining Cooldown is reduced by 60%.

abilities.name: Reap
abilities.mechanics_description: Fiddlesticks' Reap is a point-and-click ability that deals magic damage to a target enemy and drains health from them, healing Fiddlesticks for a portion of the damage dealt. It's primarily used offensively to apply pressure and sustain in trades or all-ins.
abilities.original_description: Fiddlesticks slashes an area with its scythe, slowing all enemies hit and silencing enemies hit in the center of the slash. Fiddlesticks unleashes dark magic, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ silenceduration }} seconds. Enemies in the center are also <status>Silenced</status> for the duration.

abilities.name: Crowstorm
abilities.mechanics_description: Crowstorm is a channeled area-of-effect ability that Fiddlesticks casts by activating R. While channeling, Fiddlesticks becomes untargetable and rapidly blinks to the target location while dealing significant magic damage to all enemies within the area. It is primarily an offensive, area-of-effect damage ability with crowd control (fear) incorporated into its passive.
abilities.original_description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area. Fiddlesticks channels for {{ channeltime }} seconds, then teleports and unleashes a murder of crows, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> over {{ duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Undertow
abilities.mechanics_description: Olaf throws his axe in a straight line as a skillshot. Champions hit by the axe take damage and are slowed, with Olaf also being slowed if he walks over the axe's landing spot.
abilities.original_description:
Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and reducing their Armor and Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reset. Olaf throws an axe, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and Slowing by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for up to {{ e3 }} seconds (based on distance travelled). Champions hit lose {{ shredamount*100 }}% Armor for {{ debuffduration }} seconds.

If Olaf picks up the axe, this Ability's Cooldown is reduced to {{ tooltipcdrefund }} seconds, or fully refunded if {{ tooltipcdrefund }} seconds has elapsed.

abilities.name: Tough It Out
abilities.mechanics_description: Olaf activates a shield that absorbs damage, and while active, he gains movement speed and can move through units. This utility ability is primarily defensive, offering sustain and survivability during aggressive engagements or retreats.
abilities.original_description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased and he gains a Shield. Olaf gains <attackSpeed>{{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for {{ duration }} seconds, and <shield>{{ baseshield }} plus {{ shieldpercmissinghp*100 }}% missing Health Shield (up to a maximum of {{ maxshieldcalc }} Shield below {{ thresholdformax*100 }}% Health)</shield> for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Reckless Swing
abilities.mechanics_description: Olaf throws his axe in a line, dealing damage to enemies hit and **sticking** in the first target it hits. He can then automatically **pick it up** by walking over it, refunding a portion of the cooldown. This ability is primarily used offensively for **waveclear and single-target damage**, with the cooldown refund rewarding successful hits by allowing for more frequent aggression.
abilities.original_description:
Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target. Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing {{ totaldamage }} true damage. If the enemy dies, the cost is refunded.

Attacks lower the Cooldown of this Ability by 1 second, increased to 2 seconds when attacking monsters.

abilities.name: Ragnarok
abilities.mechanics_description: Olaf's Ragnarok (R) is an **auto-target buff** that he activates to gain significant **bonus attack speed and movement speed**, while becoming **immune to crowd control effects** for its duration. This ultimate is primarily used **offensively** to chase down targets and deal sustained damage during fights.
abilities.original_description:
Olaf passively gains increased armor and magic resist. He can activate this ability to become immune to disables for as long as he keeps attacking. Passive: Olaf gains {{ resists }} Armor and {{ resists }} Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf cleanses all Immobilizing and Disabling effects on himself and becomes immune to them for {{ duration }} seconds. While active, Olaf gains {{ ad }} Attack Damage. Hitting a champion with an Attack or Reckless Swing extends the duration by {{ durationextension }} seconds.

Additionally, Olaf gains {{ haste*100 }}% Move Speed towards enemy champions for {{ hasteduration }} second.

abilities.name: Berserker Rage
abilities.mechanics_description: **Berserker Rage (Passive)** is an **auto-target** ability consumed by dealing damage. It defensively **increases Olaf's attack speed and movement speed** as his health lowers, making him more dangerous and evasive when he is low on health.
abilities.original_description: Olaf gains Attack Speed and Life Steal based on his missing Health.

abilities.name: Gleaming Quill
