abilities.mechanics_description: Gleaming Quill is a linear skillshot that Rakan fires. If it hits an enemy champion, it deals damage and applies a mark; if it hits an allied champion (or Rakan himself) after marking an enemy, it rushes to them, healing them.
abilities.original_description:
Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies. Rakan flings a magical feather that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the feather hits a champion or epic jungle monster, Rakan restores {{ totalheal }} Health to himself and nearby allies after {{ healdelay }} seconds or when he touches an allied champion.

abilities.name: Grand Entrance
abilities.mechanics_description: Rakan's W, Grand Entrance, is a **targeted dash**. After a short delay, Rakan leaps to the target location, dealing magic damage and **knocking up** all enemies hit.
abilities.original_description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival. Rakan dashes, then spirals into the air, <status>Knocking Up</status> for {{ knockupduration }} second and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Fey Feathers
abilities.mechanics_description: Rakan's passive, Fey Feathers, is an auto-target ability that grants him a shield after he hits an enemy champion with a spell. This shield is used defensively to absorb damage, allowing Rakan to engage or disengage more safely.
abilities.original_description: Rakan periodically gains a shield.

abilities.name: Battle Dance
abilities.mechanics_description: Rakan's Battle Dance (E) is a targeted dash that allows him to quickly reposition to an allied champion, reapplying its shield. It's primarily used defensively to escape danger or to reposition for his engage, but can also be used offensively to follow up on his engage or to reach allies who are in trouble.
abilities.original_description:
Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration. Rakan dashes to an allied champion, granting them {{ totalshield }} Shield for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Rakan can Recast this Ability once within {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: The Quickness
abilities.mechanics_description: Rakan's ultimate, *The Quickness*, is a targeted dash that becomes a skillshot after the initial cast. He dashes to a target enemy, becoming   untargetable and dealing damage, then creates a damaging field upon arrival. Enemies touched by his initial dash or residual field are charmed and knocked up, making it a powerful engage tool for initiating fights and crowd controlling multiple enemies.
abilities.original_description: Gains Move Speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched. Rakan gains <speed>{{ e5 }}% Move Speed</speed> for {{ e2 }} seconds. Rakan deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Charms</status> enemies for {{ e3 }} second(s) the first time he touches them. The first champion touched grants Rakan <speed>{{ e6 }}% decaying Move Speed</speed>.

abilities.name: Achooo!
abilities.mechanics_description: Smolder's Achooo! (W) is a linear skillshot that deals damage to enemies in a cone. It can be used offensively to deal damage and apply a stacking debuff that reduces enemy magic resistance, or defensively to poke enemies from a distance and contribute to his Q ability's stacking mechanic.
abilities.original_description:
Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions. Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze, dealing {{ initialdamage }} physical damage and Slowing by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Hitting champions causes an explosion, dealing {{ explosiondamage }} physical + {{ spell.smolderp:passive_wdamageincrease }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Flap, Flap, Flap
abilities.mechanics_description: Smolder's E, "Flap, Flap, Flap," is a **cone-shaped skillshot** that damages and applies a movement speed reduction debuff to enemies hit. He uses it offensively to poke and slow enemies, aiding in chase or disengage.
abilities.original_description:
Smolder takes flight ignoring terrain and bombarding the lowest health enemy. Smolder takes flight, gaining {{ movespeed*100 }}% Move Speed and ignoring terrain for {{ duration }} seconds.

While flying, Smolder bombards the lowest Health enemy {{ totalnumberofattacks }} (rounded down) times for {{ damageperhit }} physical damage + {{ spell.smolderp:ebonusdamage }} magic damage per hit.

abilities.name: Super Scorcher Breath
abilities.mechanics_description: Smolder's Q, **Super Scorcher Breath**, is a linear skillshot that deals damage to enemies in a line and applies a stack of his passive. At three stacks of his passive, the ability becomes an enhanced cone-shaped blast, dealing significantly more damage and executing targets below a certain health threshold. It is primarily used offensively for sustained damage and executing low-health opponents.
abilities.original_description:
Smolder breathes fire on an enemy. As he gains more stacks, this ability becomes more powerful. Smolder belches flame, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage + {{ spell.smolderp:passive_qdamageincrease }} magic damage. If the target dies, Smolder refunds {{ manarestore }} Mana, once per cast.

Based on stacks of Dragon Practice, this Ability evolves to gain the following effects:
  • {{ stacktier1 }} Stacks: Damages all enemies surrounding the target.
  • {{ stacktier2 }} Stacks: Sends {{ tier2_numberofblowback }} explosions beyond the target that deal {{ tier2_blowbackpercentagedamage }}% of this Ability's damage.
  • {{ stacktier3 }} Stacks: Burns the target, dealing {{ tier3_burn }} max Health true damage over {{ tier3_dotlength }} seconds. Enemy champions that drop below {{ tier3_executethreshold }} total health while burning are killed instantly.

abilities.name: Dragon Practice
abilities.mechanics_description: Smolder's passive, "Dragon Practice," is an **auto-target** ability that applies stacks to enemy champions when Smolder hits them with his abilities or basic attacks. These stacks empower his Q ability, "Ache," granting it increasingly potent effects with more stacks.
abilities.original_description: Hitting champions with Abilities and killing enemies with Super Scorcher Breath grants a stack of Dragon Practice. Stacks increase the damage of Smolders basic Abilities.

abilities.name: MMOOOMMMM!
abilities.mechanics_description: Smolder's "MMOOOMMMM!" (R) is a linear skillshot that launches a fiery breath in a straight line, dealing damage and applying a heal reduction to enemies hit. It is primarily used offensively to deal significant damage and zone enemies, but the added heal reduction can also be utilized defensively by denying enemy healing.
abilities.original_description:
Smolder calls his mom to breath fire from above, dealing extra damage and slowing enemies in the center of her fire. Smolder's mom breathes fire from above, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage. Enemies in the center take {{ tooltiponly_totalsweetspotdamage }} physical damage instead and are Slowed by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Smolder's mom heals her son for {{ momhealcalc }} Health if she hits him.

abilities.name: Harrier
abilities.mechanics_description: Harrier is a passive ability that marks enemies after Quinn uses a basic ability or attacks a champion. Her next attack against a marked enemy will automatically target, consuming the mark for bonus physical damage and increased attack range.
abilities.original_description: Valor, Quinn's Demacian eagle, periodically marks enemies as <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font>. Quinn's first basic attack against <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> targets will deal bonus physical damage.

abilities.name: Blinding Assault
abilities.mechanics_description: Blinding Assault is a linear skillshot that Quinn throws in a target direction. It deals damage to the first enemy hit, and if it hits an enemy champion or large monster, it will **blind** them, causing their auto-attacks to miss for a short duration, while also marking the target.
abilities.original_description:
Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area. Quinn orders Valor to dive, making the first enemy hit Vulnerable, reducing their vision radius for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to all surrounding enemies.

If the first enemy struck is not a champion, it is Disarmed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Heightened Senses
abilities.mechanics_description: Heightened Senses is a **point-and-click** ability that sends Valor in a target direction to detect enemies. It is primarily a **utility** tool, revealing enemies in a circular area and marking them for Quinn, granting true sight and dealing damage if Valor is near them.
abilities.original_description:
Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Move Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby. Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target grants Quinn {{ attackspeedbonus*100 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% Move Speed for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.mechanics_description: Vault is a **dash** ability that allows Quinn to **leap to a target enemy**, dealing magic damage and briefly **slows** them. She then **auto-targets** the closest enemy (prioritizing champions) for an attack, consuming her passive "Harrier" mark if present. Vault is used offensively to engage, chase, or reposition, while also providing a small utility slow.
abilities.original_description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Move Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target. Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and marking them <keywordMajor>Vulnerable</keywordMajor>. Quinn then leaps backwards from the target, slightly <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Back</status> and <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ e1 }}%, decaying over {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Behind Enemy Lines
abilities.mechanics_description: Quinn's ultimate, **Behind Enemy Lines**, is a targeted ability where Quinn marks an enemy champion at a significant distance, then channels briefly before aggressively dashing towards them. This ability is primarily used offensively to close gaps, set up engagements, or finish off fleeing enemies, and can be reactivated to mark a new target during its flight.
abilities.original_description:
Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed. Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable. Quinn calls to Valor, pairing up after channeling for 2 seconds gaining {{ movementspeedmod*100 }}% Move Speed and allowing her to Recast this Ability. Attacking or using Blinding Assault or Vault automatically Recasts this Ability.

Recast: Quinn and Valor perform an aerial maneuver, dealing {{ damage }} physical damage, marking champions as Vulnerable, and ending this Ability.

abilities.name: Clockwork Windup
abilities.mechanics_description: Clockwork Windup is an auto-target passive that triggers on Orianna's basic attacks. Each subsequent auto-attack on the same target within a short window will deal bonus magic damage, stacking up to a maximum of three times.
abilities.original_description: Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.

abilities.name: Command: Dissonance
abilities.mechanics_description: Command: Dissonance is a circular skillshot that Orianna sends her Ball to. Upon activation, the Ball deals magic damage and slows nearby enemies, and Orianna can then interact with the Ball to reposition it.
abilities.original_description:
Orianna commands her Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies. Orianna commands her Ball to release an electric pulse, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to surrounding enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an energy field for {{ fieldduration }} seconds, Slowing enemies by {{ slowamount*100 }}% and granting allies {{ hasteamount*100 }}% Move Speed, decaying over {{ slowandhasteduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Command: Attack
abilities.mechanics_description: Command: Attack is a **skillshot** that Orianna sends her **Ball** flying in a straight line, dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through. It's primarily used **offensively** to poke, farm, and deal damage, but can also be used to position the Ball for other abilities.
abilities.original_description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after. Orianna commands her <keywordMajor>Ball</keywordMajor> to move to an area, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage</magicDamage> to surrounding enemies and to enemies it passes through. Deals {{ e2 }}% less damage to all enemies after the first.

abilities.name: Command: Protect
abilities.mechanics_description: Command: Protect is a point-and-click ability that Orianna targets an allied champion or her own Ball. It directs the Ball to travel to the target, granting a shield to the allied champion and repositioning the Ball to be near them.
abilities.original_description:
Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, Shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to. Passive: The Ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and {{ e2 }} Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, granting them {{ totalshieldtooltip }} Shield for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies the Ball passes through take {{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Command: Shockwave
abilities.mechanics_description: Command: Shockwave is a circular skillshot that Orianna casts at a target location, pulling nearby enemies towards the Ball's ultimate position before dealing damage, making it primarily an offensive tool with significant crowd control. It requires precise positioning of the Ball to maximize its impact and can be used to initiate fights, zone enemies, or follow up on allied crowd control.
abilities.original_description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay. Orianna commands her <keywordMajor>Ball</keywordMajor> to unleash a shockwave, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to nearby enemies and <status>Knocking</status> them in the direction of the <keywordMajor>Ball</keywordMajor>.

abilities.name: Bramble Smash
abilities.mechanics_description: Bramble Smash is a point-and-click ability that Maokai uses offensively to deal damage and apply a snare (root) to his target. It is often used to initiate fights, secure kills, or peel for allies by locking down a threat.
abilities.original_description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them. Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} plus {{ basepercenthealth*100 }}% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> and briefly <status>Slowing</status>. Nearby enemies are also <status>Knocked Back</status>.

abilities.name: Sap Magic
abilities.mechanics_description: Sap Magic is an auto-target passive that refunds mana on spell cast and grants Maokai a decaying shield when he hits an enemy champion with an ability or a minion/monster with a spell. It's primarily used defensively to sustain during laning and skirmishes, but the mana refund aids in his overall spell rotation.
abilities.original_description: Maokai's basic attack also heals him and deals additional damage on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

abilities.name: Nature's Grasp
abilities.mechanics_description: Nature's Grasp is a large circular skillshot that Maokai throws. Enemies hit by the initial snare are rooted, and subsequent enemies caught by the spreading vines are also rooted, making it a powerful teamfight engage and crowd control tool.
abilities.original_description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path. Maokai summons a colossal wave of brambles and thorns, <status>Rooting</status> enemies for {{ minrootduration }} to {{ maxrootduration }} seconds, increasing with distance travelled, and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Hitting a champion gives Maokai <speed>{{ movehaste*100 }}% Move Speed</speed>, decaying over {{ hasteduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Twisted Advance
abilities.mechanics_description: Twisted Advance is a **point-and-click dash** that allows Maokai to **target an enemy unit** and **suppress them**, locking them in place while Maokai channels nature's energy to **heal himself**. This ability is primarily used **offensively for initiation and CC**, but its self-heal provides significant **defensive sustain** during engagements.
abilities.original_description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target. Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming Untargetable and dashing to an enemy. Upon arrival, he <status>Roots</status> the enemy for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Sapling Toss
abilities.mechanics_description: Sapling Toss is a skillshot that Maokai throws in a target direction. Upon landing, it roots himself and allies, and explodes after a delay, dealing magic damage and applying a slow to enemies in an area.
abilities.original_description:
Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush. Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for {{ saplingduration }} seconds. Saplings chase nearby enemies, detonating on arrival to deal {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slow surrounding enemies by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Sap Magic's Cooldown is reduced by an additional 4 seconds if the sapling hits an enemy champion or epic monster.

If placed in brush, Saplings instead last for {{ empoweredsaplingduration }} seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing {{ totalempowereddamage }} magic damage over {{ empowereddotduration }} seconds and Slowing enemies by {{ empoweredslowamount }}.

abilities.name: Double Daggers
abilities.mechanics_description: Xayah throws a feather in a target direction as a linear skillshot that pierces through enemies. This ability is primarily used offensively to deal damage and is crucial for setting up her empowered auto-attacks and abilities by placing feathers.
abilities.original_description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall. Xayah throws two daggers, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> each and leaving two <keywordMajor>Feathers</keywordMajor>. Targets hit after the first take <physicalDamage>{{ multihitdamage }} damage</physicalDamage> from each dagger.

abilities.name: Clean Cuts
abilities.mechanics_description: Clean Cuts is a passive ability for Xayah that **enhances her auto attacks**, making them pierce through enemies. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal damage to multiple targets in a line.
abilities.original_description: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a <font color='#C200E1'>Feather</font>.

abilities.name: Featherstorm
abilities.mechanics_description: Xayah's Featherstorm (R) is a channeled, multi-instance skillshot that allows her to become untargetable and launch a barrage of empowered feathers in a cone. This ability is primarily used offensively to deal significant burst damage to enemies within the cone, with the repositioning aspect offering a limited defensive escape by dodging incoming crowd control and damage during the cast.
abilities.original_description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall. Xayah leaps into the air becoming Untargetable and Ghosted for 1.5 seconds before raining down daggers that deal <physicalDamage>{{ damage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and leave behind a line of <keywordMajor>Feathers</keywordMajor>.

abilities.name: Bladecaller
abilities.mechanics_description: Bladecaller is a targeted ability that recalls Xayah's feathers to fly through enemies in a line. This ability is primarily used offensively to deal damage and set up combos with her empowered auto-attacks, as well as defensively to interrupt enemy engages when used reactively.
abilities.original_description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies. Xayah calls all <keywordMajor>Feathers</keywordMajor> back to her, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ featherdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> each. If {{ featherthreshold }} or more <keywordMajor>Feathers</keywordMajor> hit an enemy, they are <status>Rooted</status> for {{ rootduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Deadly Plumage
abilities.mechanics_description: Deadly Plumage is a self-buff that, for a short duration, causes Xayah's next three damaging abilities and empowered auto-attacks to pierce through enemies, dealing reduced damage to targets beyond the first. This ability is used offensively to increase her area-of-effect damage against clustered enemies or to finish off low-health targets behind the frontline.
abilities.original_description:
Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her Attack Speed and damage while also granting her Move Speed if she attacks a champion. Xayah creates a storm of blades for {{ e2 }} seconds that grants her {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed and cause her Attacks to fire a secondary blade that deals {{ bonusdamagepercent }}% damage.

When the secondary blade hits a champion, she grants herself {{ e3 }}% Move Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of this Ability, except he gains Move Speed when Xayah strikes a target.

abilities.name: Spiked Shell
abilities.mechanics_description: Spiked Shell is a passive ability for Rammus. When Rammus is attacked by an enemy champion's auto-attack or ability, he reflects a portion of the incoming damage back to the attacker as magic damage. This ability is used defensively to punish enemies who engage Rammus directly and offensively to deal consistent damage in extended fights.
abilities.original_description: Rammus gains bonus Attack Damage scaling with his Armor and Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: Powerball
abilities.mechanics_description: Rammus's Powerball is a linear skillshot dash where he rolls forward, damaging and slowing enemies hit while gaining movement speed. He can reactivate it to stop early, allowing for offensive engagement with CC and damage or defensive repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact. Rammus curls into a ball, gaining {{ minimummovespeed }} Move Speed, accelerating up to {{ maximummovespeed }} Move Speed over {{ rollduration }} seconds. Rammus stops after colliding with an enemy, dealing {{ powerballdamage }} magic damage, Knocking Back, and Slowing nearby enemies by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ slowduration }} second.

Recast: Rammus ends this Ability early.

abilities.name: Defensive Ball Curl
abilities.mechanics_description: Rammus's Defensive Ball Curl is a **toggle** ability that Rammus **activates** on himself. It defensively increases his armor and magic resistance, while also conditionally damaging and slowing enemies he auto-attacks while active.
abilities.original_description:
Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, and returning damage to enemies that attack him. Rammus enters a defensive formation for {{ buffduration }} seconds, gaining {{ bonusarmortooltip }} Armor and {{ bonusmrtooltip }} Magic Resist and dealing {{ returndamagecalc }} magic damage to enemies that Attack him.

Recast: Rammus ends this Ability early.

abilities.name: Soaring Slam
abilities.mechanics_description: Rammus's ultimate, Soaring Slam, is a **targeted AoE skillshot**. He leaps to a target location within range, dealing magic damage and knocking up enemies in the landing area, with the knockup duration increasing with the number of unique champions hit.
abilities.original_description:
Rammus hops into the air and slams down at a target area, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If cast while Rammus is in Powerball, Rammus knocks up enemies near the center as well. Rammus hops into the air and slams down in an area, dealing {{ initialdamagecalc }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. If used during Powerball, enemies in the center take an additional {{ spell.powerball:powerballdamage }} magic damage and are Knocked Up for {{ knockupduration }} seconds.

Rammus then creates {{ numberofpulses }} aftershocks in the area over {{ buffduration }} seconds, repeating the Slow.

The range of this Ability is increased by Rammus's Move Speed.

abilities.name: Frenzying Taunt
abilities.mechanics_description:
**1. How to hit/use:** Skillshot (linear dash). Rammus targets a direction and rolls forward, damaging and taunting enemies he passes through.

**2. How it is used:** Utility (CC) and Offensive (damage). It's used to initiate fights by dashing into the enemy team, taunting them to attack him, and dealing moderate damage in a line.
abilities.original_description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Rammus <status>Taunts</status> an enemy champion or monster for {{ duration }} seconds. Monsters are dealt <magicDamage>{{ monsterdamagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Shield of Durand
abilities.mechanics_description: Shield of Durand is a point-and-click ability that Galio uses defensively to grant himself and nearby allies a magic damage shield. When the shield expires or is broken, it explodes outwards, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies. Passive: Galio gains a {{ totalpassiveshield }} Magic Shield after not taking damage for {{ passiveshieldooctimer }} seconds.

Begin Charging: Galio reduces incoming magic damage by {{ magicdamagereduction }} and incoming physical damage by {{ physicaldamagereduction }} and Slows himself by {{ e3 }}%.

Release: Galio Taunts enemy champions for between {{ e4 }} to {{ e7 }} seconds, deals between {{ mintotaldamage }} and {{ maxtotaldamage }} magic damage, and refreshes the damage reduction for {{ e8 }} seconds. Taunt duration, damage, and range increase with charge time.

abilities.name: Winds of War
abilities.mechanics_description: **Galio's Winds of War (Q)** is a two-part skillshot. The first cast sends out two wind blasts that converge at a target location, dealing magic damage. Upon converging, a secondary, larger explosion occurs, dealing bonus magic damage and taunting enemies caught within it.
abilities.original_description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time. Galio fires two windblasts that deal <magicDamage>{{ qmissiledamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> each. When the windblasts meet, they combine into a tornado that deals <magicDamage>{{ percentsuperqdamagett }}% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> over {{ superqduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Colossal Smash
abilities.mechanics_description: Colossal Smash is a **passive ability** for Galio. Every few seconds, Galio's next **auto-attack** becomes empowered, dealing **bonus magic damage** in a small area around the target. This ability is used **offensively** as a tool for sustained damage in trades and to proc his other abilities.
abilities.original_description: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.

abilities.name: Hero's Entrance
abilities.mechanics_description: Galio's Hero's Entrance (R) is a point-and-click targeted cast that he applies to an allied champion, causing him to leap into the air and then crash down at their location. This ability is primarily used for **offensive engagement and disruption**, dealing magic damage and knocking up enemies in an area upon landing, while also providing a defensive magic damage shield to himself and surrounding allies.
abilities.original_description:
Galio designates an ally's position as his landing spot, granting all allies in the area a magic shield. After a delay Galio smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies. Galio designates an allied champion's position as his landing spot, granting all allied champions in the area Shield of Durand's passive Shield for {{ temporarywshieldduration }} seconds. Galio then flies to his landing zone.

When Galio lands, he Knocks Up for {{ stundurationouter }} seconds and deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Justice Punch
abilities.mechanics_description: Justice Punch is a linear skillshot that Galio dashes forward, dealing magic damage and knocking up enemies hit. It's primarily used offensively for damage and crowd control, often initiating a gank or comboing with his ultimate.
abilities.original_description:
Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters. Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, Knocking Up for {{ knockupduration }} seconds and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first champion hit. Other enemies in the way take {{ pvedamage }} magic damage.

Galio's dash stops on hitting terrain.

abilities.name: Love Tap
abilities.mechanics_description: Love Tap is an auto-attack modifier that applies on-hit damage to a **single target**, which then **bounces** to another nearby enemy. This passive is used **offensively** to deal bonus damage and for wave clear.
abilities.original_description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.

abilities.name: Strut
abilities.mechanics_description: Strut is a passive ability for Miss Fortune that grants her bonus movement speed when she is not taking damage from champions or monsters. This passive allows Miss Fortune to reposition more effectively in lane and during teamfights.
abilities.original_description:
Miss Fortune passively gains Move Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut. Passive: After {{ passivebasemsooc }} seconds of not taking damage, Miss Fortune gains {{ passivebasems }} Move Speed. After another {{ passivemaxmsextraooc }} seconds, this increases to {{ passivemaxms }}.

Active: Gain the passive effect's full Move Speed bonus and {{ activeas*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ activeduration }} seconds.

Love Taps reduce the Cooldown of this Ability by {{ lovetaprefund }} seconds.

abilities.name: Double Up
abilities.mechanics_description: **Double Up (Q)** is a **skillshot** that Miss Fortune fires in a straight line. It passes through a target and then bounces to a second target, dealing damage to both. The first shot deals physical damage, while the second shot deals bonus physical damage if the target is a different enemy than the first. This ability is primarily used **offensively** for damage and to secure kills, often with the bounce hitting a priority target for increased burst.
abilities.original_description:
Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap. Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot, dealing {{ totaldamagetooltip }} physical damage to an enemy and to another one behind them.

The second shot can critically strike. It always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

abilities.name: Bullet Time
abilities.mechanics_description: Bullet Time is a channeled, stationary cone-shaped ultimate ability that casts a rapid volley of projectiles in a targeted direction. It is used offensively to deal massive damage to multiple enemies caught within its wide area.
abilities.original_description:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets, firing {{ totalwaves }} waves over {{ totalchannelduration }} seconds, dealing {{ physicaldamageperwave }} physical damage per wave (total {{ totalphysicaldamage }} physical damage).

Each wave can critically strike for %i:scaleCrit% {{ physicalcritperwave }} physical damage (total %i:scaleCrit% {{ totalphysicalcritdamage }} physical damage).

abilities.name: Make It Rain
abilities.mechanics_description: Make It Rain (E) is a circular skillshot that Miss Fortune throws at a target location, raining down projectiles that deal damage over time and slow enemies caught within the area. It is primarily used offensively to deal sustained damage, zone enemies away, or set up for follow-up engages with its slow.
abilities.original_description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them. Miss Fortune rains bullets, revealing an area, <status>Slowing</status> by {{ totalslowamount }} and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagepersecond }} magic damage</magicDamage> per second for {{ baseduration }} seconds (total <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>).

abilities.name: Mistral Bolt
abilities.mechanics_description: Mistral Bolt is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit. If an enemy champion is **marked** by Vex's passive, Mistral Bolt will **detonate** the mark, dealing bonus damage and **slowing** them.
abilities.original_description:
Launch a damaging missile that accelerates mid-flight. Vex launches a wave of mist that deals {{ qdamagecalc }} magic damage. After a delay, the wave becomes smaller and faster.

Consumes Gloom on enemies hit.

abilities.name: Looming Darkness
abilities.mechanics_description: Looming Darkness is a linear skillshot that Vex fires, dealing magic damage and applying a mark to enemies hit. If Vex dashes or blinks, she can reactivate Looming Darkness to pull marked enemies towards her, interrupting their dashes.
abilities.original_description:
Summon a damaging and slowing zone that applies Gloom to enemies. Vex commands Shadow to fly to a location, increasing in size as it travels. Upon arriving, it deals {{ edamagecalc }} magic damage and Slows by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Killing an enemy with this ability reduces Doom'n Gloom's Cooldown by {{ gloomcdnonchamptooltip*100 }}%.

Applies Gloom to enemies hit.

abilities.name: Personal Space
abilities.mechanics_description: Vex casts a spectral wave in a **linear skillshot** direction. Enemies hit are **damaged and take bonus damage from Vex's next ability**, providing both offensive utility and a bit of CC.
abilities.original_description:
Gain a shield and damage nearby enemies. Vex gains {{ shieldcalc }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds and emits a shockwave that deals {{ wdamagecalc }} magic damage.

Consumes Gloom on enemies hit.

abilities.name: Doom 'n Gloom
abilities.mechanics_description: Vex's passive, Doom, N' Gloom, is an **auto-target** ability that applies a mark to enemies hit by her other abilities. If Vex attacks a marked enemy with a basic attack, it consumes the mark, dealing bonus magic damage and **stealing movement speed** from the target. This passive is used **offensively** to increase burst damage and to **slow** enemies, facilitating follow-up attacks or escapes.
abilities.original_description: Vex periodically becomes empowered, causing her next basic Ability to fear enemies and interrupt dashes. Whenever a nearby enemy dashes, Vex applies a mark that can be consumed for bonus damage that also reduces the cooldown of her empowered state.

abilities.name: Shadow Surge
abilities.mechanics_description: Shadow Surge is a linear skillshot that Vex fires forward, dealing magic damage and briefly knocking up enemies hit. If cast when an enemy champion is within a certain range, Vex will dash through them, allowing for offensive repositioning and follow-up attacks to secure kills.
abilities.original_description:
Fire a missile that marks an enemy champion. Recast to dash to them and deal damage. Shadow excitedly surges forward, dealing {{ spell.vexr:rdamagecalc }} magic damage and marking the first enemy champion hit for 4 seconds.

Recast: Dash to the marked champion, dealing {{ spell.vexr:recastdamagecalc }} magic damage on arrival.

If the marked champion dies within {{ spell.vexr:takedownwindow }} seconds of taking damage from this Ability, its Cooldown is temporarily reset.

abilities.name: Second Skin
abilities.mechanics_description: Kai'Sa's passive "Second Skin" is an **auto-target** buff that is **triggered offensively** by her other abilities. Upon hitting an enemy with an ability, Kai'Sa marks them; accumulating marks empowers her next auto-attack to consume them for bonus magic damage.
abilities.original_description: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.

abilities.name: Icathian Rain
abilities.mechanics_description: Icathian Rain is a **skillshot** that Kai'Sa fires in a straight line, releasing a salvo of **6 missiles**. These missiles deal **physical damage** to enemies they hit, with bonus damage applied to the same target after the first hit, making it primarily an **offensive** ability for burst damage.
abilities.original_description:
Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.

Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles. Kai'Sa launches {{ e2 }} missiles that split among nearby enemies, each dealing {{ totalindividualmissiledamage }} physical damage, up to a maximum of {{ maxdamagedisplay }}. Additional missile hits on champions or monsters deal {{ extrahitreduction*100 }}% damage.

Evolved: Kai'Sa instead fires {{ e7 }} missiles.
Current: {{ f11.1 }}/{{ e6 }} Bonus Attack Damage

abilities.name: Void Seeker
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Seeker is a linear skillshot that Kai'Sa fires. It deals magic damage and marks enemies hit with Plasma, which Kai'Sa can consume with her other abilities for bonus damage.
abilities.original_description:
Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.

Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit. Kai'Sa fires a void blast that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage, applies {{ e4 }} stacks of Plasma, and grants True Sight of the first enemy hit for {{ spell.kaisapassive:pduration }} seconds.

Evolved: Kai'Sa instead applies {{ e5 }} stacks of Plasma and hitting a champion reduces the Cooldown by {{ e3 }}%.
Current: {{ f2.1 }}/{{ e2 }} Ability Power

abilities.name: Killer Instinct
abilities.mechanics_description: Kai'Sa's Killer Instinct (R) is a **targeted dash** that allows her to rapidly close distance to an enemy champion. It provides **offensive burst damage** and significant **defensive shielding** upon arrival, making it a powerful tool for aggressive engagement and survivability.
abilities.original_description: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion. Kai'Sa warps near an enemy champion affected by <keywordMajor>Plasma</keywordMajor> and gains <shield>{{ rcalculatedshieldvalue }} Shield</shield> for {{ rshieldduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Supercharge
abilities.mechanics_description: Kai'Sa fires a piercing skillshot that deals magic damage to enemies hit. **Supercharge** can be used offensively for poke and damage, or defensively as it triggers her Plasma passive stacks.
abilities.original_description:
Kai'Sa briefly increases her Move Speed, then increases her Attack Speed.

Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility. Kai'Sa supercharges her void energy, gaining {{ totalmovespeed }} Move Speed and becoming Ghosted while charging, then gaining {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Attacks reduce this Ability's Cooldown by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Evolved: Kai'Sa also becomes Invisible for {{ e7 }} seconds.
Current: {{ f10.1 }}%/{{ e6 }}% Bonus Attack Speed

abilities.name: Bravado
abilities.mechanics_description: Bravado is Taric's passive ability. When Taric attacks an enemy champion with his auto-attack or ability, he gains a stack of Bravado. At three stacks, Taric's next two auto-attacks are empowered, dealing bonus magic damage and reducing the cooldown of his other basic abilities. Bravado is primarily used offensively to increase Taric's damage output and enable more frequent ability casts.
abilities.original_description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

abilities.name: Starlight's Touch
abilities.mechanics_description: Taric's Q, "Starlight's Touch," is a **point-and-click heal** that targets himself or a nearby allied champion. It is primarily used **defensively** to sustain Taric and his allies in combat or during poke phases.
abilities.original_description:
Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch. Passive: Gain a stack (max {{ e6 }}) every {{ stackcooldown }} seconds and when hitting a Bravado Attack.

Active: Consume all stacks to restore {{ healingperstack }} Health per stack to nearby ally champions ({{ maxstackhealing }} at {{ e6 }} stacks).

abilities.name: Dazzle
abilities.mechanics_description: Taric hurls a projectile that travels in a straight line (linear skillshot). Enemies hit by this projectile are stunned for a short duration, making it a core tool for initiating fights or peeling for allies.
abilities.original_description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies. Taric projects a beam of starlight, bursting after {{ e3 }} second to deal <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Stun</status> enemies for {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Cosmic Radiance
abilities.mechanics_description: Cosmic Radiance is an **auto-targeted** area-of-effect ability that Taric activates on himself to grant damage reduction and healing to himself and nearby allied champions. It is used defensively as a powerful team-wide survival tool.
abilities.original_description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration. Taric calls down protection from the heavens. After {{ initialdelay }} seconds, nearby ally champions become invulnerable for {{ invulnduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Bastion
abilities.mechanics_description: Taric's Bastion (W) is an **auto-target ability** that Taric casts on a target ally or himself, making him **linked** to them. While linked, Taric's allied abilities will also **pulse out from his linked ally**, allowing him to protect or engage from a safer distance.
abilities.original_description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion. Passive: Taric gains {{ bonusarmor }} Armor and forms a tether between him and the ally bound by this Ability. As long as they are near each other, the ally gains {{ bonusarmor }} Armor and Taric casts all his Abilities from both himself and his linked ally.

Active: Taric binds to an ally champion, granting a {{ e2 }}% max Health Shield for {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Serpentine Grace
abilities.mechanics_description: Serpentine Grace is Cassiopeia's passive ability. It is not an active ability that needs to be cast; instead, it passively grants Cassiopeia bonus ability power based on her bonus mana. This passive enhances her offensive capabilities by increasing her spell damage scaling.
abilities.original_description: Cassiopeia gains Move Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

abilities.name: Noxious Blast
abilities.mechanics_description: Noxious Blast is a **linear skillshot** that Cassiopeia throws forward, dealing magic damage and applying a poison debuff to the first enemy hit. It's primarily used offensively to apply damage and her essential poison debuff, which is crucial for powering her other abilities.
abilities.original_description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Move Speed if she hits an enemy champion. Cassiopeia blasts noxious gas, <keywordMajor>Poisoning</keywordMajor> enemies and dealing <magicDamage>{{ tooltiptotaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> over {{ e2 }} seconds. Hitting a champion grants Cassiopeia <speed>{{ e3 }}% Move Speed</speed> decaying over {{ e4 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
abilities.mechanics_description: Petrifying Gaze is a cone-shaped skillshot. Enemies hit are **stunned** if they are facing Cassiopeia, or **slowed** if they are not.
abilities.original_description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned. Cassiopeia unleashes a petrifying gaze, dealing <magicDamage>{{ rdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Stunning</status> enemies facing her for {{ rccduration }} seconds. Enemies facing away are <status>Slowed</status> by {{ rslowpercent }}% decaying over the same duration instead.

abilities.name: Twin Fang
abilities.mechanics_description: Twin Fang is a point-and-click ability that Cassiopeia uses offensively to deal magic damage. It consumes ground poison from enemies, dealing bonus damage based on the number of poison stacks.
abilities.original_description:
Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana. Cassiopeia launches deadly fangs, dealing {{ basicdamage }} magic damage. If the enemy is Poisoned, they take an additional {{ bonuspoisoneddamage }} magic damage and Cassiopeia restores {{ healcalc }} Health, reduced to {{ healcalcminion }} Health against lane minions and small monsters.

If this kills the target, Cassiopeia restores {{ cost }} Mana.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.mechanics_description: Miasma is a circular skillshot that Cassiopeia throws at a target location. When it lands, Miasma creates a lingering cloud that slows enemies within it and deals magic damage over time, also costing mana to enemies who remain inside.
abilities.original_description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities. Cassiopeia spews venom, leaving toxic clouds for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the clouds take <magicDamage>{{ damagepersecond }} magic damage</magicDamage> per second, are <keywordMajor>Poisoned</keywordMajor>, <status>Grounded</status>, and <status>Slowed</status> by {{ e2 }}%.
